src: Greenland iku jarang dinggoni. Ing hikayat-hikayat Norse dheweke padha kandha menawa Erik si Abang dibuwang saka Islandia amarga mateni wong, lan nalika lelungan luwih adoh ngulon, nemokake Greenland lan njenengi iku Greenland. Nanging ora preduli kepiye temuane, suku Eskimo wis urip ing kana wektu iku. Sanadyan saben negara kuwi ‘Skandinavia’, akeh banget bedane antarane wong, raja, adat lan sejarah Denmark, Swedia, Norwegia lan Islandia.
mt: Greenland is rarely visited. In the sagas of the Norsemen they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland because he killed people, and when he sailed further north, he found Greenland and named it so. However, it is not known how he came, the Eskimo people had already lived there at that time. Although all these countries are "Scandinavia", there are many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
ref: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time. Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.

src: Greenland iku jarang dinggoni. Ing hikayat-hikayat Norse dheweke padha kandha menawa Erik si Abang dibuwang saka Islandia amarga mateni wong, lan nalika lelungan luwih adoh ngulon, nemokake Greenland lan njenengi iku Greenland. Nanging ora preduli kepiye temuane, suku Eskimo wis urip ing kana wektu iku. Sanadyan saben negara kuwi ‘Skandinavia’, akeh banget bedane antarane wong, raja, adat lan sejarah Denmark, Swedia, Norwegia lan Islandia.
mt: Greenland is rarely visited. In the sagas of the Norsemen they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland because he killed people, and when he sailed further north, he found Greenland and named it so. However, it is not known how he came, the Eskimo people had already lived there at that time. Although all these countries are "Scandinavia", there are many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
ref: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time. Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.

src: Sanadyan ameh kabeh masakane kana bakal lumrah kanggo awake dhewehewe, wong Roma pancen duwe sawetara bahan pangan sing aneh utawa ora lumrah kalebu, babi liar, merak, keong, lan sajinis kewan pengerat sing jenenge dormouse. Bedane maneh yaiku minangka wong mlarat lan wong wadon madhang panganane karo lungguh ing kursi, wong lanang sing sugih seneng madhang bareng ing ngendi dheweke padha lungguh leyeh-leyeh nalika madhang panganane. Panganan Romawi Kuna ora bisa nyakup panganan sing teka menyang Eropa saka Amerika utawa Asia ing abad-abad sabanjure. Contone, dheweke kabeh ora duwe jagung, tomat, kenthang, coklat, lan ora ana wong Roma kuno sing tau ngrasakake kalkun.
mt: Although all Romans ate the same basic diet, the rich had some unusual or exotic foods including wild boar, peacock, snails, and dormice.  The difference was that the rich ate in the dining room while the women ate in the bedroom, the men ate together in the dining room while the women lounged on couches while eating theirs.  Roman cuisine could not include foods that came to Europe from the Americas or Asia in later centuries.  For example, they all did not have corn, tomatoes, potatoes, chocolate, and there were no Romans who had ever tasted turkey.
ref: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals. Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries. For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

src: Peradaban minangka adat tunggal sing diduweni dening klompok gedhe wong sing urip lan kerja kanthi sesarengan, yaiku masarakat. Tembung civilization asale saka basa Latin civilis, tegese sipil, hubungane karo basa Latin civis, tegese penduduk, lan civitas, tegese kuta utawa kahanan kutha, kang kepriye carane bisa uga nemtokake ukuran masyarakat. Negara bagean Kutha iku pelopore negara. Budaya peradaban nyiratake pewarisan wawasan lintas generasi, tilas budaya sing awet lan penyebaran sing adil. Kabudayan-kabudayan sing cilik kerep ilang tanpa bukti sejarah sing ana gegayutane lan gagal dikenali minangka peradaban sing samesthine.
mt: Civilization is a shared social and cultural system of large numbers of people, called a society. The word civilization is derived from the Latin civilis, meaning "civic", from civis, meaning "citizen", and civitas, meaning "city, state", which can also help define a society. The city is the core of the state. Civilizations are characterized by the accumulation of knowledge, the preservation of that knowledge across generations, and the equitable distribution of that knowledge. Small civilizations often disappear without a trace and are not recognized as civilizations.
ref: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society. The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society. City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination. Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.

src: Drukgyal Dzong iku benteng sing rusak lan biara Buddha ning ndhuwur Kabupaten Paro (ning Desa Phondey). Dikandhakake menawa ing 1649, Zhabdrug Ngawang Namgyel gawe benteng kanggo mengeti kemenangane nglawan pasukan wong Tibet-Mongol Ing taun 1951, Kobongan nyebabake mung sawetara warisan Drukgyal Dzong isih ana, kaya gambar Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. Sakwise kobongan, bentenge dilestarekake lan dilindhungi, tetep dadi salah siji atraksi Bhutan sing paling narik kawigaten.
mt: Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fort and Buddhist monastery in the Paro district (in the village of Phondey). It is believed to have been built in 1649, Zhabdrug Ngawang Namgyel built the fort to commemorate his victory over the Tibetan-Mongol forces. In 1951, an earthquake caused only a few remnants of Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as a picture of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. After the earthquake, the fort was left in ruins and protected, still one of Bhutan's most popular attractions.
ref: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village). It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.

src: Nalika abad 18 Kamboja manggon ana tengah tanggane sing nduweni kakuwatan gedhe banget, Thailand lan Vietnam. Wong Thailand nyerang Kamboja kaping pirang-pirang ing abad kaping 18 lan ing taun 1772, dheweke ngrusak Phnom Phen. Nalika taun pungkasan abad 18 Vietnam uga njajah Kamboja.
mt: 18th century Cambodia was in the middle of a great power struggle with Thailand and Vietnam. The Thais attacked Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Penh. In the last years of the 18th century Vietnam also invaded Cambodia.
ref: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.

src: Taiwan miwiti ing abad 15 nalika nelayan Eropa liwat banjur njenengi pulo iki Ilha Formosa, utawa pulo sing endah.where Ing 1624, Perusahaan India Timur Belanda mbangun sawijining pangkalan ing kidul kuon Taiwan, sing miwiti transformasi ing sajroning praktik produksi wiji-wijian pribumi lan mburuhke buruh Cina kanggo kerja ing kebon pari lan gula. Nalika taun 1683, bala wangsa Qing (1644-1912) nguwasani dhaerah pesisir kulon lan lor ing Taiwan lan ngumumake Taiwan dadi propinsi Kraton Qing ing taun 1885. Taun 1895, sabubare dikalahke dening Perang Jepang-Sino Kapisan (1894-1895), pemerintah Qing nandhani Kasepakatan Shimonoseki, nalika dheweke menehake kedaulatan Taiwan menyang Jepang, sing mrintah pulo iku nganti 1945.
mt: Taiwan began in the 15th century when European fishermen began calling the island Ilha Formosa, or the beautiful island. In 1624, the Dutch East India Company established a settlement in southern Taiwan, which began transforming the indigenous production practices and hiring Chinese laborers to work in sugar and tea plantations. In 1683, the Qing dynasty (1644-1912) conquered the western and northern coastal areas of Taiwan and declared Taiwan a province of the Qing court in 1885. In 1895, after being defeated in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government ceded Taiwan to Japan under the terms of the Treaty of Shimonoseki, which ruled the island until 1945.
ref: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations. In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

src: Iki diarani pH bahan kimia. Sampeyan bisa nggawe panuduh nggunakake jus kol abang. Jus kubis malih werna gumantung ana ing sepira asem utawa basane (alkalin) senyawa kimiane. Tingkat pH iki ditandhani dening jumlah ion-ion Hidrogen (H ning pH) ning bahan kimia sing diuji. Ion hidrogen minangka proton sing elektrone diuculi (amarga atom hidrogen dumadi saka siji proton lan siji elektron).
mt: This is called pH of a chemical. You can make a purple cabbage juice indicator. Cabbage juice changes color depending on the acidity or alkalinity of the chemical compounds. The pH level is indicated by the number of hydrogen ions (H in pH) in the chemical being tested. Hydrogen ions are positively charged protons (because hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
ref: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice. The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is. The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical. Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).

src: Singa iku kucing kang paling sosial, urip ing klompok gedhe kang diarani pride. Klompok singa iki anggotane siji nganti telu singa diwasa lanang, karo sawetarane telun puluh singa wadon lan dibal. Para singa wadon biasane padha raket hubungane, dadi kulawarga sing gedhe saduluran wadon lan anak wadon. Bombonge singa tumindak kaya sekumpulan srigala utawa segawon, kewan-kewan sing anehe memper singa (nanging dudu kucing gedhe liyane) ing kelakuan, lan uga mematikan kanggo mangsane.
mt: Lions are the most social of cats, living in large groups called prides. A pride of lions consists of one to three adult males, along with up to 20 lionesses and cubs. Lionesses tend to be closely related, so large extended families of females and cubs. Lionesses hunt like a pack of wolves or a pride of hyenas, animals that lions (but not other large cats) resemble in behavior, and also in lethality to prey.
ref: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides. Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs. The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.

src: Sangisore iku luwih ana kucing ukuran sedheng sing mangan buronan ukuran sedheng saka klinci tekan kidang lan kancil. Pungkasane, ana akeh kucing cilik (kalebu kucing ingon) kang mangan mangsa cilik kang luwih akeh kaya serangga, tikus, kadal, lan manuk. Kunci suksese yaiku konsep posisi, gawean kusus sing diduweni saben kucing sing nyegah kucing saka saingan karo liyane.
mt: Later, there are more small cats eating small prey such as rabbits, deer and antelopes. In the end, there are many small cats (including kittens) eating smaller prey such as insects, mice, lizards, and birds. The key to success is the concept of position, specialized work given to each cat that prevents cats from competing with others.
ref: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer. Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds. The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.

src: Ocelot seneng mangan kewan-kewan cilik. Dheweke padha bakal nyekel munyuk, ula, tikus lan manuk yen dheweke padha bisa. Meh kabeh kewan-kewan sing diburu ocelot iku luwih cilik tinimbang awake dhewe. Ilmuwan mikir yen kucing ocelot ngetutke lan uga nemokake kewan kanggo dipangan (mangsane) kanthi ambune, ngamboni panggonane sing ana lemah. Dheweke bisa ndeleng ing peteng karo pandeleng wayah wengi, lan uga bisa obah meneng-meneng. Ocelot mburu mangsa kanthi nyampur wor karo sakcedhake banjur nrajang mangsane.
mt: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will also kill rabbits, snakes, mice and birds if they can. All the animals that an ocelot hunts are smaller than itself. Scientists think that ocelots follow and also find their prey by smelling, sniffing around the ground where the prey is. They can see in the dark with night vision, and also can move silently. Ocelots hunt prey by sniffing around and then pouncing on it.
ref: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is. Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground. They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.

src: Atlet sing pinter banget, macan kuwi bisa munggah (sanadyan ora apik banget), nglangi, mluncat sing adoh lan nggered kanthi kakuwatane limang manungsa. Macan iku ana ing kelompok sing padha (jenis Panthera) kaya singa, macan tutul, lan jaguar. Papat kucing kasebut yaiku siji-sijine sing isa mbaung. Nggero macan ora kaya nggerone singa sing duwe swara pepak, nanging kaya ukara sing nggegirisi lan tembung-tembung njerit.
mt: A very athletic athlete, this cat can climb (although not very well), run, jump far, and leap with the strength of five men. This cat is in a group (genus Panthera) like lions, tigers, and jaguars. The four cats are the only ones that can roar. Lion roars are not like a lion's growl, but like a whispering voice and words that hiss.
ref: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human. The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar. The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.

src: Atlet sing pinter banget, macan kuwi bisa munggah (sanadyan ora apik banget), nglangi, mluncat sing adoh lan nggered kanthi kakuwatane limang manungsa. Macan iku ana ing kelompok sing padha (jenis Panthera) kaya singa, macan tutul, lan jaguar. Papat kucing kasebut yaiku siji-sijine sing isa mbaung. Nggero macan ora kaya nggerone singa sing duwe swara pepak, nanging kaya ukara sing nggegirisi lan tembung-tembung njerit.
mt: A very athletic athlete, this cat can climb (although not very well), run, jump far, and leap with the strength of five men. The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.

src: Sel iku struktur sing paling cilik lan unit fungsional makhluk (barang) organisme. Sel asale saka tembung Latin cella sing tegese kamar cilik. Menawa sampeyan ngulati barang urip sangisore mikroskop, sampeyan bakal ndelok menawa dheweke digawe saka kothak-kothak utawa bal-bal cilik. Robert Hooke, pakar biologi saka Inggris, ndelok kothak-kothak cilik ing gabus nganggo mikroskop. Iku katon kaya kamar-kamar. Dheweke wong pisanan sing ngamatne sel mati.
mt: This is the smallest structural and functional unit of an organism. The word cell comes from the Latin cella meaning small room. When you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made up of boxes or balls. Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small boxes in wood with a microscope. They looked like small rooms. He was the first person to see dead cells.
ref: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism. Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room. If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls. Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope. They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells

src: Kewan digawe saka pirang-pirang sel. Dheweke mangan lan ngluluhake ing njero. Umume kewan bisa obah. Mung kewan sing nduweni utek (sanadyan ora kabeh kewan nduweni utek, ubur-ubur umpamane, ora nduweni utek). Kewan-kewan ditemokake ing saindeging bumi. Iku padha ngedhuk lemah, nglangi ing segara, lan mabur ing langit.
mt: Animals are made up of many cells. They eat and excrete inside. Most animals can move. Only animals with a brain (although not all animals have a brain, such as worms, for example, do not have a brain). Animals are found on land. They walk on the ground, swim in the sea, and fly in the air.
ref: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move. Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains). Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.

src: Tanduran ngasilake oksigen sing diserot manungsa, lan njupuk karbondioksida sing wetokake manungsa (yaiku, ambegan). Wit-witan gawe panganane saka srengenge kanthi fotosintesis. Wit-witan uga menehi eyup. Kita nggawe omah saka tanduran lan nggawe sandhangan saka tanduran. Umume panganan sing dipangan yaiku tanduran. Tanpa tanduran, kewan ora bisa urip.
mt: Plants produce oxygen that humans breathe, and take in carbon dioxide that humans exhale (that is, exhale). Trees make their food from sunlight by photosynthesis. Trees also give shade. We build houses from trees and make clothing from trees. Most of the food we eat is plants. Without plants, animals cannot live.
ref: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out). Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade. We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.

src: Nalika sekelompok cilik makhluk urip (populasi cilik) pisah seka populasi utama ing ngendi asale (kaya yen dheweke padha pindhah ngliwati barisan gunung utawa kali, utawa yen dheweke padha pindhah menyang pulau anyar satemah dheweke padha ora bisa pindhah meneh kanthi gampang) dheweke padha bakal kerep nemokake dheweke padha ing lingkungan sing beda tinimbang ing ngendi dheweke padha sadurunge. Lingkungan anyar iki duweni sumber sing beda lan saingan sing beda, mula populasi sing anyar bakal butuh tampilan beda utawa adaptasi kanggo dadi pesaing sing kuwat tinimbang sing dibutuhake sakdurunge. Kehe dedunung asli ora owah babar pisan, dheweke isih butuh panyocogan sing padha karo sadurunge. Suwe-suwe, nalika populasi anyar wiwit adaptasi marang lingkungan anyare dheweke padha, dheweke padha wiwit ora katon lan ora kaya populasi liyane. Pungkasane, sawise pirang ewu utawa yuta taun, rong populasi bakal katon beda banget lan ora bisa diarani spesies sing padha. Proses iki diarani spesiasi, sing ateges bentuk anyar saka spesies. Spesiasi iki kalebu urutan sing ora bisa diliwati lan bagean sing penting banget kanggo evolusi.
mt: When a small population (a small population) separates from the main population where it originated (such as when it moves through a mountain range or river, or when it moves to a new island, it will not be able to move easily) it will often find itself in a different environment than before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need a different appearance or adaptation to be a stronger competitor than before. The original native habitat does not change much, it still needs the same habitat. Eventually, when the new population begins to adapt to the new environment, they will begin to look and not like other populations. In the end, after thousands or millions of years, two populations will look very different and cannot be called the same species. This process is called speciation, which means a new form of a species. Speciation is an irreversible process and an important part of evolution.
ref: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

src: Bagean awak utama ubenging laku getih yaiku jantung, sing ngompa getih. Geteh lunga saka jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani arteri lan bali menyang jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani vena. Pembuluh kang paling ciliki diarani kapilari.
mt: The main part of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps blood. Blood leaves the heart in arteries and returns to the heart in veins. The smallest blood vessels are called capillaries.
ref: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood. Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.

src: Bagean awak utama ubenging laku getih yaiku jantung, sing ngompa getih. Geteh lunga saka jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani arteri lan bali menyang jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani vena. Pembuluh kang paling ciliki diarani kapilari.
mt: The main part of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps blood. Blood leaves the heart in arteries and returns to the heart in veins. The smallest blood vessels are called capillaries.
ref: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood. Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.

src: Kewan gregemetan kuwi kalebu kewan sing paling dhisik bisa mabur. Kakuwatane kanggo mabur bisa mbantu supaya bisa adoh saka mungsuh kanthi gampang lan golek panganan lan kawin kanthi luwih gampang. Sebagean gedhe serangga suwe kauntungan saka kemampuan nglempit swiwine ing buri bareng awake. Iki menehi dheweke let amba saka macem-macem papan cilik kanggo ndhelik saka para predator. Saiki, serangga sing ora bisa nglempit bali swiwine iku mung tokiyik lan laler tokiyik.
mt: The first flying animal was a bird. The ability to fly gives birds an advantage in finding food and mates easily. A large number of insects have benefited from the ability to fold their wings back against their bodies. This gives them a wide range of small places to hide from predators. Now, insects that cannot fold their wings back are only able to fly and fly.
ref: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently. Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body. This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators. Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.

src: Akeh ahli palaeontologi saiki percaya menawa sekelompok dinosaurus slamet lan urip saiki. Kita sebut iku padha manuk. Akeh ong sing ngarani kewan iki dudu dinosaurus amarga nduwe wulu lan bisa mabur. Nanging isih akeh bagean saka manuk kang katon kaya dinosaurus. Dheweke duwe sikil kanthi sisik lan cakar, dheweke ngendhog, lan mlaku nganggo rong sikil mburi kaya T-Rex.
mt: Many paleontologists now believe that a group of living and breathing dinosaurs still exists. We call them birds. Many people call these animals not dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. But many parts of birds look like dinosaurs. They have scaly legs and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on two legs like T-Rex.
ref: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds. Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur. They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.

src: Untu triceratop bakal bisa kanggo ngremuk ora mung godhong nanging uga pang lan oyot sing atos. Sawetara ilmuwan mikir menawa Triceratops mangan pakis haji, yaiku sejenis tanduran sing lumrah ing kapur. Tanduran-tanduean iki katon kaya wit palem cilik kanthi makutha godhong sing landhep lan lancip. Triceratops bisa nggunakake cucuke sing kuwat kanggo ngilangi godhong sadurunge mangan batang. Ilmuwan liyane mbantah yen tetanduran iki nduweni racun mula ora mungkin yen dinosaurus mangan tetanduran iki, sanadyan jaman saiki kungkang lan kewan liyane kayata manuk beo (turunane dinosaurus) bisa mangan godhong utawa woh-wohan sing nduweni racun.
mt: Triceratops could also crush not only leaves but also branches and twigs. Some scientists think that Triceratops ate ferns, a type of plant common in the chalk. These plants look like small palm trees with sharp, stiff leaves. Triceratops could use its strong beak to remove leaves before eating the stem. Other scientists deny that these plants have poison so it is unlikely that dinosaurs ate these plants, although today birds such as chickens (descendants of dinosaurs) can eat leaves or fruit with poison.
ref: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous. These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves. A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.

src: Bal-balan nasional Italia, bebarengan karo tim bal-balan nasional Jerman iku tim sing paling sukses nomer loro ing donya lan juwarane piala donya FIFA ing 2006. Olahraga sing misuwur kalebu bal-balan, basket, voli, polo-banyu, anggar, rugbi, pit-pitan, hoki es, hoki sepatu rodha lan balapan montor F1. Olahraga mangsa adhem kuwi paling misuwur ana daerah Lor, kanthi anane Italia sing melu lumba internasional lan acara Olimpiade.
mt: Italy's national football team, along with Germany's national football team, is the second most successful team in the world and the holder of the FIFA World Cup in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water polo, fencing, rugby, squash, ice hockey, roller hockey and Formula One racing. Winter sports are most popular in the North, with Italy competing in international competitions and Olympic events.
ref: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing. Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.

src: Luksemburg duwe sejarah dawa nanging tanggal kamardikane saka 1839. Bagian Belgium saiki iku bagian saka Luksemburg ing jaman biyen nanging dadi Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luksemburg mesthi nyoba supaya tetep dadi negara sing netral nanging negara iki dipanggoni dening Jerman nalika Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing taun 1957, Luksemburg dadi anggota pangadeg organisasi sing saiki dikenal minangka Uni Eropa.
mt: Luxembourg has a long history but its date of independence is 1839. The Belgian part of the country in the past is now part of Luxembourg but became Belgium after the Belgian Revolution of the 1830s. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but was occupied by Germany during World War I and World War II. In 1957, Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization that is now known as the European Union.
ref: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.

src: Luksemburg duwe sejarah dawa nanging tanggal kamardikane saka 1839. Bagian Belgium saiki iku bagian saka Luksemburg ing jaman biyen nanging dadi Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luksemburg mesthi nyoba supaya tetep dadi negara sing netral nanging negara iki dipanggoni dening Jerman nalika Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing taun 1957, Luksemburg dadi anggota pangadeg organisasi sing saiki dikenal minangka Uni Eropa.
mt: Luxembourg has a long history but its date of independence is 1839. The Belgian part of the country in the past is now part of Luxembourg but became Belgium after the Belgian Revolution of the 1830s. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but was occupied by Germany during World War I and World War II. In 1957, Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization that is now known as the European Union.
ref: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.

src: Turki Eropa (Jalur sisih wetan Rumelia ning semenanjung Balkan) kalebu 3% negara. Wilayah Turki kuwi luwih dawa saka 1.600 kilometer (1,000 mi) lan ambane 800 km (500 mil), kanthi wujut kira-kira persagi. Wilayah Turki, kalebu wadhuk, manggoni 783,562 kilometer persegi (300,948 mil persegi), ing ngendi 755,688 kilometer persegi (291,773 mil persegi) ana ing Asia Barat Dhaya lan 23,764 kilometer persegi (9,174 mil persegi) ing Eropa. Wilayah TUrki marakake iku negara paling amba kaping 37 ing donya, lan kira-kira ukurane padha kaya Prancis Metropolitn lan Inggris menawa digabung. Turki iku diubengi dening segara saka telung sisih: Segara Aegan ing kulon, Segara Ireng ing lor lan Segara Mediterania ing kidul.
mt: Europe (Eastern Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the countries. The area of Turkey is longer than 1,600 kilometers (1,000 mi) and wide 800 km (500 miles), with an area of about square. The area of Turkey, including lakes, located 783,562 square kilometers (300,948 square miles), of which 755,688 square kilometers (291,773 square miles) is in Western Asia and 23,764 square kilometers (9,174 square miles) in Europe. The area of Turkey is the largest country in the world, and about the size of France Metropolitan and England when combined. Turkey is surrounded by the sea from three sides: the Aegean Sea in the west, the Black Sea in the north and the Mediterranean Sea in the south.
ref: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

src: Populasi Kutha Vatikan watara 800. Iku negara mardika paling cilik ing donya lan negara kanthi pendhudhuk paling sethithik. Vatican City nggunakake basa Italia ing undhang-undhang lan komunikasi dhines. Basa Italia kuwi uga basa sing digunakake deing wong akeh sing nyambut gawe ning daerah iki lan basa Latin kuwi asring digunakake kanggo upacara keagamaan. Kabeh masarakat sing manggon ana ning Kutha Vatican iku Katolik Roma.
mt: The population of Vatican City is about 800. It is the smallest independent state in the world and the state with the smallest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its laws and communications. Italian is also the language used by many of the people who work there and Latin is often used for religious ceremonies. All the inhabitants of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
ref: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies. All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.

src: Komputer saiki dienggo ngowahi poto lan video. Animasi canggih bisa digawe ing komputer, lan animasi kaya iki saya akeh digunakake ing televisi lan film. Musik asring kacathet nggunakake komputer sing modheren kanggo ngolah lan nyampur swara.
mt: Computers are now used to alter photographs and video. Sophisticated animation can be created on computers, and this type of animation is often used in television and film. Music is often recorded using modern computers to process and mix sounds.
ref: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.

src: Kutha Harappa lan Mohenjo-daro duwe jamban sing rata ana ing meh saben omah, sing disambung karo tata cara pambuwangan sampah sing modheren. Sisa sistem- sistem pembuangan limbah ditemokake ing omah-omah ing kutha-kutha Minoan ing Kreta lan Santorini ing Yunani. Toilet uga ana ing Mesir, Persia, lan Tiongkok kuno. Ing peradaban Roma, toilet kala-kala dadi bagean saka omah padusan umum ing endi wong lanang lan wadon campur bareng-bareng.
mt: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had flush toilets in almost every house, connected to a sewage system. The remains of sewage systems were found in the houses of the Minoan cities in Crete and Santorini in Greece. Toilets were also found in Egypt, Persia, and ancient China. In the Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bathhouses where men and women mingled.
ref: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

src: Wilahan ing sepatu es modheren duwe rong pucukan cekung growong ing antarane. Kaloro pucuk kasebut bisa gawe luwih nggegem es luwih kuwat, sanajan dimiringake. Amarga ngisore pangot kuwi rada mlengkung, nalika pangot kuwi miring marang salah sawijine iringan utawa sisih liyane, pucuke sing nemplek karo es kuwi uga mlengkung. Iki nyebabake skater muter. Yen skate miring nganan, skater dadi menggok nengen, yen skate miring ngiwa, skater dadi menggok ngiwa.
mt: The  grooves in the soles of the modheren skates have three concave indentations between them. Both of these indentations cause the skates to turn more sharply, although they are angled differently. Because the back of the skate is slightly concave, when the skate is angled to the right or left, the indentations also curve. This causes the skater to turn. If the skate is angled to the right, the skater turns to the right, if the skate is angled to the left, the skater turns to the left.
ref: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

src: Kanggo bali menyang tingkat tenagane sing sakdurunge, dhweke kudu nyingkirake tenaga tambahan sing dheweke oleh saka sorotan. Dheweke nglakokake iki kanthi ngetokne partikel cahya cilik kang diarani “foton”. Para ilmuan ngarani proses iki “stimulasi pancaran radiasi” amarga atom-atome dirangsang dening cahya terang, nyebabake pancaran foton cahya, lan cahya iku sawijining jenis radiasi. Gambar sabanjure nuduhake atom sing ngucurake foton. Samesthine, ing kasunyatan foton iku luwih cilik tinimbang sing ana ing gambar. Foton malah luwih cilik tinimbang barang sing nggaweni atom!
mt: To return to its previous energy level, the atom must emit an extra energy particle called a “photon”. Scientists call this process “stimulated emission of radiation” because atoms are stimulated by light, causing the emission of photons, which is a type of radiation. The following picture shows an atom emitting a photon. In reality, the photon is smaller than what is shown in the picture. The photon is even smaller than the atom!
ref: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"

src: Sakwise murup atusan jam filamen ing bohlam akhire kebakar lan bohlame ora bisa murup maneh. Bohlam lampu banjur butuh diganti. Perlu ngati-ati kanggo ngganti bohlam lampune. Kang sepisan, saklar kanggo lampu kudu dipateni utawa kabele dicopot. Iki amarga listrik sing mili menyang colokan sing ana bohlam logam sing bisa nyetrum sampeyan yen sampeyan demek njerone colokan listrik utawa logam sing ana ning lampu nalika separone isih ana ning njero colokan.
mt: If the last filament in the light bulb burns out and the light bulb cannot be replaced. The light bulb lamp then needs to be replaced. Be careful when replacing the light bulb lamp. First, the switch for the light bulb must be turned off or the electrical plug disconnected. This is because the electricity flowing to the electrical plug with the metal light bulb can shock you if you touch the electrical plug or metal in the light bulb while the electricity is still flowing through the electrical plug.
ref: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.

src: Bom fisi murup saka prinsip menawa dibutuhake energi kanggo nggabungake nukleus sing akeh proton lan neutrone. Mirip kaya ngglindhingke siji grobak abot munggah bukit. Misahke nukleus meneh banjur ngeculake saperangan energi iku. Saperangan atom duwe inti sing ora stabil sing tegese menawa atom-atom iku cenderung pecah kanthi sethithik utawa tanpa dhorongan.
mt: Fusion bombs work on the principle that energy is required to fuse together many protons and neutrons in a nucleus. Like lifting a heavy rock up a hill. Separate the nuclei and then release some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable cores which means that those atoms tend to break apart with or without prompting.
ref: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

src: Nalika sampeyan nyelukake wong sing adohe ewunan mil, sampeyan nggunakake satelit. Satelite iku ing angkasa entuk panggilan lan banjur mantulake iki meneh medhun, meh kanthi enggal. Satelit dikirim menyang antariksa nganggo roket. Para ilmuwan gunakake teleskop ing antariksa amarga atmosfir Bumi mbelokke sawetara sorot lan pandelenge awake dhewe. Dibutuhke roket sing gedhe banget sing dhuwure 100 feet kanggo ngunggahke satelit utawa teleskop menyang langit.
mt: When you look at a person who is a million miles away, you use a satellite. The satellite is in space, receives a call and then drops this message down to earth, more or less instantly. Satellites are sent into space with rockets. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth's atmosphere bends some rays and blurs their vision. It takes a very large rocket, 100 feet high, to launch a satellite or telescope into space.
ref: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.

src: Wektu iku sawijing perkara kang ana sakubunge awake dhewe, lan ngaruh menyang apa wae sing awake dhewe lakoni, nanging uga angel dimangerteni. Wektu wis disinau dening para sarjana agama, filsafat, lan ilmiah saka ewunan taun. Awake dhewe ngalami wektu minangka rentetan kadadean liwat saka mbesuk ngliwati saiki lan kala wingi. Wektu iku uga kepiye kita mbandhingake jangka wektu(suwene) kedadean. Sampeyan bisa nengeri dhewe lakune wektu kanthi ngulati pengulangan acara rutin. Acara rutin iku perkara sing kasadean maneh lan maneh kanthi teratur.
mt: This is a matter of personal experience, and affects whatever you are doing, but is also understood. It has been known to religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. You experience time as a sequence of events from waking to now and to the future. Time is also how we measure the duration of events. You can experience time by watching the repetition of a routine event. A routine event is something that happens over and over again in a regular manner.
ref: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: Tradisine, pewaris tahta bakal langsung mlebu militer sakwise rampung sekolah. Nanging, Charles sekolah menyang kampus Trinity, Cambridge panggone dheweke sinau Antropologi lan Arkeologi, lan sabanjure Sejarah, ngasilake 2:2 (tingkat kelas kaping loro sing luwih cendhek). Charles minangka anggota kapisan Kulawarga Krajan Inggris sing oleh gelar sarjana.
mt: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would immediately enter the military upon finishing school. However, Charles attended Trinity College, Cambridge, where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a second class degree, lower division). Charles is the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a university degree.
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

Charles is the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a university degree.
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: Inggris ngalami bedhamen sing dawa sawise panjajahan Danelaw maneh. Nanging ing 991 Ethelred diadepake karo armada kapal Viking sing luwih gedhe saka apa wae awit duweke Guthrum seabad sakdurunge. Armada iki dipimpin dening Olaf Trygvasson, wong Norwegia kanthi ambisi kanggo ngrebut balik negarane saka dominasi Denmark. Sawise kemunduran militer awal, Ethelred bisa sarujuk kanggo hubungan karo Olaf, sing sapa balik menyang Norwegia kanggo njajal antuk krajan duweke dheweke kanthi kesuksesan campuran.
mt: 991 saw the end of the second Danish occupation of England. However, in 991 Ethelred was faced with a larger Viking fleet than ever before, under the command of Guthrum, who had ruled England a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to retake his country from Danish domination. After an initial military setback, Ethelred was able to negotiate with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to establish his own kingdom with mixed success.
ref: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

src: "Watara abad kaping 15 masehi, Estonia sisih lor iku sajroning pangaribawa budaya Jerman sing gedhe. Sawetara rahib Jerman pengin nyedhakake Pangerane karo para pribumi, mula bisa nemokake basa Estonia sing sejatine. Iki adhedhasar abjad Jerman lan siji karakter ""Õ/õ"" ditambahake. Seiring wektu kliwat, akeh tembung-tembung sing disilih saka Jerman gabung. Iki wiwitane saka pencerahan."
mt: "Between the 15th and 16th centuries, Estonia's northern region was under the heavy influence of German culture. Some German monks wanted to convert the prince and the natives, so they could find the true Estonian language. This was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. Over time, many words borrowed from German were incorporated. This began with the Reformation."
ref: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."

src: Ana werna-werna perkiraan sepira akehe wong-wong ngomong Hindi. Iki kira-kira antarane basa kaping pindho lan kaping papat sing paling umum dipocapake ing donya. Gunggung pamicara asli beda-beda gumantung saka tetembungan sing gegandhengan banget sing diitung. Kira-kira ana 340 yuta nganti 500 yuta manungsa sing nggunakake basa iki, 800 yuta manungsa mudheng basa iki. Basa Hindi lan Urdu kuwi suku ukarane persis nanging tulisane beda, ana omongan saben dina, wong sing omongan nganggo basa-basa kuwi bakal padha-padha mangerteni.
mt: There are several estimates as to how many people speak Hindi. It is the second or fourth most widely spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on the definition used. There are between 340 and 500 million people who speak this language, 800 million people speak a language closely related to it. Hindi and Urdu are the same language, but written differently, there is a different word every day, people who speak this language will understand each other.
ref: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

src: Hangeul minangka sawijine abjad sing sengaja dicipta kanggo panggunaan umum saben dina. Abjad dicipta ing taun 1444 nalika pamrentahane Raja Sejong (1418 - 1450). Raja Sejong minangka raja kaping papat ing Wangsa Joseon lan minangka salah sawijining sing paling diurmati. Dheweke asale ngarani aksara Hangeul minangka Hunmin Jeongum, kang tegese “swara kang bener kanggo pengajarane wong-wong”.
mt: Hangul is one of the world's few deliberately created writing systems used daily. The alphabet was created in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 - 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon dynasty and one of the most revered. He named the Hangul alphabet Hunmin Jeongum, meaning "correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

src: Ana akeh teori sing nyatakake kepiye basa Sanskerta iso ana. Salah sawijine yaiku kaum Aryan sing ngalih saka kulon menyang India lan nggawa basane. Basa sansekerta minangka basa kuna lan bisa dibandhingake karo basa Latin sing digunakake ing Eropa. Layang sing paling dhisik diweruhi ing donya ditulis ing Sansekerta. Sawise Upanoshads diklumpukake, Sansekerta saya ilang amarga hirarki. Basa sansekrerta minangka basa sing ruwet lan aji, sing wis dadi sumber kanggo pirang-pirang basa India modheren, kaya basa Latin minangka sumber kanggo basa Eropa kayata Prancis lan Spanyol.
mt: There are many theories on how Sanskrit came to be. One of them is that the Aryans migrated from the west to India and brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and can be compared to Latin which was used in Europe. The oldest known writing in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the Upanoshads were compiled, Sanskrit began to fade away because of its hierarchy. Sanskrit is a complex and difficult language, which has been the source for many modern Indian languages, just as Latin was the source for European languages such as French and Spanish.
ref: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

src: Kepiye gravitasi Io bakal narik kula? Yen sampeyan ngadeg ing permukaan Io, sampeyan bakal kelangan aboting awak tinimbang yen sampeyan ing Bumi. Wong sing bobote 200 kilogram (90kg) ing Bumi bakal nduwe bobot udakara 36 kilogram (16kg) ing Io. Dadi gravitasi mesthine ora narik sampeyan.
mt: Will Io's gravity pull you over? If you stood on Io's surface, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person weighing 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So Io's gravity won't pull you over.
ref: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: Lumahing Rembulan digawe saka watu lan bledug. Lapisan njaba Rembulan diarani kerak. Kerak kasebut kandele kira-kira 70 km ing sisih cedhak lan kandele 100 km ing sisih adoh. Luwih tipis ing sangisore maria lan luwih kandel ing sangisore pagunungan. Bisa uga ana maria luwih akeh ing sisihe amarga kerake luwih tipis. Luwih gampang kanggo lava kanggo munggah menyang permukaan.
mt: The Moon's crust is made of rock and soil. The outer crust is called regolith. Regolith is thought to be about 70 km thick near the maria and 100 km thick near the highlands. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the side with the thinner crust. It is easier for lava to rise to the surface.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: Akeh wong ngimpi nalika manungsa bisa lelungan menyang bintang liyane lan njelajah ing jagad liyane, sawetara wong takon-takon menawa ing njaba kana sing percaya yen makluk asing utawa kauripan liya bisa urip ing planet liya. Nanging, yen iki nate dumadi mungkin ora bakal dumadi kanggo wektu sing suwe. Lintang-lintang sumebar temenan iku ana triliunan mil antarane bintang sing iku “tanggane”. Mungkin sawijining dina, putu buyut sampeyan bakal ngadeg ing pucuking donya asing penasaran babagan leluhur kunane?
mt: Many people dream of one day traveling to other stars and exploring other worlds, some wonder if aliens or other life exists on other planets. But if this ever happens, it will not be for a long time. The nearest stars are trillions of miles away. Maybe one day, your great-grandchild will stand on the top of an alien world wondering about your ancestors?
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: Srengengene ora duwe kerak kaya Bumi sing sampeyan isa jumenengi. Kabeh Srengenge kagawe saka gas, geni lan plasma. Gas dadi tipis nalika sampeyan lunga ngadoh saka pusat srengenge. Bageyan paling njaba nalika kita ndeleng Srengenge kuwi diarani potosper, sing tegese “bal cahya”.
mt: The Sun does not have a solid crust like Earth's. All of the Sun is made of gas, plasma, and fire. The gas becomes thin as you move away from the Sun's center. The outermost part of the Sun that we see is called the photosphere, which means "light sphere".
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: Kira-kira telung ewu taun ing buri, ing 1610, astronomer Italia Galileo Galilei nggunakake teleskop kanggo ngulati minangka Venus duwe fase, kaya dene rembulan uga duwe. Mangsa iki kadadeyan amanarga mung sisihe Venus (utawa Bulan) sing ngadhep srengenge sing kena cahyane. Mangsane Venus iki ndhukung teori Kopernikus yen planet-planet kuwi ngubengi Srengenge. Banjur, sawetara taun sabanjure ing 1639, sawijining ahli falak Inggris sing jenenge Jeremiah Horrocks mirsani transisi Venus.
mt: About four hundred years ago, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus had phases, like the Moon. At the time, only the side of Venus (or the Moon) facing the Sun was illuminated. This supported the Copernican theory that the planets revolve around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: Kali Amazon minangka kali nomer loro paling dawa lan sing paling gedhe ing donya. Bisa nggawa banyu luwih saka kaping 8 tinimbang kali sing gedhe nomer loro. Amazon uga kali paling gedhe ing Jagad, kanthi duwe jembar enem mil. Akehe 20 persen saka banyu sing mili metu saka kali-kali planet menyang segara-segara asale saka Amazon. Kali Amazon sing utama iku 6.387 km (3.980 mil). Iku nglumpukake banyu saka ewonan kali kang luwih cilik.
mt: The Amazon River is the second longest and largest river in the world. It can carry more than eight times the water of the second largest river. Amazon is also the largest river in the world, with an area of six million square miles. It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers. The main Amazon River is 3,980 miles (6,387 km). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: Wolung puluh persen wong Venezuela nganggur, lan umume sing nyambut gawe ing ekonomi ora resmi. Rong prelu saka wong Venezuela sing kerja ing bidhang jasa, meh saprapat sing kerja ing pabrik lan kalima ing tetanen. industri sing paling penting ana ning Venezuela yaiku minyak, yaiku negara sing dodol, sanadyan mung sak persen sing makarya ana industri minyak iki.
mt: 20% of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who work in the economy are in the informal sector. Two-thirds of Venezuelans who work in services, half in manufacturing and five in agriculture. The most important industry in Venezuela is oil, a state monopoly, although only one percent of the workforce is in the oil industry.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: Lintang nggambarake cahya lan panas amarga tenaga sing diasilake nalika atom hidrogen nggabung (utawa dadi siji) kanggo nggawe unsur sing luwih abot. Ilmuwan ngupaya nggawe reaktor sing bisa ngasilake tenaga kanthi cara sing padha. Iki, sanajan kepiye, iku perkara sing angel banget kanggo dipecahke lan bakal mbutuhake akeh taun sadurunge kita weruh reaktor peleburan sing migunani dibangun.
mt: The image shows light and heat produced as hydrogen atoms fuse (or become one) to form a heavier element. Scientists are trying to build a reactor that can produce energy in the same way. This, however, is a very big question to be answered and will take many years before we see a fusion reactor built for use.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: Unsur lan senyawa bisa pindah saka kahanan siji menyang liyane lan ora ewah. Nitrogen minangka gas isih nduweni sipat sing padha karo nitrogen encer. Kahanan encer luwih ringkes nanging molekul isih padha. Banyu iku tuladha liyane. Senyawa banyu kasusun saka loro atom hidrogen lan siji atom oksigen. Struktur molekule kuwi tetep padha sanadyan wujute gas, cair, utawa padhet. Sanadyan wujude bakal malih, nanging wujud kimiane bakal tetep padha.
mt: Substances and compounds can change from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The gaseous state is less dense but the molecules are the same. Water is another example. The water molecule is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. The molecular structure is the same whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although the form will change, the chemical form will remain the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: Nalika Perang Revolusi, telu welas negara bagean pisanan mbentuk pamrentah pusat sing ringkih—kanthi Kongrese dadi siji-sijine komponen—sangisore Artikel Konfederasi. Kongres ora duwe kekuatan kanggo mbebani pajek, lan, amarga ora ana pelaksana utawa peradilan nasional, ngendelake pamarentah negara, sing kerep ora kooperatif, kanggo ngleksanakake kabeh tindakane. Iki uga ora nduweni wewenang kanggo ngundhakke aturan pajek lan rega antarane negara bageyan. Kabeh anggota negara kuwi kudu sepakat marang Artikel kuwi sadurunge bisa diamandemen lan anggota negara liyane iki nganggep entheng pamerintah sing ana punjer amarga wakile asring banget ora mlebu.
mt: During the Revolution, three and a half states first formed a central government—under Congress as the sole component—under the Confederation Articles. Congress lacked the power to levy taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it was unable to enforce the actions of the often uncooperative states. It also lacked the power to set tax and trade rates between the states. All members of the Confederation had to agree to the Articles before they could be amended, and the states often balked at the central government's authority because its delegates were frequently absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: Yen sampeyan wis nonton film Bandha Nasional, sampeyan bisa uga mikir peta bandha ditulis ing mburi Pranyatan Kamardikan. Nanging, iku ora bener. Sanadyan ana sing ditulis ing buri layang, iku dudu peta harta karun. Ditulis ana mburine Deklarasi Kamardikan yaiku ukara “Deklasrasi Kamardikan Asli tanggal 4 Juli 1776”. Tulisan kuwi njedhul ana ning ngisor dokumen kanthi kwalik. Sanadyan ora ana sing mangerteni kanthi pesthi sapa sing nulis, nanging dimangerteni nalika wiwitane uripe, dokumen perkamen gedhe ( ukurane 29¾ inchi ping 24½ inchi) digulung kanggo disimpen. Mula, kamungkinane gedhe menawa cathetane ditambahake mung kanggo label.
mt: If you have seen the movie National Treasure, you may think the map to the treasure was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. But that is not true. Although there is writing on the back of the document, it is not a map. It is the original 1776 Declaration of Independence. The writing is a transcription of the document with the proper spelling. Although no one knows who wrote it, it is known that the large parchment (29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is possible that the transcription was added only for labeling.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Ing wiwitan kamardikan bangsa, bangkat Botanic Gardens Singapura mbantu ngowah pulau dadi KuthaTaman tropis. Ing taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hibrida anggrek, dipilih dadi kembang nasional bangsa.
mt: At the start of independence, the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped transform the island into a tropical garden city. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was chosen as the national flower of the country.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Ing wiwitan kamardikan bangsa, bangkat Botanic Gardens Singapura mbantu ngowah pulau dadi KuthaTaman tropis. Ing taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hibrida anggrek, dipilih dadi kembang nasional bangsa.
mt: At the start of independence, the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped transform the island into a tropical garden city. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was chosen as the national flower of the country.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Sanadyan mbangun piramid nggunakake watu terus dilakoni nganti pungkasane Kraton Lawas, Piramid Giza ora tau ngliwati ukuran lan kepinteran cara mbangune. Krajan Anyar Mesir kuno nggumun marang monumen-monumen leluhure, sing nalika iku tetep apik luwih seka sewu taun.
mt: Although building pyramids with stone was continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the Great Pyramid of Giza never surpassed the size and skill of construction of the earlier pyramids. The New Kingdom of ancient Egypt boasted of its monuments to the ancient ones, which at the time were still better than a thousand years.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Saben taun udakara wulan Oktober, meh 1,5 yuta herbivora ngumbara menyang dataran kidul, nyabrang Kali Mara, saka bukit sisih lor nganti udan. Banjur bali ngalor saka kulon, pisan engkas ngliwati kali Mara, sakwise udan ing April. Daerah Serengeti kalebu Taman Nasional Serengeti, Daerah Lindhung Ngorongoro lan Cadhangan Nasional Maasai Mara ning Kenya.
mt: Every year in October, about 1.5 million herbivores migrate to the south, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills to the plains. Then back north, narrowly crossing the Mara River, after the rains in April. The Serengeti area includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: "Kanthi rampunge perang marang Perancis, Jerman wiwit siap nglurug pulau Inggris. Jerman nyebut serangan ""Operasi Sealion"". Umume gegaman lan tandhon pangan Wadyabala Inggris wis ilang nalika ngungsi saka Dunkirk, saéngga wadyabala saya ringkih. Nanging Angkatan Laut Kerajaan isih luwih kuwat saka Angkatan Laut Jerman (“Kriegsmarine”) lan bisa wae ngremukake armada laut invasi ngendi wae sing dikirim liwat Selat Inggris. Nanging, sithik banget pra-prau Royal Navy iku manggon ana ning jalur sing cedhak panggon serangan amarga laksamana kuwi wedi yen prau kuwi bakal ndelep dening serangan udara kaya saka pasukan Jerman."
mt: "With the war against France over, Germany is ready to launch an attack on the British Isles. Germany calls the attack "Operation Sealion". Most of the British Army's equipment and supplies were lost when they evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army is now weaker. However, the Royal Navy is still stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and could easily sink the invasion fleet wherever it is sent through the English Channel. However, there are very few Royal Navy ships in the path of the attack because the admiral said that the ships would be attacked by German air forces like the German army."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Ayo diwiwiti saka penjelasan babagan rencanane Italia. Italia iku dhasare “adik lanang” saka Jerman lan Jepang. Iki duwe pasukan dharat sing luwih ringkih lan pasukan laut sing luwih ringkih, sanadyan dheweke lagi wae mbangun kapal anyar papat pas sadurunge wiwitane perang. Tujuan utamane Itali yaiku negara-negara ning Afrika. Kanggo nangkep negara-negara kasebut, Itali kudu nduweni landesan kanggo ngkuncurke prajurit, supaya para prajurit bisa nyebrang Laut Mediterania banjur nyerang Afrika. Kanggo iku, dheweke padha kudu nyingkirake pangkalan lan kapal Inggris ing Mesir. Saliyane tumindak iku kabeh, kapal perang Italia ora kudune nindakake apa-apa liyane. Saiki kanggo Jepang. Jepang iku negara kapuloan, padha kaya Inggris.
mt: Let's start with the explanation of its plans Italy. Italy is the "younger brother" of Germany and Japan. It has a land army that is more powerful and a navy that is more powerful, although it was still building new ships before the war began. Its main goal is the countries in Africa. To capture these countries, Italy must have bases to deploy troops, so that the troops can cross the Mediterranean Sea and attack Africa. For this, it must remove the British bases and ships in Egypt. Apart from this action, all Italian ships did nothing else. Now for Japan. Japan is an island nation, just like England.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Pendharatan D.Day lan pertempuran sateruse wis mbebasake Perancis lor, nanging sisih kidul durung bebas. Iki dipimpin dening Perancis ""Vichy"". Dheweke yaiku wong Perancis sing nggawe bedhamen karo Jerman ing taun 1940 lan kerja kanggo penjajah tinimbang nglawan dheweke. Ing 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu nglurug Perancis kidul, lurugan diarani “OPerasi Dragoon”. Mung sajrone rong minggu, wadyabala Amerika lan Prancis Mardika kaleksanan mbebasake Prancis sisih kidul lan nuli bali menyang Jerman."
mt: "D-Day and the subsequent battle has freed northern France, but the south is still not free. This is led by the French ""Vichy"". They are the French who made peace with the Germans in 1940 and work for the occupiers rather than against them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, an operation called “Operation Dragoon”. Only two weeks, American and French Free forces liberated southern France and then returned to Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."
