src: Kapal selam yaiku kapal sing digawe kanggo lelungan ing jero banyu lan tetep ing kana kanggo sawetara wektu sing luwih dawa. Kapal silem digunakake ing Perang Donya I lan Perang Dunia II. Nalika semono alon-alon banget lan adohe let nembak sing winates. Nalika wiwitane perang biyasane dheweke plesir menyang pucuke segara, nanging nalika radar wis thukul lan saya luwih pener kapal selam kuwi dipeksa supaya mlebu menyang ngisor banyu supaya ora katon. Kapal selam Jerman kuwi diarani kapal-U. Wong-wong Jerman biyen dikenal pinter banget ngarahke lan nglakokake kapal selame. Amarga kasil karo kapal selam, sabubare perang Jerman ora dipercaya nyekel kapal selam.
mt: A submarine is a ship designed to travel underwater. They were used extensively in World War I and World War II. They are very hard to detect and can fire torpedoes. In the beginning of the war they were used to explore the depths of the ocean, but when radar was invented they were forced to go under water so they could not be seen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were known for their skill in building and operating submarines. Because of the success of submarines, Germany was not trusted to keep submarines.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Tanggal 17 September, 1939, pertahanan Polandia wis rusak, lan siji-sijine pangajab yaiku kanggo mundur lan ngatur balik ing sadawane pangkalan jembatan Rumania. Nanging, rancangan iki digawe mau wengi, nalika ana luwih saka 800,000 prajurit saka Prajurit Abang Serikat Soviet mlebu lan nyiptakke prajurit Belarusia lan Ukrania sabubare nyerang wilayah sisih wetan Polandia kanthi ganas saka Perjanjian Damai Riga, Pakta Tanpa-Agresi Soviet-Polandia, lan perjanjian internasional liyane, kabeh bilateral an multilateral.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defenses were broken, and the only option was to retreat and organize a return across the Romanian bridgehead. However, this plan was made too late, as more than 800,000 soldiers of the Red Army entered and created the Belarusian and Ukrainian troops after attacking the eastern Polish territories with brutal force from the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other bilateral and multilateral agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Tanggal 17 September, 1939, pertahanan Polandia wis rusak, lan siji-sijine pangajab yaiku kanggo mundur lan ngatur balik ing sadawane pangkalan jembatan Rumania. Nanging, rancangan iki digawe mau wengi, nalika ana luwih saka 800,000 prajurit saka Prajurit Abang Serikat Soviet mlebu lan nyiptakke prajurit Belarusia lan Ukrania sabubare nyerang wilayah sisih wetan Polandia kanthi ganas saka Perjanjian Damai Riga, Pakta Tanpa-Agresi Soviet-Polandia, lan perjanjian internasional liyane, kabeh bilateral an multilateral.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defenses were broken, and the only option was to retreat and organize a return across the Romanian bridgehead. However, this plan was made too late, as more than 800,000 soldiers of the Red Army entered and created the Belarusian and Ukrainian troops after attacking the eastern Polish territories with brutal force from the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other bilateral and multilateral agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Sakabehe ora mlaku kanthi becik kanggo wong Italia ing Afrika Lor meh wiwit saka dhisik. Sajrone seminggu sawise nyatakake perang ing Itali tanggal 10 Juni 1940, Prajurit Inggris kaping 11 wis ngrebut Benteng Capuzzo ing Libya. Nalika diserang ana sisih wetan Bardia, Inggris nangkep Insinyur-Pimpinan Prajurit Italia Kasepuluh, Jenderal Lastucci. Tanggal 28 Juni, Marshal Italo Balbo, Jendral-Gubernur Libia lan pewaris nyata Mussolini, dipateni dening bedhil nalika mandheg ana ing Tobruk.
mt: It has not gone well for the Italians in North Africa since then. Within a week of declaring war on Italy on June 10, 1940, British troops captured Capuzzo Fort in Libya. When Bardia was attacked on the eastern side, the British captured the Italian Tenth Engineer-Battalion Commander, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and Mussolini's heir apparent, was killed by a stray bullet while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Agama Budha Tibet iku adhedhasar ajaran Budha, nanging ngrembaka dening jalur tresna mahayana lan dening sakehing cara saka Yoga India. Prinsipe ajaran Budha wong Tibet kuwi sederhana banget. Ajaran iki kaleu Kundalini Yoga, meditasi lan dalan kanggo ngrangkul kabeh rasa tresna. Kanthi Kundalini Yoga, tenaga Kundalini (tenaga pancrahan) wungu liwat pawakan yoga, panglantih napas, mantra lan bayangan. Pusat semedi Tibet yaiku Dewa Yoga. Liwat visualisasi macem-macem dewa, susukan tenaga diresiki, chakra diuripake lan kesadaran pancrahan digawe.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but developed along the Mahayana path and by incorporating elements of Indian Yoga. The principles of Tibetan Buddhist teachings are very simple. This teaching includes Kundalini Yoga, meditation and ways to embrace all kinds of love. With Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini energy (liberating energy) is passed through the yoga body, breathing exercises, mantras and images. The center of Tibetan meditation is Yoga of the Gods. Through visualization of various gods, the energy is refined, the chakras are awakened and the liberating consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Acarane diwiwiti ing 20.30 wanci lokal (15.00 UTC). Sindhen kang misuwur ing saindenging negara ngaturake bhajans, utawa lagu-lagu bakti, ing sikil Shri Shyam. Penyanyi Sanju Sharma miwiti wengi kasebut, ditutne dening Jai Shankar Choudhary uga nggawakake chhappan bhog bhajan. Penyanyi, Raju Khandelwal ndampingi dheweke. Banjur, Lakkha Singh mimpin nyanyi bhajan. 108 piring-piringe Chhappan Bhog (ing ajaran Hindu, 56 barang sing bisa dipangan, kayata, permen, woh-wohan, kacang, panganan etc. sing dienggo sajen kanggo dewa) disuguhke menyang Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh uga nyawisake chhappan bhog bhajan. Sindhen, Raju Khandelwal ngancani dheweke.
mt: 20.30 local time (15.00 UTC) the ceremony began. Famous in the country, bhajans, or devotional songs, in the feet of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma began the night, accompanied by Jai Shankar Choudhary also chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer, Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then, Lakkha Singh led the bhajan. 108 chhappan Bhog (in Hindu teachings, 56 edible items, such as candy, fruit, nuts, food etc. offered to the gods) was offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also sang chhappan bhog bhajan. Then, Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Perayaane diwiwiti nganggo pagelaran kusus saka kelompok sing misuwur ing donya Cirque du Soleil. Iki uga diiringi karo Orkestra Simponi Kutha Istanbul, band Janissary, lan penyanyi Fatih Erkoç lan Müslüm Gürses. Banjur Whirling Dervishes banjur munggah ing panggung. Diva Turki Sezen Aksu tampil karo tenor Italia Alessandro Safina lan penyanyi Yunani Haris Alexiou. Kanggo panutup, kelompok tari Turki Geni Anatolia nampilake pagelaran “Troy”.
mt: The celebrations began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the Istanbul Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. The Whirling Dervishes then took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. For the finale, the Turkish dance group Geni Anatolia performed a show called “Troy”.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Panumpang diwenehi banyu nalika padha ngenteni ing suhu panas 90(F). Kapten pemadam kebakaran Scott Kouns kandha, “Iku dina kang panas ing Santa Clara kanthi suhu 90-an. Kajebak suwe ing roller coaster bakal ora kepenak, ujare paling ora, lan butuh paling ora sak jam kanggo entuk wong kapisan saka laku kasebut."""
mt: "Passengers were given water while waiting in the 90-degree heat. Captain fire fighter Scott Kouns says, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. It takes a while to get used to the roller coaster ride, at least, and it takes at least an hour to get the first person through that process.""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Miturut koran kuwi, asile maca data saka pinggiran segara kuwi nuduhake yen tsunami kabentuk. Ana asil sing nuduhake yen kagiyatan sing ngasilake tsunami kacathet ana cedhake Pago Pago lan Niue. Ora ana karuksan utawa cilaka gedhe sing dilapurake ing Tonga, nanging listrik sawatara mangsa mati, sing dilapurake nyegah panguwasa Tonga nampa piweling tsunami sing diwetokake dening PTWC. Patbelas sekolahan ning Hawaii sing manggon ana utawa cedhak karo pinggir pantai ditutup kabeh dina Rebo wingi sanadyan wis ora ana anceman sing mbebayani.
mt: According to the paper, reading data from the coast shows that a tsunami was formed. There are reports that the event that caused the tsunami was recorded in Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or casualties were reported in Tonga, but some power outages were reported, which prompted Tonga officials to reject tsunami warnings issued by PTWC. All schools in Hawaii within or near the coast were closed on Friday, even though there was no threatening event.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Johny Reid, navigator kanggo tim Selandia Anyar A1GP, saiki gawe sejarah kanthi nyetir paling banter ing ndhuwur Jembatan Pelabuhan Auckland sing umure 48-taun, Selandia Anyar, kanthi legal. Mr. Reid bisa nyopir menyang Selandia Baru A1GP, Ayu.Ireng kanthi 160km/j kaping pitu ana jembatan. Polisi New Zealand kangelan nggunakake gegaman radar kecepatane kanggo ndeleng sepira cepet Pak Reid lunga amarga sepira alon Ayu Ireng, lan mung sepisan polisi bisa njupuk wektu yaiku nalika Pak Reid ngalon nganti 160km / jam.
mt: John Reid, navigator for the New Zealand A1GP team, has now set a record for driving over the Auckland Harbour Bridge, aged 48, New Zealand, legally. Mr. Reid was able to drive the New Zealand A1GP, Red, at 160km/h over the bridge. New Zealand police used a speed radar gun to see how fast Mr. Reid went because the Red was going so fast, and only once did police catch him at 160km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Lindhu sing ora pati kenceng kuwi kadadeyan ana ning Montana sisih kulon jam 10.08 wengi dina Senen. Ora ana laporan karusakan sing ditrima dening Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) lan Punjer Informasi Lindhu Nasional. Lindhu kuwi punjere 20 km (15 mil) lor-lor wetane Dillon, lan 65 km (40 mil) kidule Butte.
mt: A minor earthquake occurred in western Montana at 10:08 pm Monday. No damage was reported to the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center. The quake was centered 20 km (15 miles) north-northwest of Dillon, and 65 km (40 miles) south-southwest of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Kunjara Abu Ghraib Irak dibakar sajrone rerusuhan. Kunjara dadi kondhang sawise panyiksan tawanan ditemokake anana akana sawise direbut pasukan Amerika.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was burned during riots. The prison became notorious after the abuse of prisoners was discovered after it was captured by American forces.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Musikan kasebut wurungake pagelaran ing Stadion Memorial Perang Maui, sing bakal dirawuhi 9,000 wong, lan njaluk ngapura marang para pangareme. Perusahaan sing ngatur klompok iki, HK Manajemen Inc., ora menehi alesan nalika dibatalke tanggal 20 September, nanging nyalahke logistik sesuke.
mt: The concert was cancelled at the Maui War Memorial Stadium, which was to be filled with 9,000 people, and asked for refunds from the attendees. The company that organized this group, HK Management Inc., did not give a reason when it was cancelled on September 20, but blamed logistics.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Njarah sing saya nyebar dilapurke terus-terusan sewengi, amarga aparat panegak ukum ora ana ing dalanan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarake kaya klelep menyang kahanan “anarki” dening sawijining pengamat, nalika gerombolan-gerombolan wong-wong ngliwati dalan lan njarah toko-toko barang-barang konsumen. Sawetara penduduk Bishkek nyalahne pemrotes saka kidul kanggo pelanggaran ukume.
mt: The looting continued throughout the day, as police were not on the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described as a "state of anarchy" by an observer, as mobs of people roamed the streets and looted consumer stores. Some residents of Bishkek blamed southern protesters for the lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

Bishkek digambarake kaya klelep menyang kahanan “anarki” dening sawijining pengamat, nalika gerombolan-gerombolan wong-wong ngliwati dalan lan njarah toko-toko barang-barang konsumen. Sawetara penduduk Bishkek nyalahne pemrotes saka kidul kanggo pelanggaran ukume.
mt: The looting continued throughout the day, as police were not on the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described as a "state of anarchy" by an observer, as mobs of people roamed the streets and looted consumer stores. Some residents of Bishkek blamed southern protesters for the lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Sadurunge, pamimpin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ujar manawa pakaryan iku dwiwiti nalika bel lawang ora keprungu saka toko ing garasine. Dheweke mbangun bel lawang WiFi, jarene. Siminoff ngomong penjualane mundhak sakwise tampile taun 2013 ing episode Shark Tank ing ngendi panel acara nolak mbiayani rintisane. Ing pungkasan taun 2017, Siminoff katon ing saluran TV blanja QVC. Ring uga ngrampungake gugatan karo perusahaan keamanan saingan, Perusahaan ADT.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was bootstrapped when it first opened its doors, not from a store on a street corner. He built a WiFi doorbell, darn it. Siminoff said his salesmen increased after appearing on the TV show Shark Tank in 2013, where the show's panel rejected funding his startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping network QVC. Ring also sued its security rival, ADT.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Pagelaran PBS nduweni luwih saka rong-lusin anugrah Emmy, lan pagelaran iki rampung luwih cepet tinimbang Dalan Sesame lan Lingkungane Pak Roger. Saben episode saka acarane bakal fokus marang tema ing buku tartamtu lan banjur njelajah tema kasebut liwat sawetara crita. Saben pagelaran uga bakal nyedhiyakake saran buku-buku sing bisa digoleki dening bocah-bocah nalika dolan menyang perpustakaan. John Grant, saka WNED Kebo (Maca stasiun omah Pelangi) ngujar “Maca Pelangi ngajari bocah cilik supaya maca,... katresnan marang maca — [pagelaran] nyemangati bocah-bocah supaya jukuk buku banjur maca.” Dipercaya dening sawetara wong, kalebu John Grant, yen gersik keuangan lan pangowahan ing filsafat program TV panggulawênthahan menehi kontribusi kanggo wusanane seri iki.
mt: PBS has more than two dozen Emmy awards, and this series ended sooner than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show will focus on a particular book and then explore that theme through several stories. Each show will also provide suggestions for books that children can look for at the library. John Grant, from WNED (the local Pelangi station) said, "The Pelangi station teaches children to read,... a love of reading -- [the show] encourages children to read books then read." Some people, including John Grant, believe that budget cuts and changes in the philosophy of TV programming contributed to the end of this series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Pejabat saka kutha Amsterdam lan Museum Anne Frank ngomong menawa wite kena jamur lan marai bebayan kanggo kasehatan umum kanthi ngusulake menawa iku nyedhaki bebaya ambruk. Iku wis dijdwalake kanggo dikethok dina Selasa, nanging dislametake sakwise putusan pengadilan darurat.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the mold was caused by a leak and posed a health risk to the public. It was scheduled to be cleaned on Tuesday, but was postponed after a court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Pembebasan Kewan lan Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) bali ngusulake kanggo kewajiban masang CCTV ing kabeh papan jagal ing Australia. Inspektur Kepala RSPCA New South Wales David O'Shannessyngendikan menyang ABC yen pengawasan lan pemeriksaan omah jagal kuwi kudune dadi perkara sing umum ana ning Australia. ""CCTV mesthi bakal menehi tandha kuwat kanggo wong sing kerja karo kewan bilih karaharjan kasebut minangka prioritas paling dhuwur."""
mt: "The RSPCA and Animal Liberation have called for a requirement to install CCTV in all abattoirs in Australia. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that surveillance and inspection of abattoirs is a common issue in Australia. ""CCTV would give a strong indication to those working with animals that this is the highest priority."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Pawarta sumebar ing komunitas Tlaga Abang dina iki nalika pemakaman Jeff Weise lan telu saka sanga korban sing dumadi menawa siswa liyane ditangkap gegayutan karo penembakan sekolah ing tanggal 21 Maret. Pihak berwenang ngomong resmi sathithik luwih saka konfirmasi penangkepan dina iki. Nanging, sawijining sumber kanthi wawasan investigasi ngandhakake marang Mimbar-Bintang Minneapolis menawa iku yaiku Louis Jourdain, 16 taun putra saka Kepala Suku Tlaga Abang Floyd Jourdain. Urung dimangerteni nganti saiki tuduhan apa sing bakal diajokke utawa apa sing nyebabake pihak sing nduweni wewenang marang bocah kuwi nanging proses kanggo bocah nom kuwi wis diwiwiti ana ing pengadilan umum.
mt: The news spread in the Red Lake community on this day when the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the six victims were arrested in connection with the school shooting on March 21. Authorities officially confirmed the arrest on this day. However, an investigative source with knowledge of the investigation told the Star Tribune of Minneapolis that this was Louis Jourdain, 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not yet known what charges will be filed or what caused the authorities to act against the boy but the process for the boy has already begun in the public court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Panitia protes ujar udakara 100.000 wong katon ing kutha-kutha Jerman kayata Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg lan Hanover. Ning Berlin, pulisi mbedek ana kira-kira 6.500 wong sing protes. Protes uga dianakake ing Paris, Sofia ing Bulgaria, Vilnius ing Lithuania, Valetta ing Malta, Tallinn ing Estonia lan Edinburgh lan Glasgow ing Skotlandia. Ing London, udakara 200 wong protes ing njaba kantor sing nduwe hak cipta utama. Pungkasan wulan, ana demo gedhe ing Polandia nalika negara iku nyetujoni ACTA, sing nyebabake pamrentah Polandia mutusake supaya ora ngesahake mupakatan, saiki. Latvia lan Slovakia loro-lorone wis nangguhke prosese gabung ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people were reported to have protested in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated about 6,500 people protested. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the main copyright office. Last month, there was a large protest in Poland when the country approved ACTA, which caused the Polish government to decide not to ratify the agreement, now. Latvia and Slovakia both have halted the ACTA joining process.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Kira-kira ana 60 kasus iPods sing ora bisa dienggo gara-gara kepanasen wis dilaporke, nyebabke nem kobongan lan mbebayani wong papat. mentri Ekonomi, Industri lan Perdagangan (METI) Jepang ngujar yen uwis ana kurang luwih 27 kacilakan sing kadadeyan gara-gara piranti kuwi. Minggu wingi, METI ngumumne menawa Apple nuduhake 34 kacilakan tambahan merga kepanasen, sing diarani “ora serius” dening perusahaan. Kementerian kasebut mangsuli kanthi nyebut semados lapuran dening Apple ""saestu patut digetuni."""
mt: "About 60 cases of iPods overheating have been reported, causing four fires. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said there were about 27 incidents involving the device. Last weekend, METI announced that Apple had reported 34 additional incidents of overheating, which the company called "not serious." The ministry responded by saying that Apple's reports were "not sufficient.""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Direktur Utama Apple Steeve Jobs ngluncurake piranti kanthi mlaku menyang panggung lan ngetokake iPhone saka njero sak kathok jine. Nalika pidato 2 jam iki dheweke ngujar yen ""Saiki Apple bakal nemokake maneh telpon, Kita bakal gawe sejarah dina iki""."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and pulling an iPhone from a black cloth bag. During his two-hour presentation, he said, ""Today Apple will change the world again with this amazing iPhone."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Anggota dewan lan Ibu Negara Argentina saiki Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumke yen dheweke bakal nyalon dadi presiden wingi sore ana ning La Plata, kutha sing manggon 50 kilometer (31 mil) adohe saka Buenos Aires. Ibu Kirchner ngumumake niatane arep dadi presiden ana ing Teater Argentina, panggonan sing padha sing dienggo nalika miwiti kampanye taun 2005 kanggo dadi Dewan anggota perwakilan propinsi Buenos Aires.
mt: Members of the Argentine Congress and First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced this afternoon that she would run for president in the evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to be president in the Teatro Argentino, the same place used to start her campaign in 2005 for a seat in the Buenos Aires provincial legislature.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA uga nemokake, sanajan vidio diputer ing Internet, Big Brother ora nrajang undhang-undhang sensor konten online amarga vidio kasebut ora disimpen ing web Big Brother. Undhang-Undhang Layanan Siaran kuwi nyedhiyani regulasi isi internet, nanging supaya bisa diarani isi internet, barang kuwi kudu ana ing server.
mt: ACMA also found, although the video was played on the Internet, Big Brother did not enforce content filtering laws because the video was not hosted on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates Internet content, but in order to be considered Internet content, it must be on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, bendahara Australia lan wong sing kemungkinan nerusake Perdana Menteri John Howard minangka pimpinan partai Liberal wis menehi dhukungan ing industri tenaga nuklir ing Australia. Pak Costello ngomong yen nalika generasi tenaga nuklir bisa mlaku terus sake sisih ekonomi, Australia kudu ngoyak kagunakane. ""Menawa iku dadi iklan, kita kudu nduweni iku. Tegese, prinsipe ora ana kabotan marang energi nuklir kandhane Pak Castello."""
mt: "Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has given support to the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that if nuclear power could continue to make economic sense, Australia should have it. ""If it's a sale, we should have it. That is, there is no principled objection to nuclear power," said Mr Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

mt: "Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has given support to the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that if nuclear power could continue to make economic sense, Australia should have it. ""If it's a sale, we should have it. That is, there is no principled objection to nuclear power," said Mr Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Mung ana wolulas medali saben dinane, akeh negara sing gagal gawe medali panggung. Dheweke padha kalebu Walanda, kanthi Anna Jochemsen finis kaping sanga ing kelas ngadeg wanita ing Super-Gwingi, lan Finlandia kanthi Katja Saarinen finis kaping sepuluh ing acara sing padha. Mitchell Gourley saka Australia rampung kasewelas ing juwara Super-G. Pasaing Czech, Oldrich Jelinek minangka nomer enem ing Super-G. Arly Valesquez saka Meksiko rampung ing posisi lima welas ing Super-G lungguh putra. Adam Hall saka New Zealand rampung ing posisi kesanga ing super-G ngadek putra. Pemain ski lanang wuta Maciej Krezel saka Polandia lan panuntun Anna Ogarzynska rampung ing telulas ing Super-G. Jong Seork Park saka Korea Kidul rampung ing rong puluh papat ing Super-G lanang.
mt: 21 medals were awarded each day, with many countries failing to win any medals. They included the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing seventh in the women's slalom standing, and Finland, with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Mitchell Gourley of Australia finished 11th in the men's slalom standing. Czech skier Oldrich Jelinek was sixth in the men's slalom standing. Arly Valesquez of Mexico finished 15th in the men's slalom standing. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished 17th in the men's slalom standing. Polish skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished 21st in the men's slalom standing. Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished 24th in the men's slalom standing.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Latihane ana ing Pengadilan Birmingham Crown lan bakal diputuske tanggal 3 Agustus. Pranatacara, sing dicekel ing adegan kasebut, mbantah serangan kasebut lan nyatakake yen dheweke nggunakake cagak kanggo nglindhungi awake saka botol sing diuncalake marang dheweke dening telung puluh wong. Blake uga dituntut amarga nyoba ngowahi dalane keadilan. Hakim kandha marang Blake yen ""meh ora bisa luput"" dheweke bakal dikirim menyang kunjara."
mt: "The trial is at Birmingham Crown Court and will be heard on August 3. The defendant, who was arrested at the scene, denies the attack and says he was using a stick to protect himself from a bottle thrown at him by thirty people. Blake is also charged with attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake that he ""can't get away"" with it, he will be sent to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Perkara liya ing agenda ing Bali kalebu nylametne alas kang isih ana ing donya, lan mbagi teknologi kanggo mbantu negara berkembang tuwuh kanthi cara kang polusine sathithik. PBB uga ngarepake supaya bisa nglumpukake dhuwit kanggo nulungi negara-negara sing kena pengaruhe pemanasan global kanggo ngatasi pengaruh kasebut. Dhuwite bisa kanggo omah tahan banjir, pengaturan banyu kang luwih becik, lan diversifikasi tanduran.
mt: Other items on the agenda in Bali include preserving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technology to help developing countries grow in a sustainable way. The UN also hopes to raise money to help countries affected by global warming to deal with its effects. The money could be used for flood-proof housing, better water management, and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigeria sadurunge ngumumake rencana kanggo gabung AfCFTA ing minggu nyedaki konferensi. Komisioner perdagangan lan industri Uni Afrika Albertrt Muchanga ngumumake menawa Benin bakal gabung. Komisaris kuwi ngendikan, “Kita durung sepakat marang aturan saka asale lan kon[s]esi rega, nanging rangka iki wis cukup kanggo miwiti dagang tanggal 1 Juli, 2020”.
mt: Nigeria announced plans to join AfCFTA last week ahead of the conference.  African Union Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join.  The commissioner noted, "We are not agreed on the rules of origin and the [s]tiff tariffs, but this framework is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Dheweke nampa pangalem kritig sajrone jaman ing Atlanta lan dikenal kanggo panggulawenthah kutha sing inovatif. Taun 2009 dheweke dianugrahi Pimpinan Nasional Taun iki. Nalika acara pangaji-aji kasebut, sekolah Atlanta wis ngasilake skor tes kang mundhak akeh banget. Sabubare kuwi, Jurnal-Konstitusi The Atlanta nyiarake laporan sing nuduhake perkara kanthi asil ujine. Lapurane nuduhake biji ujian munggah cepet banget, lan nuduhake menawa sekolah ngerteni anane masalah ana jero nanging ora tumindak marang panemon kasebut. Bukti banjur nyiratake kertas tes diowahi karo Hall, bareng 34 petugas pendidikan liyane, didakwa ing 2013.
mt: She received national Teacher of the Year honors in Atlanta in 2009 and is known for her innovative city school. In 2009, the Atlanta school system saw a dramatic rise in test scores. Shortly thereafter, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported on a story with surprising results. The report showed that test scores rose quickly, and revealed that the school knew of the problems and did not act on the warnings. Evidence later showed that the test papers were altered by Hall, along with 34 other education officials, were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Ana bom sing njebluk ning njaba kantor jendral gubernur. Telung bom maneh mbledos ing cedhak gedhong pamrentahan sajrone rong jam. Sawetara lapuran nuduhake kurban mati sing resmi wolu, lan lapuran resmi mesthekake menawa sing cedera luwih saka 30; nanging jumlah akhire durung dingerteni.
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor's general office. Three more bombs exploded near the government building within four hours. Some reports indicate eight dead, and official reports state more than 30 injured; the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Jesus sing umure 21 taun gabung Manchester City taun wingi ing Januari 2017 saka klub Palmeiras saka Brasil kanthi gaji sing dilapurake £27 yuta. Kawit iku, pelakon Brasil iki wis katon ing 53 pertandhingan kanggo klub ing kabeh lomba lan entuk 24 gol.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last January from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has appeared in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Ana pratapan ambruk ing Mekah, kutha suci Islam udakara jam 10 esuk wektu sepanggon. Bangunane nampung saperangan jemaah sing nekani kuta suci ana malem ibadah haji. Para tamu pratapan umume pandunung Uni Emirat Arab. Korban tiwas paling ora 15, jumlah sing diduga bakal mundhak.
mt: A building collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, around 10 am local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims visiting the holy city during the night of the Hajj. Most of the visitors were residents of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, with the number expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelit kasebut, sing loro-lorone abote luwih saka 1000 pound, lan mlaku ing kira-kira 17.500 mile se jam, tabrakan 491 mile dhuwur Bumi. Ilmuwan ngandhakake menawa bledhosan amarga tabrakan kasebut gedhe banget. Dheweke isih mutuske sepira gedhene tabrakan iku lan apa pengaruhe marang Donya iki. Komando Strategis Amerika Serikat saka kantor Departemen Pertahanan AS ngelacak puing-puinge. Asile saka ngrancang analisis bakal diunggah menyang situs web umum.
mt: The satellite, which weighed more than 1,000 pounds and orbited at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists have estimated the impact was huge. They still have not determined the size of the impact and its effects on the world. The United States Strategic Command from the Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The analysis of the crash will be uploaded to a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten manggon ana urutan 190 nalika taun 2008 400 Wong Amerika sing Paling Sugih kanthi jumlah bandhane $2.3 milyar. Dheweke lulus saka Kampus Seni & Sains saka Universitas Virginia taun 1950 lan nyumbangke dhuwit sing akeh kanggo institusi kuwi.
mt: 190th in 2008 Forbes 400 Richest Americans with a net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Arts & Sciences in 1950 and has given a lot of money to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger nandhatangani kanggo ndadekake rancangan undang-undang sing nglarang dodol utawa nyewa vidio game kasar menyang bocah cilik. Rancangan undang-undang kasebut nyaratake video games kasar sing diadol ing negara bagian California diwenehi tandha nganggo stiker “18” lan menehi ukuman menawa ngadol menyang bocah kanthi denda $1000 saben pelanggaran.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that prohibits the sale or rental of violent video games to children. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with an "18" rating and imposes fines of up to $1000 per violation for selling to children.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall,sing rabi karo loro bocah dewasa, ora ninggalake kesan gedhe marang Miller, marang sapa cerita iku ana gayutane. Nalika dijaluki tanggepan, Miller ngomong, “Mike ngomong akeh nalika sidang...Aku mau lagi siap-siap dadi aku ora pati krungu apa sing diomongake.”
mt: Duvall, who was married to two children, left no great impression on Miller, to whom he was connected. When asked to testify, Miller said, "Mike talked a lot at the trial... I want to be ready to be I'm not dying of what is said."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Perdana menteri Stephen Harper wis setuju kanggo ngirim ‘Aksi Hawa Resik’ pamrentah menyang komite kabeh partai kanggo ditinjau, sakdurunge wacan kelorone, sakwise rapat 25 menit dina Selasa karo pemimpin NDP Jack Layton ing PMO. Layton njaluk owah-owahan ing rancangan undang-undang lingkungan konservatif nalika pertemuan karo Perdana Menteri, njaluk penulisan ulang sing tliti lan lengkap saka ""rancangan undang-undang lingkungan partai Konservatif."" Wiwit Pamrentah Federal tumindak kanggo njupuk dana kanggo rumah sakit Mersey ing Devonport, Tasmania, pamrentah negara lan sawetara ahli parlemen federal wis nggigat tumindak kasebut minangka tandang ing pambukaan pamilihan federal sing bakal diundang ing wulan Nopember. Nanging Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngendikan yen tumindak kuwi mung dienggo njaga fasilitas sing ana ning rumah sakit supaya ora didhunke parangkate dening pemerintah Tasmania, nalika menehi dhuwit luwih AUD$45 yuta."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send a government'strike force' to all-party committee to review, before the final vote, after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton asked for changes to the Conservative government's environmental bill at the meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a thorough and complete rewrite of the "Conservative Party's environmental bill." Since the Federal Government took action to fund the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have protested the action as a slap in the face to the opening of the federal election to be held in November. But Prime Minister John Howard has denied that the action was only to keep the facilities at the hospital to prevent the government of Tasmania from being parangkated, while giving more AUD$45 million."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: "Perdana menteri Stephen Harper wis setuju kanggo ngirim ‘Aksi Hawa Resik’ pamrentah menyang komite kabeh partai kanggo ditinjau, sakdurunge wacan kelorone, sakwise rapat 25 menit dina Selasa karo pemimpin NDP Jack Layton ing PMO. Layton njaluk owah-owahan ing rancangan undang-undang lingkungan konservatif nalika pertemuan karo Perdana Menteri, njaluk penulisan ulang sing tliti lan lengkap saka ""rancangan undang-undang lingkungan partai Konservatif."" Wiwit Pamrentah Federal tumindak kanggo njupuk dana kanggo rumah sakit Mersey ing Devonport, Tasmania, pamrentah negara lan sawetara ahli parlemen federal wis nggigat tumindak kasebut minangka tandang ing pambukaan pamilihan federal sing bakal diundang ing wulan Nopember. Nanging Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngendikan yen tumindak kuwi mung dienggo njaga fasilitas sing ana ning rumah sakit supaya ora didhunke parangkate dening pemerintah Tasmania, nalika menehi dhuwit luwih AUD$45 yuta."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send a government'strike force' to all-party committee to review, before the final vote, after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton asked for changes to the Conservative government's environmental bill at the meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a thorough and complete rewrite of the "Conservative Party's environmental bill." Since the Federal Government took action to fund the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have protested the action as a slap in the face to the opening of the federal election to be held in November. But Prime Minister John Howard has denied that the action was only to keep the facilities at the hospital to prevent the government of Tasmania from being parangkated, while giving more AUD$45 million."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Asam sianurat lan melamin ditemokake ing conto uyuh saka kewan ingon sing mati sawise mangan panganan kewan sing ketularan. Keloro senyawa reaksi siji lan liyane kanggo mbentuk kristal sing mungkin ngalangi fungsi ginjal, panaliti ing universitas iku kandha. Para panliti mirsani kristal sing kabentuk ing uyuh kucing kanthi tambahan melamin lan asam sianurik. Komposisi kristal iki cocok karo temuan ing turas kewan-kewan ingon-ingonan iku nalika dibandhingake kanthi spektroskopi infraabang (FTIR).
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in samples of cat food from the affected animals. Both compounds react with each other to form crystals that may interfere with kidney function, researchers at the university said. Researchers observed crystals formed in cat food samples with added melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches findings in the affected animals when compared with Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua nglapurake menawa para penyidik pamerentah nemokake loro ‘kotak ireng’ perekam suara penerbangan ing Rebo. Para kanca gulet uga menehi pangurmatan marang Luna. Tommy Dreamer ngomong “Luna iku Ratu Ekstrim sing kepisan. Manajer pisananku. Luna seda ing malem rong rembulan. Lumayan unik kaya dheweke. Wanita kuwat.” Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels ngomentari menawa “Luna iku padha anehe kaya aku...mungkin senajan luwih...tresna lan bakal kangen dheweke (wanita)...Muga-muga dheweke ing papan sing luwih apik.”"
mt: "Xinhua reports that police found two "black boxes" flight recorders in Thursday. The crew also gave tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the Extreme Queen. My manager. Luna died last night two moons. Pretty unique like her. Strong woman." Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that "Luna was just like me...maybe more...loves and will miss her (woman)...Hopefully she is in a better place.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Sanadyan uwong telu ana ing njero omah nalika mobil kuwi nabrak, nanging kabeh selamet. Nanging, supir kasebut ngalami congkrah mbebayani ing sirah. Dalan nalika kacilakan kasebut ditutup sauntara nalika layanan darurat mbebasake supir kasebut saka Audi TT abang. Dheweke wiwitane dirawat ana ing Rumah Sakit James Paget ning Great Yarmouth. Banjur dheweke dipindhah menyang Rumah Sakit Addenbrooke ning Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed, but all escaped unharmed. However, the driver suffered serious head injuries. The road was closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially treated at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Tandhinge diwiwiti jam 10:00 esuk kanthi hawa sing penak kajaba saka grimis tengah esuk sing cepet mandheg, iku dina sing sampurna kanggo rugbi 7. Turnamen wenih unggul Afrika Kidul diwiwiti kanthi becik nalika dheweke menang 26 - 00 ngelawan wenih ke5 Zambia. Katon kanthi cetha kaku ing dolanan nglawan sedulur wadon kidul dheweke padha, Afrika Kidul sanajan kepiye terus sansaya apik nalika pertandhingan berlangsung. Pananggulang kang tumata, katrampilan nguwasani bal, lan kerja regu sing luwar biyasa ndadekake dheweke pinunjul lan mesthi manawa iki regu sing kudu dikalahake.
mt: 10:00 am started with a cool breeze except for the smog of early morning that quickly subsided, it was a perfect day for rugby 7. The tournament was off to a good start when they beat Zambia 26 - 00 in the 5th game. The women's team looked confident in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa despite their usual slow start when the game began. The leadership, ball handling skills, and usual teamwork made them the favorites and always when this team had to be beaten.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Sajrone telung dasawarsa kepungkur, sanajan resmi tetep dadi negara komunis, Cina wis megarake ekonomi pasar. Reformasi ekonomi kaping pisan kuwi klakon nalika mangsa pemerintahane Deng Xiaoping. Wiwit semana, ekonomi Cina wis thukul tikel 90. Kanggo sing sepisan, taun kepungkur China ngekspor mobil luwih akeh tinimbang Jerman lan ngluwihi Amerika Serikat minangka pasar paling gedhe kanggo industri iki. GDP China bisa dadi luwih gedhe tinimbang Amerika Serikat kanthi wektu rong puluh taun.
mt: Over the past two decades, although officially still a communist country, China has become a market economy. Its economic reforms began in earnest during the rule of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's exports of cars have exceeded those of Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for this industry. China's GDP could become larger than that of the United States in about 20 years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Awake dhewe bakal ngusadani kanggo ngelongi metune karbon dioksida saben unit PDB kanthi margin kang patut digatekaki ing 2020 saka tingkat 2005, ujare Hu. "" Dheweke ora netepake angka kanggo kethokan, kandha dheweke padha bakal digawe adhedhasar asil ekonomi Cina. Hu nyengkuyung negara-negara berkembang “nyingkiri dalan tua saka polusi sepisan lan ngresiki sabanjure.” Dheweke nambahake ""dheweke ora dijaluk supaya bisa njupuk kewajiban sing ngluwihi tataran pangembangan, tanggung jawab, lan katrampilan dheweke."""
mt: """Hu will urge developed countries to take responsibility for their historical emissions and to clean up first. Hu will not ask for a share of the burden, responsibility, and capabilities that developed countries have."""
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Mangola amal medis, Obat-obatan Sans Frontieres lan Organisasi Kasihatan Donya ngujar yen iki wabah sing paling ala sing tau kacathet dening negara iki. Juru wicara Medecines Sans Frontiere, Richard Veerman ujar: ""Angola lagi nuju wabah paling parah sing nate ana lan kahanan kasebut tetep ala banget ing Angola,"" ujare."
mt: "Medical charities, Médecins Sans Frontières and World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak ever recorded in this country. Médecins Sans Frontières spokesman Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for the worst outbreak ever and the situation is still very bad in Angola,"" he said."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Dhirektur Panggugat Umum, Keir Starmer QC, menehi pratelan esuk iki sing nyatakake panggugatan Huhne lan Pryce. Huhne wis pensiun lan dheweke bakal diganteni dening Kabinet Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP dikarepke supaya nglakokne pakaryan Menteri Bisnis sing dikosongke dening Davey. Huhne lan Pryce dijadwalake metu ing Pengadilan Magistrasi Wesminster ing tanggal 16 Februari.
mt: Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, issued a morning statement listing the charges against Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced by Energy Secretary Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over the Business Secretary role vacated by Davey. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Cerita sing ditampilke ana ing opera Perancis, dening Camille Saint-Saens, kuwi saka seniman “sing uripe didikte dening rasa tresna kanggo obat-obatan lan Jepang.” Asile, seniman ngrokok lintingan ganja ing panggung, lan teater kasebut ngajak para pamirsa kanggo melu.
mt: A story featured in a French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is about an artist “who was inspired by a love of drugs and Japan.” The artist smokes marijuana on stage, and the play encourages audience members to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, uga dikenal minangka “cosmonaut No. 11”, iku bagean saka tim cosmonaut asli Uni Soviet. Tanggal 18 Maret, 1965, dheweke nggelar kagiyatan ekstravehikuler (EVA) nganggo manungsa kaping pisan, utawa “mlaku ning langit”, mlaku dhewekan rolas menit ning njabane pesawat. Dheweke narima “Pahlawan saka Persatuan Soviet”, anugerah paling dhuwur saka Persatuan Soviet, kanggo karyane. Sepuluh taun sabanjure, dheweke mimpin bagean Sovyet saka misi Apollo–Soyuz pratandha menawa Perlombaan Angkasa wis rampung.
mt: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the original Soviet cosmonaut team. On March 18, 1965, he performed an extravehicular activity (EVA), or "space walk", for 12 minutes outside the spacecraft. He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest award of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz test project when the Space Race ended.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Sabubare tabrakan iku kadadeyan, Gibson diangkut menyang rumah sakit nanging mati ora suwe sabubare kuwi. Sopir trek kuwi, sing umure 64, ora gene-gene sabubare tabrakan. Kendharaane dhewe dijupuk saka panggonan kadadeyan kacilakan kira-kira ing 1200 GMT ing dina sing padha. Wong sing nyambut gawe ana sak cedhake bengkel sing cedhak nggon kacilakan kuwi kadadeyan ngujar: “Ana bocah-bocah ngenteni nyebrang dalan kanthi nangis lan jerat-jerit.” Kabeh padha mlayu mbalik saka panggon kedadeyan kacilakan kasebut.
mt: The accident happened, Gibson was taken to hospital but died shortly afterwards from the crash. The truck driver, aged 64, was not injured in the crash. His vehicle was removed from the scene of the accident around 1200 GMT on the same day. There were some injuries at the nearby garage where the accident happened: "There were children watching the road crying and screaming." All were returning from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Kerja sing rampung sebagean gedhe iku teoritis, nanging programe ditulis kanggo simulasi pengamatan sing digawe saka galaksi Sagittarius. Owah-owahan sing digoleki dening anggota tim iki yaiku diasilke dening kakuwatan pasang surut antarane materi sing ora katon saka galaksi lan materi sing ora katon saka Bima Sakti. Kaya dene rembulan nggunakake tarikan marang bumi, nyebabake pasang, semana uga Bima Sakti nggunakake kekuwatan marang galaksi Sagitarius. Para Ilmuwan wis nyimpulke yen materi sing ora katon iki nduweni pengaruh marang materi liyane kanthi cara sing padha karo materi liyane sing katon. Teori iki kandha menawa saperangan akeh bahan peteng ing sakiwa tengene sawijining galaksi iku ana ing sakiwatengene sawijining galaksi ing sejenis bunderan cahya, lan kagawe saka partikel-partikel cilik sing akeh banget.
mt: The work, which is complete, is theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made from the Sagittarius galaxy. Changes observed by team members are made by the strength of the tides between the unseen matter of the galaxy and the unseen matter of the Milky Way. As the moon uses gravity to pull the Earth, so the Milky Way uses gravity to pull the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists have concluded that this unseen matter has an effect on other matter in the same way as other visible matter. This theory says that a lot of dark matter in the center of a galaxy is in the center of a galaxy of the same type, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Debat kuwi diwiwiti dening anane selisih paham perkara dana kanggo bantuan lan pembangunan ulang sing kena Lesus Katrina; sing diwenehake humor dening uwong konservative fiska dadi “Perjanjian New Orleans Bush” Kritik liberal marang usaha rekonstruksi wis dipusatake marang diawehkene kontrak rekonstruksi kanggo ditampa wong jerone Washington.
mt: The debate was sparked by the differences in opinion over the funding for aid and reconstruction that was hit by Hurricane Katrina; which was lampooned by conservative fiscal types as the "New Orleans Bush Deal" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction efforts was focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to companies from Washington.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Nalika kapsul tekan Bumi lan mlebu atmosfir, udakara jam 5 esuk (wektu bagean wétan), mula bakal diteksir nuduhake tontonan cahya kanggo wong-wong ing Kalifornia, Oregon, Nevada, lan Utah. Kapsul kasebut bakale katon kaya lintang kemukus ngliwati langit. Kapsul iku bakal lelungan ing watara 12,8 km utawa 8 mil per detik, cukup cepet kanggo lunga seka San Fransisco menyang Los Angeles sajerone samenit. Stardust bakal gawe sejarah anyar amarga dadi montor mabur sing paling cepet nalika bali menyang Bumi, mecahke sejarah sadurunge sing digawe sasi Mei 1969 nalika modul perintah Apollo X bali. ""Iku bakal mlaku sadhuwure pesisir kulon saka California lor lan bakal madhangi langit saka California liwat Oregon tengah lan liwat Nevada lan Idaho lan menyang Utah,"" ujare Tom Duxbury, manajer proyek Stardust."
mt: "When the Stardust capsule hits the Earth's atmosphere, around 5 a.m. (Pacific time), it will be visible to people in California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look like a bright star moving across the sky. Stardust will make history as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the record set in May 1969 when the Apollo X command module returned. ""It will fly over the west coast of northern California and will pass over California through central Oregon and through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,"" said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Dokter sing nyambut gawe ana ning Rumah Sakit Anak ning Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania bakal didakwa kanthi ukuman sing abot sabubare ibune ditemokake mati ning njero bagasi montore dina Rebo kapungkur, jare para ahli ning Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, ditemokake ing Blue Ash, Ohio, sawijining pinggiran kutha kira-kira 15 mil lor Cincinnati gemlethak ing lemah sandhing dalan nganggo kaos lan njeronan sing katone kahanane ngandhut obat temenan. Dheweke ngarahake petugas menyang mobil Oldsmobile Intrigue irenge sing adohe 500 kaki. Ing kana, dheweke nemokake layon Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, ditutupi kemul kebak getih. Pulisi ngujar yen mayit kuwi wis ana kono kira-kira sedina.
mt: A doctor who worked at a Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania children's hospital will be charged with a crime that carries a possible life sentence after his wife was found dead in the trunk of his car last Thursday, according to Ohio authorities. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the ground next to a road wearing a T-shirt and shorts containing a note saying he was taking his life. He led police to an Oldsmobile Intrigue about 500 feet away. Inside, they found Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered in blood. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Iku akuisisi paling gedhe ing sejarahe eBay. Perusahaan ngarepake kanggo diversifikasi sumber untunge lan entuk kamisuwuran ing daerah ing ngendi Skype duwe posisi kuwat, kayata Cina, Eropa etan, lan Brasil.
mt: This is eBay's largest acquisition in its history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue sources and gain market share in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Nalika gelute mandhek sakwise sing padha cidra diterake menyang rumah sakit, kira-kira 40 saka tawanan liyane tetep ing latar lan wegah bali menyang sel. Para parembug nyoba ngadhemi kahanan, nanging panjaluk para tahanan kasebut ora jelas. Antarane jam 10.00-11.00 wengi MDT, geni kuwi digawe dening tahanan ana ning latar. Ora suwe, petugas sing nganggo piranti anti huru-hara mlebu latar lan mojokake napi nganggo gas air mata. Anggota pemadam kebakaran kuwi akhire bisa mateni geni kuwi jam 11.35 wengi.
mt: 40 of the 50 inmates were taken to the hospital after the fire, the rest remained in the yard and were returned to their cells. Guards attempted to calm the situation, but the demands of the inmates were unclear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 p.m. MDT, the inmates lit a fire in the yard. Not long after, officers wearing riot gear entered the yard and maced the inmates with tear gas. Firefighters were finally able to extinguish the fire at 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
