src: Komentar, langsung ana tipi, sing kaping pisan yaiku sumber senior Iran wis ngakoni yen ukuman kuwi nduweni aruh-aruh. Dheweke padha nglebokake pembatasan dhuwit lan sawijining larangan dening Uni Eropa babagan ekspor minyak mentah, sing saka endi ekonomi Iran nampa 80% saka penghasilan luar negrine. Sajroning laporan sing paling anyar sasi iki, OPEC ngendikan yen ekspor minyak mentah kuwi anjlok menyang tingkatan sing paling cendhek sasuwene rong puluh taun terakhir kira-kira 2,8 yuta barel saben dinane. Pimpinan utama negara kasebut, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, nggambarake katergantungan minyak kuwi “jebakan” awit sadurunge Revolusi Islam Iran taun 1979 lan negara kasebut kudu mbebaske awake dhewe.
mt: Comment, directly quoted, that the senior source of Iran has admitted that the sentence has implications. He also blocked the financial restrictions and one of the European Union on crude oil exports, which from where the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In the latest report this month, OPEC estimated that crude oil exports have fallen to the lowest level in the last thirty years about 2.8 million barrels per day. The main leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described the oil dependence as a "trap" before the Islamic Revolution of Iran in 1979 and the country must free itself.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Ing Perancis pilihan kanthi tradhisional minangka pengalaman teknologi rendhah: para pemilih ngisolasi dheweke dhewe ing sawijining kamar, menehake selembar kertas pra-cetak sing nuduhake calon pilihane dheweke padha ing sajroning amplop. Sakwise petugas resmi mriksa identitas pemilih, pemilih nglebokake amplop sajerone kothak swara lan nandha tangani daftar pemilih. Undang-undang pemilihan ing Perancis luwih kenceng nyusun prosese. Wiwit taun 1988, kothak swara kudu bening supaya pemilih lan pengawas bisa nyeksekake yen ora ana amplop sing ana aket wiwitan pemilihan lan ora ana amplop sing ditambah kajaba sing saka pemilih sing sah lan diitung resmi. Para calon bisa ngirimake wakil kanggo nyekseni kabeh bagean saka proses. Ing wayah sore, swara diwilang dening sukarelawan kanthi pengawasan sing ketat, ngetutake prosedur tartamtu.
mt: In France, the traditional voting experience is a low-tech affair: voters isolate themselves in a room, mark a pre-printed ballot with their choice inside an envelope. Once election officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into a ballot box and signs the voter list. French election law is more stringent in setting procedures. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can see that no envelopes are present at the start of the election and no envelopes are added except those from registered and counted voters. Candidates can send representatives to oversee every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under tight supervision, following specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Wis dipastekake, asil sing ditemokake iki nggenepi wolung-taun usahane Allen nggoleki Musashi. Sawise dipetha ing dhasar laut, bangke kapal kasebut ditemokake kanthi nggunakake ROV. Salah siji wong paling sugih, Allen dilapurake nandur modal akeh saka kasugihane ing jelajah segara lan miwiti upayane kanggo nemokake Musashi saka kawigatene tumrap paprangan.
mt: It was later revealed that the discovery of the ship ended Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. After being sunk at the bottom of the sea, the ship was found using a ROV. One of the richest, Allen was reported to have invested a lot of money from his wealth in sea voyages and began his efforts to find the Musashi from the rumors of the war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

mt: It was later revealed that the discovery of the ship ended Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. After being sunk at the bottom of the sea, the ship was found using a ROV. One of the richest, Allen was reported to have invested a lot of money from his wealth in sea voyages and began his efforts to find the Musashi from the rumors of the war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Lapuran TV nuduhake kebul putih asale saka pabrik. Pamarintah daerah ngengetake warga ing sakiwatengene pabrik supaya tetep ing jero omah, mateni piranti sing marai adhem lan ora ngombe banyu ledeng. Miturut badan nuklir Jepang, caesium radioaktip lan yodium wis diidentifikasi ing tandur-tanduran. Pehak panguwasa neksir menawa nuduhake yen kontaner sing nyimpen bahan bakar uranium ing lokasi bisa uga rusak lan bocor.
mt: TV reports show white powder from a factory. Local government asks residents near the factory to stay indoors, turn off appliances and not drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified in fields. Officials say that if containers holding uranium fuel at the site are damaged and leaking, it could be a problem.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll nemokake Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) ing wilayah Afrika Kidul KwaZulu-Natal. Ing wawancara, dheweke ngomong menawa varian anyar kasebut “marakake masalah lan kuwatir banget amarga tingkat kematiane sing dhuwur.” Sawetara pasien mungkin wis kena penyakit iku ing griya sakit, Dr. Moll mikir, lan paling ora loro yaiku petugas kasarasan griya sakit. Ing setaun, wong sing ketularan bisa nulari 10 nganti 15 wong sacedhake. Nanging, persentase TB-XDR-TB ing sakabehing kelompok wong-wong kanthi tuberkulosis isih katon sithik; 6000 saka total 330,000 wong-wong sing ketularan ing wektu tertemtu ing Afrika Kidul.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new strain "is a major problem and very worrying because of its high mortality rate." Some patients may have contracted the disease in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two are hospital staff. In a year, those infected can spread it to 10 to 15 people each. However, the percentage of XDR-TB among all those with tuberculosis is still small; 6000 out of a total 330,000 infected in South Africa at the time.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen minangka sistem sing dituntut FAA bakal ngidini montor mabur kanthi jalur sing luwih cendhek lan ngirit yutanan galon bahan bakar saben taun lan ngethok pancurating karbon. Iki nggunakake teknologi adhedhasar satelit tinimbang teknologi adhedhasar radar tanah sing lawas kanggo ngidini pangatur lalu lintas udara kanggo nuduhake pesawat kanthi tliti sing luwih dhuwur lan menehi pilot katrangan sing luwih kumplit.
mt: NextGen is the FAA's next-generation air traffic control system that will allow aircraft to fly more direct routes and save fuel and reduce emissions each year. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the old ground-based radar to provide more accurate and detailed traffic information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Ahli sarasilah nyacad kabijakan FBI sing kepungkur amarga nggawe fokus sumber daya marang perkara sing gampang dirampungake, utamane kasus mobil sing dicolong, kanthi maksud nambah kehe kaleksanan kantor. Kongres miwiti mbiayai inisiatif cabul ing pemungutan pajek 2005 lan netepake menawa FBI kudu ngerahake 10 agen menyang pornogrfi diwasa.
mt: FBI experts criticized the agency's previous focus on easy-to-solve cases, such as stolen cars, with the aim of increasing the number of solved cases. Congress began funding the initiative in 2005 and insisted that the FBI should reassign 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen tiba ing dalan kira-kira jam 9.30 esuk wektu lokal (0230 UTC) lan njeblug, nutup bendara kanggo panerbangan komersil. Pilot kuwi dikenali dadi Pimpinan Skuadron Dilokrit Pattavee. Media lokal nglaporke montor pemadham geni ning bandhara sing nggoling nalika lagi nanggepi.
mt: 39C Gripen arrived on the runway around 9.30 local time (0230 UTC) and took off, closing the runway for commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported a fuel spill at the airport while the plane was being refueled.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Sajerone taun 1960an, Brzezinski nyambut gawe karo John F. Kennedy minangka penasihate banjur administrasine Lyndon B. Johnson. Sajrone pamilihan 1976, dheweke menehi saran Carter babagan kabijakan luwar negeri, banjur dadi Penasihat Keamanan Nasional (NSA) wiwit taun 1977 nganti 1981, ngganteni Henry Kissinger. Minangka NSA, dheweke (lanang) nulungi Carter ing urusan diplomatik nangani urusan donya, kayata Camp David Accords, 1978; normalisasi hubungan AS-China gagasan hubungan ing pungkasan taun 1970-an; Revolusi Iran, sing ndadékaké krisis sandera Iran, 1979; lan invasi Soviet ing Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he (male) helped Carter in diplomatic matters such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Lahir ing tengah ibu kutha Kroasia, Zagreb, Bobek entuk ketenaran nalika main kanggo Partizan Belgrade. Dheweke gabung ing taun 1945 lan urip nganti taun 1958. Nalika wektune karo tim kasebut, dheweke nyitak 403 gol ing 468 tandhing. Ora ana liyane sing nate gawe penampilan utawa gawe skor luwih akeh gol kanggo klub tinimbang Bobek. Ing 1995 dheweke kapilih minangka pemain paling apik ing sejarah Partizan.
mt: Born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined in 1945 and lived until 1958. At the time with this team, he scored 403 goals in 468 games. There is no other player who has made a better performance or scored more goals for a club than Bobek. In 1995 he was elected as the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae kuwi jinis kewan saka kaluwarga Dromaeosauridae lan isih seduluran karo Velociraptor. Manuk pamangsa sing duwe getih anget lan kebak wulune sing dipercaya wis mlaku-mlaku nganggo sikil loro kanthi cakar kaya Velociraptor. Cakare sing kaping pindho luwih gedhe, satemah nyebabake jeneng Hesperonychus sing tegese “cakar kulon.”
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae  is a species of dinosaur in the family Dromaeosauridae and is closely related to  Velociraptor. The warm-blooded, feathered, two-legged carnivore with large, sharp claws is believed to have gradually evolved into the Velociraptor. The second claw is larger, giving the name  Hesperonychus, meaning “western claw.”
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Paling ora wong 100 wis tekan menyang pista iki, kanggo ngrayakake ulangtaun kapisan pasangan sing rabi taun kapungkur iki. Acara dirgahayu sing formal dijadwalake kanggo wektu sabanjure, ujare pegawe resmi. Pasangan sing krama ing Texas setaun kepungkur lan teka menyang Kebo kanggo ngrayakake bareng para kanca lan kaluwarga. Sing lanang 30 taun, lair ing Buffalo, yaiku salah siji saka papat korban mati ing panembakan, nanging garwane ora apa-apa.
mt: 100 or more people were on the runway, to celebrate the first anniversary of this couple who married last year. The formal celebration was scheduled for later, according to official sources. The couple from Texas last year came to Kebo to celebrate together with friends and family. The man, 30 years old, born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not anything.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno nggawa 120–160 meter kibik bensin sing dimuat nalika pecah banjur angin sing kenceng lan ombak ngilekke menyang bendungan. Helikopter nylametake rolas kru lan siji-sijine sing cedera yaiku siji irung rusak. Kapal 100 meter iku ana ing rute kanggo njupuk kargo pupuk biasane lan pisanane para pejabat wedi kapale isa mutahke muatan.
mt: 120–160 litres of fuel was being loaded when the plane broke up, then strong winds and waves crashed into the dam. A helicopter rescued the crew and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship 100 meters long was on its way to pick up a cargo of fertilizer and officials said the ship could be unloaded.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Arah gerakan Vautier ing njaba kalebu mogok mangan ing taun 1973 nglawan apa sing dheweke anggep minangka sensor politik. Ukuman ning Perancis diowahi. Kagiyatane bali menyang umur 15 nalika dheweke melu pasukan Rintangan Perancis nalika Perang Donya II. Dheweke ndokumentasekake awake dhewe ing buku taun 1998. Ing taun 1960, dheweke bali menyang Aljazair sing lagi bae mardika kanggo mulang ngarahake film.
mt: Vautier's direction outside included a hunger strike in 1973 against what he considered political censorship. His sentence was reduced. He returned to his age of 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented his life in a book in 1998. In 1960, he returned to Algeria which was just becoming independent to teach film direction.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Luwih saka patang yuta manungsa mara menyang Roma nglayat. Cacahe wong sing wis teka akeh banget saengga saben wong ora bakal oleh dalan menyang kuburan ing Lapangan St. Peter. Sawetara layar TV gedhe dipasang ing sawetara panggonan ing Roma supaya masyarakat bisa nonton upacara kasebut. Ing pirang-pirang kutha liyane ing Italia lan ing saindenging jagad, utamane ing Polandia, tatanan digawe padha, sing katon akeh masarakat.
mt: More than four million people are expected to visit Rome to attend. The number of people expected to attend is so large that no one will be able to walk to the cemetery in St. Peter's Square. Large TV screens have been set up in some places in Rome so that the public can watch the ceremony. In several other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements have been made, which many people can see.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Miturut cathetan, ana rusun ning Dalan Macbeth sing njebluk amarga gas bocor. Petugas saka perusahaan gas nglapur ing papan kadadean sakwise tangga teparo nilpun babagan gas bocor. Nalika pulisi tekan, rusun kuwi njebluk. Ora ana cidra gedhe sing dilapurne, nanging paling ora wong lima sing ana ing panggonan kadadeyan nalika mbledhos dirawat kanthi gejala kaget. Ora ana sing ana ing jero apartemen. Kala iku, ameh 100 warga dievakuasi saka areane.
mt: According to reports, a gas leak caused an explosion on Macbeth Street. Gas company personnel reported to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When police arrived, the apartment exploded. No major damage was found, but at least five people in the area were treated for shock. No one was home in the apartment. At the time, about 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Kurbane yaiku Nicholas Alden, 25, lan Zachery Cuddeback, 21, Cuddeback sing nyupiri. Edgar Vequilla lara ana lengen lan rahange nalika Kristoffer Scneider ditinggalke kanthi kahanan mbutuhake operasi ana raine. Gamane Uka ora bisa nalika ditudingne menyang sirahe wong kelima. Schneider duwe lara terus-terusan, wuta ing mripat siji, bagean tengkorak sing ilang lan rai sing dibentuk maneh saka titanium. Schneider mbuktekake liwat video saka pangkalan USAF ning negarane.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachery Cuddeback, Cuddeback who was driving. Edgar Vequilla suffered a broken leg and jaw while Kristoffer Scneider was left with a condition requiring facial reconstruction. Uka was not available when questioned by the fifth person. Schneider has suffered continuous pain, burns to one eye, a missing portion of the skull and a rebuilt jaw made of titanium. Schneider demonstrated through video from the USAF base in his country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Golf lan rugbi diatur bakal bali ing pertandingan Olimpiade. Kumisi Olimpiade Internasional milih nglebokake ulahraga ing rapat dewan eksekutif ing Berlin dina iki. Rugbi, kususe rugbi pepadon, lan golf dipilih saka limang ulahraga liyane kanggo ditimbang-timbang kanggo melu sarta ing Olimpiade. Olahraga tenis tembok, karate lan sepatu rodha nyoba mlebu ing program Olimpiade kaya baseball lan softball, sing kapilih kanggo Olimpiade ing taun 2005. Dhukungan iki isih bisa disahke dening kabeh anggota IOC sasi Oktober nalika rapat ning Kopenhagen.
mt: Golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee chose to include the sports in a meeting of its executive board in Berlin today. Rugby, rugby sevens, and golf were selected from five other sports to be considered and included in the Olympic Games. The sports of tennis, karate and roller skating are trying to get into the Olympic program like baseball and softball, which were selected for the Olympics in 2005. This support can still be confirmed by all IOC members in October at a meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Ing 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness nandha tangani kontrak 9.000 taun sewa kanggo panggonan gawe bir St James’ Gate ing Dublin, Irlandia. 250 taun sawise, Guinness wis thukul dadi bisnis global sing ngluwihi 10 milyar euro (14,7 milyar Dolar Amerika Serikat) saben taun.
mt: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for a brewery site at St James’ Gate in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has become a global business exceeding 10 billion euros (14.7 billion U.S. dollars) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Flu burung kuwi bisa mateni manungsa, H5N1, wis diumumke nulari bebek sing wis mati, ditemokake dina Senen, ana ning rawa cedhak Lyon ana sisih wetan Perancis. Perancis kuwi negara nomer pitu ana ning Uni Eropa sing kena virus, ditutke dening Austria, Jerman, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Yunani lan Italia. Kasus sing dicubriyani H5N1 ing Kroasia lan Denmark tetep ora dikonfirmasi.
mt: Bird flu has been confirmed to have spread to dead ducks, found on Monday, in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be hit by the virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Cases suspected of being H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark have not been confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Penjaga kedamaian PBB, sing teka ing Haiti sakwise lindhu 2010, disalahake kanggo penyebaran penyakit sing diwiwiti cerak kemahe pasukan kasebut. Miturut tuntutane, limbah saka kemah PBB ora diresiki kanthi bener, marakake bakteri kanggo mlebu anak kali saka Kali Artibonite, salah siji kale gedhene Haiti. Sadurunge prajurit kuwi tekan, Haiti durung nduweni perkara sing ana hubungane karo penyakit wiwit taun 1800an. Institut Haiti kanggo Keadilan lan Demokrasi wis milih diskusi mandiri sing ngusulke batalion sing njaga rasa ayem PBB Nepal tanpa sadar nggawa penyakit kasebut menyang Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, ahli penyakit saka PBB, ngendikan perkara anane kemungkinan yen wabah kuwi disebabke dening para wong sing njaga rasa ayem.
mt: UN peacekeepers who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake are accused of spreading disease. According to their demands, the waste from the UN camps was not properly cleaned, causing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before these soldiers arrived, Haiti had not had any issues related to disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has chosen to hold a private discussion that suggests the Nepalese UN peacekeepers unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a disease expert from the UN, states that the issue may be that the disease was caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Pemerintah Irlandia negaske pentinge pilihan parlemen kanggo ngowahi kahanan supaya dadi luwih apik. ""Iki saiki wigati saka perspektif kasarasan masyarakat lan pengadilan pidana menawa perundang-undangan iku digawe sacepet mungkin, kandhane juru wicara pamarentah. "" Mentri Kesehatan ngungkapake keprihatinane kanggo kasejahteraan saka wong-wong kang njupuk keuntungan saka legalitas sedhela saka zat-zat sing ketut, lan ukuman sing ana kaitane karo obat sing diwenehne awit owah-owahan saiki sing dudu konstitusional dilakokake."
mt: "The Irish government has indicated a willingness to change the law to make it better. ""This is now of great concern from the perspective of the public and the criminal courts when the legislation is made as soon as possible, the government's spokesman said. ""The Minister of Health expressed concern for the welfare of people who benefit from the legality of the substances, and the punishment associated with the drug is given away since the changes now that are not constitutional made."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, siji juru wicara Departemen Kepolisian Los Angeles, ngandharake tersangka tumindak pelanggaran lanang iku dipriksa amarga pelanggaran tinimbang pangrusakan. Tandhane ora katon rusak; owah-owahane dilakokake nganggo terpal ireng didandani nganggo tandha damai lan ati kanggo ngowahi aksara “O” kanggo maca aksara cilik “e”.
mt: Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia said the suspect was being questioned for misdemeanor vandalism rather than felony vandalism. The sign did not appear damaged; its repairs were made with black tarpaulin decorated with peace signs and hearts to change the letter "O" to read the small letter "e".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno iku guru privat basa Inggris sing kawentar nanging kontroversial sing mulang kanthi Pendhidhikan Moderen lan Kemulyaning Raja sing ngaku duwe 9,000 murid ing puncak karire. Ana ning cathetane dheweke nggunakake ukara-ukara sing diarani kasar dening wong tuwane, lan dheweke uga dilaporke nggunakake ukara-ukara sing kasar ana ning kelase. Modern Education nuduh dheweke nyitak iklan gedhe ing bus tanpa idin lan ngapusi kanthi ngomong menawa dheweke pimpinan tutor basa Inggris. Dheweke uga sadurunge wis dituduh nglanggar hak cipta, nanging ora didakwa. Tilas siswa ngomong menawa dheweke ‘nggunakake basa gaul ing kelas, mulang ketrampilan pacaran ing catetan, lan mung kaya kancane para siswa.
mt: The controversial private English tutor, who teaches Modern and Royal Education, which claims to have 9,000 pupils at the peak of his career, is reported to use coarse language in his own notes, and is also reported to use coarse language in class. Modern Education is reported to have made a large advertisement on a bus without permission and to have been fined for saying he was the leading English tutor. He has previously been accused of copyright infringement, but not charged. Former pupils say he "uses slang in class, teaches sex skills in notes, and is like his pupils".
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Mantan polisi Filipino nahan wisatawan Hong Kong dadi sandra kanthi mbajak buse ing Manila, ibu kuthane Filipina. Rolando Mendoza nembakake bedhile M16 menyang para wisatawan. Sawetara sandera dibebasake lan paling sethithik enem ditetepake mati tekan saiki. Enem mujangan, kalebu bocah lan wong tuwa, dibebasake luwih dhisik, uga para juru potret Filipina. Fotografer iku banjur njupuk papan siji wanita tua nalika dheweke (wanita) butuh jedhing. Mendoza ditembak mati.
mt: A former Filipino police officer held Hong Kong tourists hostage in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza shot at the tourists with an M16 rifle. Some hostages were released and at least six were killed so far. Six others, including children and elderly, were released earlier, also Filipino photographers. One of the photographers then took a picture of an elderly woman when she (the woman) needed help. Mendoza was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brasil kuwi negara sing mraktekake Katolik Roma sing paling gedhe ana ing donya, lan Gereja Katolik Roma mesthi ora ngidini yen ana wong wadon rabi karo wong wadon utawa wong lanang sing rabi karo wong lanang ning negara iki. Kongres Nasional Brasil wis bantah-bantahan legalisasi kanggo 10 taun, lan mantenan sipil kaya ngono saiki mung legal ing Rio Grande do Sul. Rancangan undhang-undhang sing asli kuwi dirancang dening mantan walikota São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. Undhang-undhang sing diajokne, sabubare diamandemen, saiki digawa dening Roberto Jefferson. Wong-wong sing protes kuwi ngarepake bisa nglumpukke petisi tandha tangan 1,2 yuta manungsa kanggo diwenehke Kongres Nasional sasi Nopember.
mt: Brazil is the country with the largest Catholic population in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church always disallows women to marry women or men to marry men in this country. The National Congress has been debating the legalization for 10 years, and same-sex marriage is only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was designed by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The bill, as amended, is now being carried by Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures to be delivered to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

Wong-wong sing protes kuwi ngarepake bisa nglumpukke petisi tandha tangan 1,2 yuta manungsa kanggo diwenehke Kongres Nasional sasi Nopember.
mt: Brazil is the country with the largest Catholic population in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church always disallows women to marry women or men to marry men in this country. The National Congress has been debating the legalization for 10 years, and same-sex marriage is only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was designed by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The bill, as amended, is now being carried by Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures to be delivered to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Limang menit tumuju pameran angin wiwit nggulung, watara semenit sabanjure, angin wiwit ngancik 70km/jam... banjur udan teka, nanging deres lan amba satemah ngeplak kulitmu kaya dom, banjur udan es tiba saka langit, wong-wong padha geger lan njerit lan mlayu siji marang liyane. Aku kelangan adhiku wadon lan kancane, lan nalika ing tengah dalan mrana ana wong lumpuh loro ing kursi roda, wong-wong mung mlumpati lan nyurung dheweke kabeh,” ujare Armand Versace.
mt: 5 minutes to the wind show started rolling, about a minute later, the wind started blowing 70km/h... then the rain came, but light and wide enough to peel your skin like a dome, then the rain came from the sky, people were scared and screamed and ran one to another. I lost my daughter and my niece, and when in the middle of the road there were two people in wheelchairs, people just rolled and pushed them all,” said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Prahara, sing ana ing udakara 645 mil (1040 km) sisih kulon Kepuloan Cape Verde, bisa uga bakal ilang sadurunge ngincim dhaerah dharatan ngendi wae, ujare pamethek cuaca. Fred saiki duwe angin 105 mil per jam (165 km/j) lan mlaku menyang kulon laut. Fred kuwi angin lesus tropis sing paling gedhe sing tau dicathet nganti saiki ana ing kidul lan wetan ana ing Atlantik wiwitane ana gambar saka sateli, lan dadi lesus katelu sing kacathet ana sisih wetan 35°W.
mt: The storm, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, could dissipate before reaching land anywhere, according to weather forecasters. Fred currently has winds of 105 mph (165 km/h) and is moving west-northwest. Fred is the weakest tropical storm ever recorded in the Atlantic basin since records began in 1966, and is the third weakest storm ever recorded in the eastern 35°W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Standar 802.11n mlaku ing frekwensi 2,4Ghz lan 5,0Ghz. Iki bakal ngidini cocog karo 802.11a, 802.11b lan 802.11g, kanthi sarat bilih setasyun dhasar duwe rong radio. Kacepetan 802.11n iku ameh kabeh luwih cepet saka sing sadurunge kanthi asil teori maksimal 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates at both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. This will allow it to interoperate with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has two radios. 802.11n's speed is theoretically faster than all previous standards, with a maximum of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Peraih medali emas Olimpiade iku bakal renang ing gaya bebas 100m lan 200m lan ing telu mlayu berantai ing Pertandhingan Persemakmuran, nanging gegayutan karo sambate kemampuane diragukan. Dhewek seprene ora bisa ngombe obat-obatan kanggo ngadhepi larane amarga iku dilarang ing Pertandhingan.
mt: The gold medalist at the Olympics will swim freestyle in the 100m and 200m and three relay events at the Commonwealth Games, but his association with performance-enhancing drugs is questioned. He is currently unable to take the banned drugs because of this.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Peta gempa internasional Panliten Geologis Amerika Serikat nuduhake manawa ora ana lindhu ing Islandia ing minggu sadurunge. Kantor Meteorologi Islandia uga nglapurake ora ana kamempengan gempa ing dhaerah Hekla sajrone 48 jam kepungkur. Owah-owahan kagiyatan sing diasilke dening lindhu sing penting kuwi kadadeyan tanggal 10 Maret ning sisih lor wetan kawah puncak gunung. Mendhung peteng sing ora ana hubungane karo kagiyatan gunung diumumke ana ngisor gunung. Awan menehi potensi bingung apa sawijining jeblugan sing satemene wis dumadi.
mt: An international seismograph network operated by the United States Geological Survey showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no volcanic activity in the area of the Hekla volcano in the past 48 hours. Changes in activity associated with a major eruption occurred on March 10 on the north-east side of the summit crater. The lack of any connection to volcanic activity was announced under the mountain. Clouds give the potential for confusion what a jet had already happened.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Pangorbit rembulan tanpa awak Chandrayaan-1 lunar wetokake Moon Impact Probe (MIP), sing nglewati lumahing Rembulan kanthi kacepatan 1,5 kilometer per detik (3000 mil saben jam), lan kaleksanan tekan ing cedhak kutub kidul Rembulan. Sakliyane gawa telu piranti ilmiah sing penting, satelit rembulan uga gawa gambar genderane India, digambar ning ngendi-endi.
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter's Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour), and impacted near the lunar south pole.  Besides three important scientific instruments, the lunar orbiter also carried a picture of India, photographed from everywhere.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Kasus pisanan saka penyakit mangsa iki ditemokake ana pungkasan sasi Juli. Lelaran iki digawa dening babi, sing banjur pindhah menyang manungsa liwat lemut. Wabah iki wis ndhesuk pemerintah India kanggo nindakake kayata langkah-langkah penyebaran penangkap babi ing wewengkon sing kena dampak serius, nyalurake ewon korden lemut lan nyemprotake pestisida. Pirang-pirang yuta botol vaksin encephalitis uga wis dijanjekake dening pamrentah, sing bakal mbantu nyiyapake lembaga kasarasan kanggo taun ngarep. Anggitan kanggo vaksin sing arep dikirim menyang dhaerah sing paling kena dampak historis ing taun iki diundur amarga kurang dana lan prioritas sing kurang dibandhingake karo penyakit liyane.
mt: The first case of this disease was found in late July. The outbreak was carried by pigs, which then passed to humans through lice. The Indian government has been criticized for not taking adequate measures to contain the spread of the disease, including slaughtering pigs in affected areas, spraying pesticides, and vaccinating millions of people against encephalitis. Supplies of the vaccine, which were to be sent to the most affected areas this year, were delayed due to lack of funding and prioritization of other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Usul anpangowahan iku uwis lulus saka tetimbangane majelis ing taun 2011. Sawijining ewah-ewahan digawe ing sesi legislatif iki nalika ukara kaping pindho dibusak sepisan dening Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat lan sabanjure disahke kanthi bentuk sing padha dening Senat Senin. Gagal ukara kapindho, sing ngusulake supaya nglarang sarekat sipil kang padha jinis, bisa uga mbukak lawang kanggo sarekat sipil ing mangsa ngarep. Ngetutke prosese, HJR-3 bakal ditiliki maneh dening wakil sing kepilih nalika taun 2015 utawa 2016 supaya tetep ana ing proses iki.
mt: The proposal has already passed the House of Representatives in 2011. One amendment was made in this legislative session when the second reading was rejected by the House of Representatives and later passed in the same form by the Senate on Monday. The second reading failed, the sponsor to prohibit same-sex marriage could also open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be taken up again by the elected representatives in 2015 or 2016 to keep this process going.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Kertas Panama yaiku ukara payung kanggo sepuluh yuta dokumen saka firma hukum Panama Mossack Fonseca, sing bocor menyang pers mangsa semi 2016. "" Layange nuduhake patbelas bank ngewangi pelanggan sing sugih ndelikake banda milyaran dolar Amerika kanggo ngindhari pajek lan peraturan liyane. Ariwarti Inggris The Guardian ngusulake Bank Deutsche ngawasi kanthi sekabehane sapertelon saka 1200 perusahaan cangkang sing biasa ngrampungake iki. Ana protes ing saindenging jagad, sawetara nuntut paukuman, lan para panuntun saka pamarentah Islandia lan Pakistan wis mundur."
mt: """Panama Papers is the nickname for ten million documents from Panama-based law firm Mossack Fonseca, which leaked to the press in April 2016. The papers revealed how the world's rich and powerful hid billions of dollars in offshore companies to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank was involved in setting up 1,200 shell companies for the clients of this firm. There were protests around the world, some demanded punishment, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan have resigned."""
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Kacilakan dirgantara iku lumrah ing Iran, sing duweni armada tuwa sing kurang dijaga kanggo operasi umum lan militer. Sanksi-sanksi internasional ateges menawa pesawat anyar ora bisa dituku. Wiwitan minggu iki, kacilakan helikopter pulisi mateni wong telu lan tatu telu liyane. Pungkasan wulan Iran nyekseni wancana udhara paling ala sajrone pirang-pirang taun nalika montor mabur kang nuju Armenia tabrakan, mateni 168 panumpang. Sasi kangg padha ndelok pesawat liya metu saka landasan pacu ing Mashhad lan nabrak tembok, mateni wong pitu welas.
mt: Aerial accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet of poorly maintained civilian and military aircraft. International sanctions mean new aircraft cannot be purchased. Last week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and injured three others. Last month, Iran's worst air disaster in years occurred when a domestic flight to Armenia collided, killing 168 passengers. The same month, another plane veered off the runway in Mashhad and crashed into a wall, killing 18.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Klompok Panliten Irak nuduhake lapuran ing jam 12.00 GMT. Iki ngelingake ora ana kang bisa njamin menawa tumindak apa wae ing Irak kala iki bisa nguwisi perang sektarian, kekerasan sing tuwuh, utawa tibane menyang gonjang-ganjinge. Lapurane dibukak kanthi permohonan kanggo debat terbuka lan pembentukan permufakatan ing Amerika Serikat babagan kabijakan marang Timur Tengah. Lapuran kasebut kritis banget dhateng meh kabeh sisih kabijakan Eksekutif saiki marang Irak lan ndhesek kanggo lekas ngganti arah. Sepisan ing antarane 78 rekomendasie yaiku menawa sawijining gagasan diplomatik anyar kudu dijupuk sadurunge pungkasan taun iki kanggo ngamanke perbatasan Irak saka campur tangan memungsuhan lan kanggo mbangun meneh hubungan diplomatik karo tangga teparone.
mt: 12:00 GMT. This report highlights the fact that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq now will prevent sectarian war, rising violence, or the return of chaos. The report is critical of almost every aspect of current US policy in Iraq and calls for a quick change of direction. Among 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from outside interference and to build up diplomatic relations with all its neighbours.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Klompok Panliten Irak nuduhake lapuran ing jam 12.00 GMT. Iki ngelingake ora ana kang bisa njamin menawa tumindak apa wae ing Irak kala iki bisa nguwisi perang sektarian, kekerasan sing tuwuh, utawa tibane menyang gonjang-ganjinge. Lapurane dibukak kanthi permohonan kanggo debat terbuka lan pembentukan permufakatan ing Amerika Serikat babagan kabijakan marang Timur Tengah. Lapuran kasebut kritis banget dhateng meh kabeh sisih kabijakan Eksekutif saiki marang Irak lan ndhesek kanggo lekas ngganti arah. Sepisan ing antarane 78 rekomendasie yaiku menawa sawijining gagasan diplomatik anyar kudu dijupuk sadurunge pungkasan taun iki kanggo ngamanke perbatasan Irak saka campur tangan memungsuhan lan kanggo mbangun meneh hubungan diplomatik karo tangga teparone.
mt: 12:00 GMT. This report highlights the fact that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq now will prevent sectarian war, rising violence, or the return of chaos. The report is critical of almost every aspect of current US policy in Iraq and calls for a quick change of direction. Among 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from outside interference and to build up diplomatic relations with all its neighbours.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. src: Miturut Ansa, “polisi kuwatir tumrap sawetara serangan tingkat dhuwur sing diuwatirke bisa nyebabake perang turunan. Pulisi ujar Lo Piccolo wis misuwur amarga dheweke minangka tangan tengen Provenzano ing Palermo lan pangalaman sing luwih gedhe nggawe dheweke oleh pakurmatan saka bregada pamimpin sing luwih tuwa nalika padha ngupayakake kabijakan Provenzano supaya bisa njaga kanthi asor kambi nguwatake jaringan kuwasa. Bos-bos iki wis dikuwasani dening Provenzano nalika dheweke mungkasi perang kang digerakake Riina nglawan negara kang ngrebut uripe pemuka Mafia Giovanni Falcone lan Paolo Borsellino ing 1992.”
mt: According to Ansa, "Police fear for some high-level attacks that are feared to cause a civil war. Police say Lo Piccolo is well known because he is the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo and his greater experience makes him respected by older leaders who were also implementing Provenzano's policies to keep the organization with a low profile. These bosses were controlled by Provenzano when he ended the war waged by Riina against the state that killed mob leaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Ahli Judi Jepang Hitoshi Saito, sing menangke medali emas kaing pindo Olimpiade, mati nalika umure 54. Sebab matine diumumke yaiku kanker ing saluran empedu intrahepatik. Dheweke seda ing Osaka dina Selasa. Kaya dene mantan juara Olimpiade lan Donya, Saito iku ketua komite pelatihan Federasi Kabeh Judo Jepang nalika dheweke mati.
mt: Japanese judo champion Hitoshi Saito, who won the gold medal in the 1984 Olympics, died at age 54. The cause of death was announced as liver cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. Like the former Olympic and World champion, Saito was chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation training committee when he died.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Nalika lelungan, Iwasaki nemoni masalah ing pirang-pirang kasempatan. Dheweke dirampok dening perompak, diserang ing Tibet dening siji segawon edan, lolos saka mantenan ing Nepal lan ditangkap ing India.
mt: During the journey, Iwasaki encountered problems in several instances. He was robbed by bandits, attacked in Tibet by a wild yak, escaped from a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella kelangan kendhali marang montore banjur ngrampungke balapan iki ora suwe sabubare balapan diwiwiti. Kanca sak klompoke Fernando Alonso iku dadi sing mimpin ana akeh balapan, nanging mandheg sabubare ganti ban, kira-kira amarga ban ngarep selip. Michael Schumacher mungkasi balapane ora suwe sawise Alonso, amarga karusakan suspensi ing saperangan mungsuhan nalika balapan.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and finished the race shortly after the race began. Teammate Fernando Alonso was leading many laps, but stopped shortly after a pit stop, possibly due to a front tire blowout. Michael Schumacher finished the race shortly after Alonso, due to suspension damage early in the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Sasuwene 3 sasi kepungkur, 80 tahanan diculke saka fasilitas Pusat Panerima lan Klasifikasi tanpa diukum kanthi resmi. Ing April taun iki, sawijining perintah penahanan sauntara dikabarake dening Hakim Glynn marang fasilitas iku kanggo nyelenggarakake pembebasan wong-wong sing ditahan luwih saka 24 jam sawise mlebune sing ora nampa sidhang dening pengacara pengadilan. Komisaris kuwi wis netepake jaminan, yen dikabulke, lan ngresmekake tuntutan sing digawe dening petugas sing katangkep. Tuntutan kuwi banjur bakal mlebu menyang sistem komputer wilayah sing bisa nemokake kasus kuwi. Sidang kasebut uga nandhakake tanggal kanggo hak tersangka kanggo pengadilan sing cepet.
mt: 80 detainees were released from the facilities of the Reception and Classification Center without formal charges. In April this year, a temporary restraining order was issued by Judge Glynn to the facility to conduct the release of people detained for more than 24 hours after entering without being served by court-appointed counsel. The commissioner was ordered to post bail, if accepted, and to make the charges made by the arrested officers. The charges will then enter the area's computer system which can find this case. The hearing also set a date for the accused to appear in court.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin uga ngandhakake komisi mutuske kanggo mbatalake putaran iku kanggo nylametake wong-wong Afganistan saka resiko beya lan keamanan pemilu liyane. Diplomat ngomong menawa wis nemokake keambiguan sing cukup ing Konstitusi Afghan kanggo mesthekake menawa pemilihan ulang ora dibutuhne. Iki mbantah laporan sadurunge, sing kandha menawa mbatalake pamilihan mum bakal nglawan konstitusi.
mt: The storm also raised a commission to decide whether to cancel this round to release Afghans from the risk and security of other elections. A diplomat said that enough ambiguity has been found in the Afghan Constitution to require that a re-election is not needed. This contradicts previous reports, which said that canceling the election would violate the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Wiwit kamardikan Pakistan saka pamrentah Inggris ing taun 1947, Presiden Pakistan wis milih ""Agen Politik"" kanggo mrentah FATA, sing nindakake kendhali otonomi sing meh pepak ing dhaerah kasebut. Agen-agen kasebut tanggung jawab nyedhiyakake layanan pamrentah lan pangadilan miturut Pasal 247 Konstitusi Pakistan."
mt: "Since the independence of Pakistan from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed ""political agents"" to govern the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, which have enjoyed near-autonomous rule. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Film kasebut, sing nampilake Ryan Gosling lan Emma Stone, oleh nominasi ing kabeh klompok utama. Gosling lan Stone nampa nominasi kanggo Aktor lan Aktris paling apik kanthi urut-urutan. Nominasi liyane kalebu Gambar Paling Apik, Sutradara, Sinematografi, Desain Kostum, Edit Film, Musik Asli, Desain Produksi, Edit Swara, Campuran Swara lan Naskah Asli. Rong lagu saka film kasebut, Audition (The Fools Who Impian) lan City of Stars, dipilih kanggo lagu asli paling apik. Lionsgate Studio nampa 26 nominasi - luwih saka studio liyane.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively. Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Impian)" and "City of Stars", were selected for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studio received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK uga nglapurake manawa tenaga nuklir Kashiwazaki Kariwa ing prefektur Niigata digunakake kanthi biyasa. Hokuriku Electric Power Co nglapurake ora ana dampak saka lindhu lan reaktor nomer 1 lan 2 ing pabrik listrik tenaga nuklir Shika ditutup. Iki dilaporake menawa watara 9400 omah ing daerah iku tanpa banyu lan watara 100 tanpa listrik. Sawetara dalan wis kerusak, layanan rel kealang ing wilayah sing kena, lan Bandara Noto ing prefektur Ishikawa tetep ditutup.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co reported that there was no impact from the earthquake and the number 1 and 2 reactors at the Shika nuclear power plant were closed. It was reported that about 9,400 homes in the area were without water and about 100 were without power. Some roads were damaged, rail service was suspended in the affected area, and Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Dokumen kuwi, miturut kabar sing wis metu, bakal nuduhake perkara watesan, sing dipingini dening Palestina miturut watesan sadurunge Perang Timur Tengah taun 1967. Topik liyane sing dilaporke dibahas kalebu wujude Yerusalem mbesuke sing sakral kanggo kabeh negara lan perkara Lembah Yordania. Israel nuntut tekane saradhadhu sing mblandreng ing lembah sajrone sepuluh taun sawise mupakat ditapak asmani nalika PA sarujuk kanggo ninggalake ngarsane kasebut mung limang taun.
mt: The document, according to reports, will outline border issues, which Palestinians claim according to pre-1967 Six-Day War borders. Other topics reported to be discussed include the shape of Jerusalem, sacred to both states, and the issue of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands the removal of the mixed population in the valley ten years after the 2005 Disengagement Plan, when the PA agreed to leave the aforementioned enclave only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Lair in Hong Kong, Ma sinau ing Universitas New York lan Sekolah Ukum Harvard lan tau duwe kertu penduduk permanen “kertu ijo”. Hsieh ngandhut nalika pemilihan menawa Ma bisa uga mlayu saka negara nalika wektune krisis. Hsieh uga mbantah menawa Ma sing fotogenik luwih menyang gaya tinimbang isine. Sanadyan ana turuhan iki, Ma menang kanthi gampang ing mimbar sing ngadvokasi tetalen sing luwih raket karo dharatan utama China.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and held a permanent resident "green card". Hsieh denied during the campaign that Ma could also move away from the mainland when the crisis. Hsieh also denied that Ma was more photogenic than his policies. Despite these efforts, Ma won easily in the forum advocating closer ties with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Lair in Hong Kong, Ma sinau ing Universitas New York lan Sekolah Ukum Harvard lan tau duwe kertu penduduk permanen “kertu ijo”. Hsieh ngandhut nalika pemilihan menawa Ma bisa uga mlayu saka negara nalika wektune krisis. Hsieh uga mbantah menawa Ma sing fotogenik luwih menyang gaya tinimbang isine. Sanadyan ana turuhan iki, Ma menang kanthi gampang ing mimbar sing ngadvokasi tetalen sing luwih raket karo dharatan utama China.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and held a permanent resident "green card". Hsieh denied during the campaign that Ma could also move away from the mainland when the crisis. Hsieh also denied that Ma was more photogenic than his policies. Despite these efforts, Ma won easily in the forum advocating closer ties with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Sabubare dadi cetho yen akeh kaluwarga golek pitulungan supaya ora dikon ngalih, banjur dianakke rapat tanggal 20 Maret ana ing Punjer Ukuman Paguyuban Teluk Wetan kanggo korban kapusan bab omah-omahan. Nalika panyewa miwiti nuduhake apa sing kedadeyan marang dheweke, umume kulawargane sing kesangkut ujug-ujug ngerti yen Carolyn Wilson saka OHA nyolong dhuwit jaminan, lan mlumpat metu saka kutha. Sing nyewa Taman Lockwood percaya yen ana luwih saka 40 kaluwarga utawa luwih sing kudu dikongkon minggat, amarga dheweke mangerteni yen polisi OHA uga mriksa omah umum liyane ning Oakland sing uga bisa kajebak apus-apus omah.
mt: After becoming frustrated when many families sought help to avoid eviction, the landlord held a meeting on March 20 at the East Bay Municipal Court for the victims of the house fire. When the tenants began to tell what happened to them, most of the families involved immediately knew that Carolyn Wilson of OHA was stealing the security deposit, and fled the city. The tenants of Lockwood Park believe that more than 40 families or more need to be evicted, because they know that OHA police also inspected other public housing in Oakland that could also be burned.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Sawise balapan kasebut, Selowski terus mimpin Kampiyun Nyetir kanthi 2.250 poin. Pitung angka saburine Johnson iku nomer loro kanthi 2.243. Ing posisi ketelu, Hamlin ketinggalan 20 poin, nanging isih luwih 5 poin saka Bowyer. Kahne lan Truex, Jr. masing-masing ing posisi kelima lan keenem kanthi 2.220 lan 2.207 poin. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, lan Harvick ngrampungake sepuluh posisi paling dhuwur kanggo Kampiyun Pembalap kanthi turah patang balapan ing musim iki.
mt: After the race, Selowski continued to lead the Cup Drivers' Championship with 2,250 points. Johnson trailed by 7 points in second with 2,243. Hamlin was third, 20 points behind, but still 5 points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. were fifth and sixth with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick rounded out the top ten drivers for the Cup Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Iki dipercaya dadi sing kaping lima ing sarasilah manawa wong wis mirsani apa nyatane dat sing ana ing mars sing diantepake tiba ing Bumi. Saka watara 24.000 watu lintang sing tiba ing Bumi, kira-kira namung 34 sing wis dibuktekake asale saka Mars. Limolas watu iki dadi cirine udan lintang sasi Juli kapungkur. Sawetara watu, sing arang banget ana ing jagad donya, diadol saka US$11.000 nganti $22.500 saben ons, yaiku kaping sepuluhe rega emas.
mt: This is believed to be the fifth meteorite ever seen to fall to Earth. Of the 24,000 meteorites that have fallen to Earth, about 34 are believed to have come from Mars. These five stones are the first to fall in July. Some of the stones, which are rare in the world, are sold for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, or about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher sing pensiun ing 2006 sawise menang kejuaraan Formula 1 kaping pitu, bakal nggenteni Felipe Massa sing luka. Wong Brazil iku nandhang cidra abot ing sirah sawise kecelakaan nalika Grand Prix Hungaria 2009. Massa kaitane metu paling ora ing sisa musim 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning his seventh title, will replace Felipe Massa, who was injured. The Brazilian suffered a severe head injury in a crash at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is expected to miss the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Nganti saiki, AOL wis bisa ngalih lan ngembangke pasar IM kanthi carane dhewe, amarga digunakake dening akeh wong ning Amerika Serikat. Kanthi paugeran ing papan, kebebasan iki isa uga tamat. Akehe pangguna layanan Yahoo! lan Microsoft sing digabungake bakal nandhingi akehe pangguna AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL has been able to shift and grow its IM market on its own, because it was used by many people in the United States. With the merger, this freedom may end. All users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services will be able to see all AOL users.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Montor sing dipasangi bom ana ning kantor punjer kantor polisi ning Gaziantep, Turki wingi esuk mateni pulisi loro lan nglarani luwih saka 20 wong. Kantor gubernur ngendikan yen songolas wong sing lara kuwi kabeh pulisi. Pulisi ujar manawa dheweke sujana marang militan Daesh (ISIL) sing tanggungjawab marang serangan kasebut.
mt: A vehicle carrying a bomb exploded at the central office of the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey early morning killing two police officers and injuring more than 20 people. The governor's office said all the injured were police officers. Police said they believe the attack was carried out by Daesh (ISIL) militants.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mantan gubernur Massachusetts menangke Partai Republik Florida pilihan utama presiden dina Selasa kanthi etungan swara 46 persen saka total swara. Mantan Juru Wicara Gedhung Newt Gingrich Amerika Serikat manggon urutan kaping loro kanthi swara 32 persen. Minangka negara bagian ing ngendi pemenang entuk kabeh, Florida menehake kabeh wakile kanggo Romney, ngajokake dheweke minangka juara utama kanggo nominasi Partai Republikan.
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican primary on Tuesday with 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich of Georgia came in second with 32 percent. As a state where the winner takes all, Florida awarded all of its delegates to Romney, putting him in the lead for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
