src: Mantan Juru Wicara Newt Gingrich, gubernus Texas Rick Perry, lan anggota Kongres wanita Michele Bachmann rapung urutan kaping papat, kaping lima, lan kaping nem, urut-urutan. Sawise asile teka, Gingrich ngalem Santorum, nanging duwe tembung sing kasar kanggo Romney, sing duwe kepentingan iklan kampanye negatif ditayangake ing Iowa nglawan Gingrich. Perry ngendikan yen dheweke bakal “bali menyang Texas kanggo ngira-ngira asil saka pemilihan, nemtokake yen ana dalan maju kanggo awakku dhewe ana pemilihan iki”, nanging dheweke uga ngendikan yen bakal tetep melu pemilihan lan tandhing tanggal 21 Januari ning South Carolina sing utamane. Bachmann, sing menangke Pilihan Ames Straw sasi Agustus, mutuske ora kampanye maneh.
mt: Former Newt Gingrich spokesman, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann fell to fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich attacked Santorum, but also had harsh words for Romney, who has been airing negative campaign ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "go back to Texas to figure out the results of this election, and decide whether there is a path forward for me in this election," but also said he would continue to campaign and debate on January 21 in South Carolina, where he is expected to do well. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, dropped out of the race.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Situs jaringan stasiun iku nggambarake pertunjukan iku minangka “teater radio sekolah tua kanthi sawijining puteran anyar lan kaku sing ngisin-isini!” Ing wiwitan dina, pagelaran iku namung mligi ing situs radio internet Radio TogiNet sing wis suwe lumaku, sawijining situs sing mligi bab radio pacelathon. Ana akhir taun 2015, TogiNet ngedegake Radio AstroNet dadi anak stasiun. Pagelaran kuwi mulane nampilne aktor swara amatir, saka Texas wetan.
mt: The radio drama website's network station described the show as "a classic school radio play with a new twist and a dash of sass!"  At the beginning of the day, the show was only on the internet radio station Radio TogiNet, which had been running for a long time, a site that was all about radio pacelathon.  At the end of 2015, TogiNet launched Radio AstroNet as a daughter station.  The show was therefore performed by amateur voice actors, from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Sing nyerang kutha Mumbai tekan numpak prau tanggal 26 November 2008, gawa granat, bedhil otomatis lan ngenani target sing akeh banget kalebu Terminal Stasiun sepur Chhatrapati Shivaji sing rame lan Hotel Taj Maahal sing misuwur. Cara mimpin lan uga cara golek informasi David Headley kasil nulung operasi iki supaya bisa dilakokne dening 10 tukang mbedhil saka klompok militan Laskhar-e-Taiba Pakistan. Serangan kasebut nyebabake tekanan gedhe ing hubungan India lan Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008 Mumbai attacks were carried out by terrorists who arrived by boat on 26 November 2008, armed with grenades, automatic weapons and a large number of targets including the busy Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station and the famous Hotel Taj Mahal. The leadership and also the way to search for information David Headley succeeded in helping this operation to be carried out by 10 terrorists from the Laskhar-e-Taiba Pakistan militant group. This attack caused great pressure on the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Cathethan adhep-adhepan Nadal nglawan Kanada yaiku 7-2. Dheweke urung suwe kalah ngelawan Raonic ing Brisbane Open. Nadal njaluk 88% poin resik ing sajrone pertandhingan sing menangke 76 poin ing giliran sepisan. Sawise pertandhingan, Raja Clay kandha, “Aku mung seneng mbalik ing ronde pungkasan pertandhingan paling penting. Aku saiki ing kene kanggo nyoba menangke iki.”
mt: Nadal lost to Canada 7-2. He struggled to overcome Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal asked for 88% of the points in the match, winning 76 points in the first round. After the match, King Clay said, "I'm just happy to come back in the final round of the most important match. I'm here now to try to win this."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Minggu wingi, Warta Uda ngumumake menawa warta kasebut bakal kanthi dramatis ngundhakake mandat basa internasionale kanggo laporan warta, nganggo telung siaran anyar. Wis dilapurake ing basa Inggris lan Jepang, organisasi sak jagad iki metokake program ing Spanyol, Italia lan Korea, kanggo TV, web, lan piranti gesit.
mt: Last Sunday, the AP announced that the story would be dramatically increased in the international news mandate for reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reported in English and Japanese, this organization takes a program in Spanish, Italian and Korean, for TV, web, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Minggu wingi, Warta Uda ngumumake menawa warta kasebut bakal kanthi dramatis ngundhakake mandat basa internasionale kanggo laporan warta, nganggo telung siaran anyar. Wis dilapurake ing basa Inggris lan Jepang, organisasi sak jagad iki metokake program ing Spanyol, Italia lan Korea, kanggo TV, web, lan piranti gesit.
mt: Last Sunday, the AP announced that the story would be dramatically increased in the international news mandate for reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reported in English and Japanese, this organization takes a program in Spanish, Italian and Korean, for TV, web, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Saliyane acara dina Rebu, Carpanedo melu kompetisi ing rong balapan individu ing Kejuaraan. Sing sepisan yaiku Slalom, ing ngendi dheweke antuk Ora Ngrampungake ing mlayune sing sepisan. 36 saka 116 pesaing duwe hasil sing padha ing balapan iku. Balapane dheweke sing liyane, Slalom Gedhe, ndelok dheweke rampung ing posisi kesepuluh ing klompok lungguh wanita kanthi kombinasi wektu 4:41.30, 2:11.60 menit luwih alon tinimbang sing rampung nomer siji Claudia Loesch saka Austria lan 1:09.02 luwih alon tinimbang sing rampung nomer sanga Gyöngyi Dani saka Hungaria. Papat pemain ski ing klompok lungguh wanita gagal ngrampungake balapane, lan 45 saka 117 gunggung pemain ski ing Giant Slalom mrucut entuk rangking balapan.
mt: 36 of 116 competitors tied for the first run in the Slalom, a race Carpanedo did not finish. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, ended her in tenth place in the women's group with a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes faster than the first-place finisher Claudia Loesch of Austria and 1:09.02 faster than the sixth-place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four of the 17 women's group skiers failed to finish the Giant Slalom, and 45 of 117 total skiers in Giant Slalom did not finish the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Dina Rebo kasebut, Pakumpulan Basket Nasional Amerika Serikat (NBA) nundha musim basket profesional amarga kuwatir babagan COVID-19. Putusane NBA ngetutne pemain Utah Jazz sing dites positip ing virus COVID-19.
mt: On Thursday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns about COVID-19. The NBA followed the Utah Jazz player testing positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Dina Rebo kasebut, Pakumpulan Basket Nasional Amerika Serikat (NBA) nundha musim basket profesional amarga kuwatir babagan COVID-19. Putusane NBA ngetutne pemain Utah Jazz sing dites positip ing virus COVID-19.
mt: On Thursday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns about COVID-19. The NBA followed the Utah Jazz player testing positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Pemain paling apik dina iki yaiku Alex Ovechkin saka Ibu Kutha Washington. Dheweke duwe 2 gol lan 2 umpan gol ing kamenangan Washington 5-3 nglawan Atlanta Thrashers. Pitulungan Ovechkin sing kaping pisan wengi iki yaiku gol sing menangke-tandhing iki dening rookie Nicklas Backstrom; Gule sing kaping pindho wengi kuwi iku gule sing ke 60 mangsa iki, dadi pemain pisanan sing ngegulake 60 utawa luwih ing sak mangsa awit 1995-96, nalika Jaromir Jagr lan Mario Lemieux saben-saben nekani titik pencapaian kuwi.
mt: The game's top scorer was Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first goal of the night was assisted by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Bank Northern Rock wis dinasionalisasi ing 2008 sawise penerangan menawa perusahaane wis nampa panyengkuyung darurat saka Pamarentah Inggris. Bank Northern Rock mbutuhake dhukungan amarga paparan sing kadadeyan sasuwene krisis finansial taun 2007. Kasepakatane Klompok Prawan Pak Richard Branson ditolak dening bank sadurunge bank kuwi digawe nasional. Ing taun 2010, nalika wis didadekake duweke negara, bank dalan gedhe Northern Rock Plc saiki dipisah saka 'bank ala', Northern Rock (Pangurusan Modal). Virgin mung tuku ‘good bank’ saka Northern Rock, dudu perusahaan manajemen aset.
mt: Bank Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after reports that it had received emergency funding from the British government. Bank Northern Rock needed support after the exposure it suffered during the 2007 financial crisis. The offer from Richard Branson's Virgin Group was rejected by the bank before it was made a nationalised bank. In 2010, when it was made a state-owned bank, Northern Rock Plc, the 'bad bank', was separated from the 'good bank', Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the 'good bank' from Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Kaputusane Pak Rudd kanggo nandhatangani kasepakatan iklim Kyoto gawe misahke Amerika Serikat, sing saiki bakal dadi siji-sijine negara maju sing ora bakal ngadopsi kasepakatan kasebut. Mantan pamrentah konservatif Australia nolak kanggo ngesahne Kyoto, ngomong manawa iku bakal ngrusak ekonomi kanthi ngandhalake banget marang ekspor batu bara, dene negara-negara kaya India lan China ora dijiret dening target emisi.
mt: The Rudd government's refusal to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement makes Australia the only developed country not to adopt it. The former conservative Australian prime minister rejected Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy by restricting coal exports, while countries like India and China are not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

Mantan pamrentah konservatif Australia nolak kanggo ngesahne Kyoto, ngomong manawa iku bakal ngrusak ekonomi kanthi ngandhalake banget marang ekspor batu bara, dene negara-negara kaya India lan China ora dijiret dening target emisi.

src: Tukang mbedhil ning uji coba kendhali hama kudu diawasi kanthi ketat dening pengawas, amarga latian iki dipantau lan dievaluasi. Ing kongsi NPWS lan Pakumpulan Pambedhil Ulahraga saka Australi (NSW) Inc., relawan sing trep karo sarat direkrut, sangisore program grema Pakumpulan Pambedhil Ulahraga . Miturut Mick O'Flynn, Panjabat Direktur Konservasi lan Warisan Taman karo NPWS, papat panembak sing dipilih kanggo operasi panembakan kapisan nampa pituduh keamanan lan panglantih pepak.
mt: Trainers in the pest control trials must be closely monitored by supervisors, as this is a monitored and evaluated trial. In the NPWS and NSW Sports Shooting Association (SSA) partnership, volunteers are recruited under the Sports Shooting Association's Gremlins program. According to Mick O'Flynn, Director of Conservation and Heritage with NPWS, four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: """Miturut fosil iki, tegese anggone misahke iki kadadeyan luwih awal tinimbang sing dikarepke dening bukti molekul. "" Iku tegese kabeh kudu dibalekake,” ujar panliti ing Layanan Panlitian Lembah Rift ing Ethiopia lan rekan penulis saka panlitiane, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: """According to this fossil, it means that this separation occurred earlier than was previously thought by molecular evidence. "" It means everything has to be rethought,” said the study's lead researcher, Berhane Asfaw, of the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study."""
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Nalika presentasi inti dina Kemis saka Pagelaran Game Tokyo, presidene Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngluncurake desain controller kanggo konsol anyar Nintendo Revolution saka perusahaane. Persis karo remot TV, pangatur nggunakake rong sensor sing dipasang ing cedhak TV pangguna kanggo nggawe triangulasi posisi ing lowahan telung dimensi. Iki bakal gawe pemain kuwi supaya bisa ngendhalekake polahe lan obahe ning dolanan pideo kuwi kanthi ngobahke piranti kuwi liwat hawa ing sakiwa tengene.
mt: At the heart of Thursday's Tokyo Game Show presentation, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the controller for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Like a TV remote, the device uses two sensors mounted near the player's TV to create a three-dimensional map of the player's movements in the game. This will allow players to manipulate objects and characters in the game by moving the device through the air in front of them.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Sadurunge kantor pawarta Xinhua Cina nglapurake ana montor mabur bakal dibajag. Laporan kuwi banjur ngumumke yen montor mabur kuwi nrima anceman bom banjur dialihke bali menyang Afganistan, mandheg ana ning Kandahar. Lapuran awal ujar montor mabur kasebut dielih balik menyang Afghanistan sawise ditolak ngener ing dharatan kanthi darurat ing Ürümqi.
mt: Before Xinhua China news agency reported that a plane was to be searched. The report then announced that the plane had received a bomb threat and was diverted to Afghanistan, stopping at Kandahar. The early report said the plane was returned to Afghanistan after being denied entry to the ground with an emergency in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Ing dina Senin, Sara Danius, sekretaris tetep saka Komite Nobel kanggo Sastra ing Akademi Swedia, ngumumake nalika acara radio ing Radio Sveriges ing Swedia, menawa komite kasebut ora bisa ngontak langsung Bob Dylan menawa dheweke menangake Hadiah Nobel Sastra 2016, wis nyerah marang upayane kanggo ngontak dheweke. Danius ngomong, “Saiki kita ora nindakake apa-apa. Aku wis nelpon lan ngirim email menyang kolaboratore sing paling cerak lan nampa wangsulan sing ramah banget. Kanggo saiki, iku wis cukup.”
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, announced on a radio show on Radio Sveriges in Sweden that the committee would not be able to contact Bob Dylan directly if he were to win the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, having already tried to contact him. Danius said, "Now we're doing nothing. I've called and emailed the closest collaborators and received a very friendly response. For now, that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Presiden AS, George W. Bush nampani wara-wara kasebut. Juru bicarane Bush, Gordon Johndroe ngomong menawa sumpahe Korea Lor “jangkah maju sing gedhe tumrap tujuan kanggo nggegayuh denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea sing bisa dibuktekake.”
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush announced the proposal. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the North Korean "significant step forward toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula can be verified."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "Ing 1956 Slania pindah menyang Swedia, ing ngendi telung taun sabanjure dheweke (lanang) wiwit kerja kanggo Kantor Pos Swedia lan dadi kepala pemahate. Dheweke ngasilake luwih saka 1.000 perangko kanggo Swedia lan 28 negara liyane. Karyane duweni kwalitas lan detail sing diakoni ndadekake dheweke minangka salah siji saka sawetara “jeneng misuwur” ing antarane filatelis. Sawetara wong ngususake kanggo ngoleksi karyane thok. Perangkone dheweke sing kaping 1;.000 yaiku ""Amal Gedhe dening Raja Swedia"" dening David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl ning 2000, sing ditulis ana ning Rekor Donya Buku Guinness. Dheweke uga melu ngukir dhuwit kertas kanggo pirang-pirang negara, conto paling anyar saka karyane kalebi poto perdana menteri ana ngarep dolar Kanada $5 lan $100."
mt: "In 1956 Slania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became chief engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has quality and detail that earned him recognition as one of a few "well-known" among philatelists. Some people have even gone so far as to collect his work exclusively. His 1,000th stamp was "Great Deed by the King of Sweden" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness World Book of Records. He also engraved paper money for several countries, most recently the first prime minister on Canadian $5 and $100."
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 mil saka Sistem Pipa Trans-Alaska ditutup sakwise wutahe ewonan tong minyak mentah ing kidule Fairbanks, Alaska. Gagal listrik sawise tes sistem komando kebakaran rutin nyebabake katup sing kanggo nguculke mbukak lan gawe minyak mentah kuwi amber ana cedhak stasiun pompa 9 Fort Greely. Mbukake katup ngidini ucule tekanan kanggo sistem lan minyak mili liwat bantalan menyang tangki sing bisa amot 55.000 barel (2,3 juta galon). Nganthi Rebo sore, bolongan tangki isih bocor bisa wae amarga ekspansi panas sajerone tangki. Kurungan nomer loro liyane ning ngisore tengki bisa ngadhahi 104,500 barel durung diiseni kanthi kebak.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was closed after a leak of crude oil near Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure after a routine emergency shutdown test caused a valve to open and allow oil to flow into a 9 Fort Greely pump station. Opening the valve allowed pressure to build up in the system and oil flowed into a tank that could hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). By Friday morning, the tank was still leaking possibly because of heat expansion within the tank. Two other tanks below the tank could hold 104,500 barrels before being filled with oil.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Korps Insinyur AS ngira manawa udan 6 inci bisa nembus tanggul sing rusak sadurunge. Bangsal nomer Sanga, sing kena banjir sing dhuwure 20 feet nalika Lesus Katrina, saiki kena banyu sing dhuwure sak-boyok amarga tanggul sing cedhak kono luwih dhuwur. Banyu iku mbludagi tanggul ing bagean 100 sikil ambane.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach the damaged levee, according to the US Army Corps of Engineers. The 20-foot-deep floodwaters of Hurricane Katrina's breached levee now stand at 6 feet, higher than the nearby levee, which was damaged in the storm. The water has flooded the levee in a 100-foot-wide area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton mesthekake Rumah sakit Universitas Howard ngakoni pasien kasebut ana ing kahanan sing apik. Pasien kuwi wis tau tekan Nigeria, panggonan ditemokake kasus virus Ebola. Rumah sakit wis patuh marang protokol kanggo kontrol infeksi, kalebu misah pasien saka liyane kanggo nyegah kemungkinan nginfeksi liyane.
mt: Hamilton said the Howard University Hospital had accepted the patient in good condition. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where the Ebola virus outbreak was first detected. The hospital was following protocols for infection control, including isolating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Komet bisa dadi sumber pangiriman banyu menyang bumi bebarengan karo bahan organik sing bisa mbentuk protein lan nyangga kauripan. Para ilmuan ngajab kanggo mangerteni kepiye planet-planet kabentuk, utamane kepiye bumi dibentuk, amarga jaman biyen komet tabrakan karo Bumi.
mt: Comets may have been the source of water delivery to Earth along with organic material that could form proteins and support life. Scientists are trying to understand how planets form, especially how Earth formed, because in the past comets collided with Earth.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Senajan pihak berwenang ora yakin marang kredibilitas ancaman iku, Otoritas Transportaion Maryland nganakake penutupan kanthi pandhesuk saka FBI. Truk sampah digunakake kanggo ngedhangi lawang mlebu lan bantuan 80 polisi siap kanggo ngarahake pengendara motor menyang dalan liya. Ora ana lalu lintas padhet dilapurake ing dalan sabuk, dalan alternatif kutha.
mt: Though officials are not sure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the highway with the help of the FBI. A garbage truck was used to block the entrance and 80 police officers were ready to direct drivers to other roads. No traffic jams were reported on the beltway, alternate city roads.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Tukang foto iku diangkut menyang Pusat Pengobatan Ronald Reagen UCLA, ing ngendi dheweke mati sawise iku. Dheweke dikabarke umur 20 taun. Ing salah sawijine pranyatan, Bieber ngujar “[n]alika aku ora ana kono utawa ora langsung ana kaitane karo kacilakan iki, pikiran lan dongaku kanggo kaluwarga para korban iki.” Situs web pawarta lelipur TMZ mangerteni yen tukang poto kuwi mandheg ana ning pinggir Dalan Sepulveda lan nyoba moto pos pulisi sadurune nyebrang dalan lan neruske, agawe pulisi Patroli Dalan Raya Kalifornia ngendhegke lalu lintas mung kanggo mrintahke dhewekw supaya nyebrang, kaping pindho. Miturut polisi, pengendhara kendharaan sing nabrak fotografer iku ora mungkin ngadhepi tuntutan pidana.
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reported to be 20 years old. In one of his statements, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present and was not driving the car, I feel that this incident obviously isn't just about mere property damage, and I hope that through this situation both the actor and I can do good and model a method of conflict resolution." TMZ reports that the photographer was standing on the side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to cross the street and continue, causing the California Highway Patrol to stop traffic only to order him to cross, twice. According to police, the driver of the car that hit the photographer is not likely to face criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias dinyatakake positif nandang virus entheng, ujar Menteri Presiden Rodrigo Arias. Kahanan presiden stabil, senajan dheweke bakal diisolasi ing omah kanggo sawetara dina. ""Pisah saka mriyang lan lara tenggorokan, Kula ngrasa apik lan ing wujud apik kanggo nindakake gaweanku kanthi telekomunikasi Aku ngarepake bali menyang tugasku ing dina Senin,” ujare Aria ing pernyataane."
mt: "Arias was tested positive for the flu, said President Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, although he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Separated from my family and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my duties with telecommunication I hope to return to my job on Monday," said Arias in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Pungkasane, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, dijenengi kanggo tas godhong sawit ing basa Maladewa, nggayuh angin terus-terusan udakara 240 kilometer saben jam (149 mil saben jam). Ing awal dina iki, angin udakara 83 km/jam, lan iki diajab saya lemah.
mt: Finally, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for the Maldivian word for coconut palm, sustained winds of about 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). Early Monday, winds were about 83 km/h, and this was expected to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Ombak abang kuwi disebabke dening konsentrasi Karenia brevis sing dhuwur, organisme sel-tunggal sing njedhul dhewe kanthi alami. Faktor alami bisa nyenggol kanggo gawe kahanan sing pas, agawe algae iki thukul kanthi cepet banget. Alga ngasilake sawijining neorotoxin sing isa nglumpuhake saraf ing menungsa lan iwak. Iwak kerep mati amarga kadar racun kang dhuwur ing banyu. Menungsa bisa kena pengaruh nalika nyedot banyu sing kena sing ana ing hawa kegawa dening angin lan ombak.
mt: The red tide is caused by high concentrations of Karenia brevis, a single-celled organism that naturally occurs in the ocean. Natural factors can cause conditions to become favorable for this algae to grow quickly. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can paralyze humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high levels of toxins in the water. Humans can be affected when they breathe in air containing the water that has been stirred up by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, sing sadurunge dadi badai Golongan 4 ing tataran Prahara Saffir-Simpson, nyusut dadi depresi tropis sadurunge sirna ing dina Selasa. Turahane ngasilake udan ing saindenging pulo, sanajan nganti saiki, ora ana keruksan utawa banjir sing dilapurake. Curah udan iki, kaitung nganti 6,34 inci ana ing Oahu digambarake dadi “nguntungake”. Sawetara udan dibarengi prahara gedhe lan asring ngaton bledhek.
mt: Felicia, which had previously been a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. Its rains brought flooding to the entire island, although no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The rainfall, estimated at 6.34 inches on Oahu, was "beneficial". Some of the rain was accompanied by large hail and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. tiba ana ing Grand Prix Singapura 2008 sabubare mandheg kanggo Fernando Alonso, nggawa montor sing luwih aman. Nalika mobil-mobil ing sangarepe Alonso mlebu kanggo bahan bakar sangisore keslametan mobil, dheweke (lanang) pindhah munggah kanggo menang. Piquet Jr. dipecat sabubare taun 2009 Grand Prix Hungaria.
mt: Piquet Jr. arrived at the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix after a stoppage for Fernando Alonso, bringing a safer car. When the cars behind Alonso refueled under yellow flag conditions, he (male) moved up to win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Panliten sing diwetokake dina Kamis ing jurnal Ilmu nglapurake pambentukan jinis manuk anyar ing Kapuloan Galapagos Ekuador. Panliten saka Universitas Princeton ing Amerika Serikat lan Universitas Uppsala ing Swedia nglapurake manawa jinis anyar megar mung rong generasi, sanajan cara iki dipercaya luwih suwe, amarga ana ing antarane finch endemik Darwin, beteng Geospiza, lan kaktus finch boyongan, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Scientists published Thursday in the journal Science the creation of a new bird species in the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden report that the new species is only two generations old, although this is believed to be longer, because there is between the endemic finch Darwin, Geospiza, and cactus finch boyongan, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Acara keseniane uga bagean saka kampanyene Balai Kutha Bucharest kang pengin nguripake maneh gambaran kuta Roma minangka kutha metropolis kang kreatif lan werna-werni. Kutha iki bakal dadi sing kapisan ing sisih wetan-kidul Eropa sing dadi tuwan omah CowParade, acara kagunan umum sing paling gedhe ing donya, antara wulan Juni lan Agustus taun iki.
mt: The event is also part of Bucharest City Hall's campaign to revive the image of the city as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Eastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

Kutha iki bakal dadi sing kapisan ing sisih wetan-kidul Eropa sing dadi tuwan omah CowParade, acara kagunan umum sing paling gedhe ing donya, antara wulan Juni lan Agustus taun iki.
mt: The event is also part of Bucharest City Hall's campaign to revive the image of the city as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Eastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Montor mabur kuwi wis mabur menyang Irkutsk lan dilakokne dening prajurit njero. Penyelidikan wis dianakake kanggo nyelidhiki. II-76 wis dadi komponen utama militer Rusia lan Soviet wiwit taun 1970, lan wis weruh alangan wigati ing Rusia sasi kepungkur. Tanggal 7 Oktober ana mesin sing dipisahke nalika mabur, tanpa kacilakan. Rusia langsung ngendhegke II-76s.
mt: The aircraft had flown to Irkutsk and was being unloaded by ground crew. An investigation is underway to determine the cause. The Il-76 has been a major component of the Russian and Soviet military since 1970, and has seen extensive use in Russia in recent years. On October 7, an engine was separated in flight, without incident. Russia immediately grounded its Il-76s.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Sadurunge The Simpsons Simon wis nggarap sawetara acara ing macem-macem posisi. Nalika taun 1980 an dheweke nyambut gawe ing pagelaran kaya Taxi, Cheers, lan The Tracy Ullman Show. Ing taun 1989, dheweke mbantu nggawe The Simpsons karo Brooks lan Groening, lan nduwe tanggung jawab kanggo njangkepi regu panulis kapisan ing acara kasebut. Sanajan ninggalake tontonan iku ing taun 1993, dheweke ajeg dadi produser eksekutif, lan terus nampa dasan yuta dolar bayaran ing saben ungsum.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon had worked on various shows in various capacities. In 1980 he worked on productions such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the original writing staff for that show. Although he left the show in 1993, he remained executive producer, and continued to receive a million dollars per episode.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke nulis menawa upaya-upaya dening sawetara wong kanggo ngilangke wanita saka nyuarakake babagan kasarasan wanita iku ora kasil. Dheweke tekan pepuntoning iki amarga ana akeh ujaran lan semangat positif sing dikirim menyang dheweke dening individu wanita lan pria sing meksa obat kontrasepsi dianggep minangka kabutuhan pangobatan.
mt: Fluke writes that efforts by some people to remove women from discussing issues of women's inequality have failed. He cites the many positive messages and sentiments sent to him by both male and female individuals who insist that birth control is considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: """Bakal tumindak kaya banyu. Tembus cahya minangka banyu"" Dadi yen sampeyan ngadeg ing pinggiring pesisir, sampeyan bakal isa weruh ngisor marang krikil utawa regedan apa wae sing ana ing ngisor. Sakngertine awake dhewe, mung ana siji awak planet kang nuduhake dinamisme kang luwih tinimbang Titan, lan arane yaiku Bumi,” tambahe Stofan."
mt: "It will act like water. Light will pass through it like water." So if you stand on the beach, you will see below you pebbles or rocks or whatever is there below. Only one planetary body in our solar system displays dynamics more than Titan, and its name is Earth,” Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Iki ora mung negeske yen ana dinosaurus sing nduweni wulu, teori sing wis kasebar, nanging umume durung ana fosil sing bisa dienggo bukti, umpamane warna lan wujut telung-dimensi. . Ilmuwan ngujar yen rupane wulu kewan iki coklat-kacang ana ndhuwur lan pucet utawa warna karoten ana sisih ngisor. Panemuan kasebut uga njamin wawasan kanggo evolusi saka wulu ing manuk. Amarga wulu dinosaurus ora duwe watang sing berkembang apik, disebut rachis, nanging duwe ciri-ciri wulu-wulu liyane — eri-eri lan barbule-barbule — panaliti nyimpulake rachis iku kemungkinan sawijining perkembangan evolusioner sabanjure sing iku ciri-ciri liyane. Struktur wulune nuduhake menawa iku ora digunakake kanggo mabur nanging malah kanggo ngatur suhu utawa rupa. Panliti menehi pitunjuk sanadyan iki buntute dinosaurus enom, sampel nuduhake wulu diwasa lan dudu piyik. Panliti menehi pitunjuk sanadyan iki buntute dinosaurus enom, sampel nuduhake bulu diwasa lan dudu piyik.
mt: This is not just news that dinosaurs had feathers, a widely circulated theory, but usually there are no fossils that can be used as evidence, such as color and three-dimensional shape.. Scientists say the shape of these feathers is light brown on top and pale or orange in color on the bottom. This discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the feathers of dinosaurs do not have a well-developed rachis, but have other feather characteristics — eri-eri and barbules — researchers conclude that the rachis is likely a later evolutionary development of other characteristics. The structure of its feathers indicates that it was not used for flight but rather for regulating temperature or shape. Researchers give the advice that this is a juvenile dinosaur, the sample shows adult feathers and not a chick. Researchers give the advice that this is a juvenile dinosaur, the sample shows adult feathers and not a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Nalika ana siji vaksin pacoban katon bisa nyuda kematian Ebola, nganti saiki, ora ana obat sing kabukten jelas kanggo ngobati infeksi sing ana. Siji koktil antibodi, ZMapp, pisanane nuduhake pangarep-arep ing lapangan, nanging panaliten dhines nuduhake manawa kurang migunani tinimbang digoleki kanggo ngupaya nyegah pati. Nalika pacoban PALM, ZMapp nduweni fungsi dadi kontrol, tegese ilmuwan nggunakake iku dadi garis dhasar lan mbandhingake perawatan telu liyane karo kuwi.
mt: While a vaccine trial showed promise in reducing Ebola deaths, to date there is no clear-cut drug to treat the infection. A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially held out hope in the field, but trials showed it was less effective than sought after in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as the control, meaning researchers used it as a baseline and compared three other treatments to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Ing dina Senin, ilmuwan saka Fakultas Kedokteran Universitas Stanford ngumumake penemuan piranti diagnosa sing isa misah-misahake sel adhedhasar jenis: kepingan cilik sing isa dicetak sing isa diasilake kanthi nggunakake printer inkjet standar kanggo mungkin saben-saben watara saji sen AS. Panliti kang mimpin ngomong menawa iki bisa nyebabake deteksi awal kanggo kanker, tuberkulosis, HIV lan malaria kanggo pasien ing negara pendapatan sithik, ing ngendi tingkat kaslametan kanggo penyakit kaya kanker payudara bisa separone saka negara kang luwih sugih.
mt: On Monday, researchers from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the discovery of a diagnostic device that could potentially distinguish between different types of cells: tiny particles that could be printed using a standard inkjet printer for as little as a penny per test. The lead researcher said this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria for patients in low-income countries, where the rate of survival for diseases like breast cancer can be vastly different from wealthier nations.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Para ahli elmu nemokake macem-macem wujud lemah sing ana ing pasuryan rembulan sing diarani perenging godhoh sing menawa asil saka sudane rembulan sing alon banget. Bambing-bambing jero iku kabeh ditemokake ing bulan lan katon sethithik kena udan, nandhakake yen kedadean geologis sing dumadi iku nembe wae kanthi wajar. Teori iki ora mbantah pratelan yen mbulan kuwi kurang kagiyatan geologis.
mt: Scientists have found a variety of different types of craters on the moon's surface, which are called "rings of fire" and are thought to be the result of the moon's rapid cooling. The inner rings are all found on the moon and appear to have been rained on, indicating that the geological event that created them is recent. This theory does not rule out the possibility that the moon is less geologically active.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya awit kuwi ana ing Pengadilan Sheriff Edinburgh kanthi tuduhan mateni anak lanange. Dheweke ditahan kanthi ngenteni dakwaan lan sidhang, nanging bukti saksi kuwi uga bisa ora cetho amarga gambare wis disebarke. Bab iki kalebu praktek umum ning Inggris nanging anngone nibakake pepancasan kuwi beda ana ning Skotlandia lan praneangadilan wis nyekseni poto-poto sing bisa ngrugekake. Guru Pamela Ferguson saka Universitas Dundee nyathet “nerbitke potone tersangka kuwi bakal mbebayani banget kanggo para wartawan.” Kantor Mahkota, sing ing sakabehaning bea penuntutan, wis nuduhake marang jurnalis menawa ora ana komentar meneh sing bakal digawe paling ora tekan dakwaan
mt: Adekoya is accused of killing her daughter. She was held in Edinburgh Sheriff Court on charges of murder and assault, but evidence of witnesses was also not clear because the photos were leaked. This is a common practice in England but the prosecution of the photos is different in Scotland and the court has already seen photos that could be embarrassing. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee said "the release of the suspect's photos will be very dangerous for journalists." The Crown Office, which is in charge of the prosecution, has warned journalists that no comments will be made until the charges are filed
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Sak liyane es sing ajur, kondisi hawa sing ora umum iki gawe usaha kanggo nyelametake dadi suwe. Pittman menehi kesan menawa kondisine ora bakal maju nganthi minggu ngarep. Gunggung lan kandele bungkus es, miturut Pittman, paling awon kanggo grema asu laut sing paling suwene 15 taun kepungkur.
mt: Another cold snap, the unusual weather made the rescue effort take longer. Pittman said the conditions would not improve until next week. The number and size of icebergs, according to Pittman, is the largest in 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

mt: Another cold snap, the unusual weather made the rescue effort take longer. Pittman said the conditions would not improve until next week. The number and size of icebergs, according to Pittman, is the largest in 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts nolak kanggo ngomong kapan dheweke percaya uripe diwiwiti, pitakonan penting nalika nimbang etis saka aborsi, ngomong menawa iki bakalan ora etis kanggo ngomong detail saka kasus sing bisa kedadean. Dheweke nindakake, nanging, mbaleni pitakonane dheweke sadurunge menawa Roe.v Wade iku “hukum lemah sing pesthi”, negasake pentinge putusan Mahkamah Agung sing konsisten. Dheweke uga negesake yen dheweke percaya marang hak sing kesirat kanggo hak pribadhi sing dadi dhasar keputusane Roe.
mt: Roberts refused to say when he first believed life began, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying it would be unethical to discuss details of a case that could be pending. He did, however, roll back his own question when Roe v Wade was a "weakly held" law, asserting the consistent Supreme Court decision. He also asserted he believed in the right to privacy that was the basis of Roe.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Pas jam 8:46 esuk, ana ening tiba ngliwati kutha iku, nandhani wektu persis jet sing sepisan nyerang sasarane. Rong sorot cahya wis dipasang kanggo ngarahake ing langit sawengi. Lima bangunan anyar dhuwur-dwuhur saiki lagi dibangun ana ing panggonan iki, kalebu punjer kendharaan lan taman pengeling-eling ana ing tengah.
mt: 8:46 am, a plane flew over the city, marking the exact time of the first jet's attack on its target. Two searchlights were set up to guide in the night. Five new high-rise buildings are currently being built here, including a car park and a park in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Pas jam 8:46 esuk, ana ening tiba ngliwati kutha iku, nandhani wektu persis jet sing sepisan nyerang sasarane. Rong sorot cahya wis dipasang kanggo ngarahake ing langit sawengi. Lima bangunan anyar dhuwur-dwuhur saiki lagi dibangun ana ing panggonan iki, kalebu punjer kendharaan lan taman pengeling-eling ana ing tengah.
mt: 8:46 am, a plane flew over the city, marking the exact time of the first jet's attack on its target. Two searchlights were set up to guide in the night. Five new high-rise buildings are currently being built here, including a car park and a park in the center.

src: "Kabeh dalan mlebu menyang guwa, sing dijenengi “Sedulur Wadon Pitu”, kurang luwih 100 nganti 250 meter (328 nganti 820 feet) garis tengahe. Gambar inframerah nuduhake yen variasi suhu saka awan lan wengi nuduhake manawa iku cenderung guwa. ""Iki luwih apik tinimbang sekitarane nalika awan lan luwih anget nalika wengi"" Tumindak panas kuwi ora kuat kaya sing ana ing guwa sing gedhe ing Donya sing biyasane bisa njaga suhu iki kanthi tetep, nanging uga selaras karo bolongan ing njero,” ujare Glen Cushing saka Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) Tim Astrogeologi lan saka Universitas Arizona Lor sing manggon ana ing Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: "All roads lead to the cave, dubbed the "Seven Sisters," about 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations of the clouds and night indicate that it is likely a cave. ""It's warmer than the surroundings when the clouds are around and warmer at night"" The heat action is not as strong as in large caves in the world usually can maintain this temperature, but also consistent with the opening inside," said Glen Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology and the University of Arizona North located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Wong iku dinuga nyetir kendharaan rodha-telu disenjatani kanthi bahan ledhak menyang wong akeh. Wong sing diduga mbledhoske bom kuwi ditangkep, sabubare tatu saka kadadeyan kuwi. Jenenge iku isih ora dingerteni marang panguasa sanajan dheweke padha ngerti dheweke iku anggota kelompok etnis Uigur.
mt: The suspect is believed to have driven a three-wheeled vehicle laden with explosives into a crowd. The suspected bomber was arrested, although the number of casualties from the incident is still unknown to authorities, although they do know that the suspect is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Afrika Kidul ngalahake All Blacks (New Zealand) nalika adu-adu ragbi pakumpulan Tri Nations ing Stadion Bafokeng Royal ing Rustenburg, Afrika Kidul. Skor pungkasan iku siji poin menang, 21 tekan 20, mungkasi dolanan 15 Kabeh Negro menang urut-urutan. Kanggo Springboks, wis kalah ping lima urut-urutan. Iki iku pertandhingan pungkasan kanggo All Blacks, sing uwis menangake piala rong minggu kepungkur. Tarung sing keri dhewe seri iki bakal dilangsungke ana ing Taman Ellis ning Johannesburg minggu ngarep, nalika Springboks main ana ing Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union test match at the Bafokeng Royal Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was one point ahead, 21 to 20, ending the 15 All Blacks winning streak. For the Springboks, it was their fifth consecutive loss. This was the last test match for the All Blacks, who won the trophy two weeks ago. The match that ended in a draw will be held in the Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play in Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stasiun iku njaga adate, sanajan sadurunge kelangan siji giroskop ing misi stasiun ruang angkasa, nganti pungkasaning lelungan ruang angkasa. Chiao lan Sharipov nglapurake jarak sing aman saka panyurung sikap sing bener. Kendhali lemah Rusia nguripake jet lan laku normal setasiyun kasebut bali.
mt: The station is keeping its date, despite losing one gyroscope on a space station mission, until the end of the space flight. Chiao and Sharipov reported safe distances from the correct attitude. The Russian controls revived the jet and the station returned to normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kasus kasebut dituntut ing Virginia amarga iku minangka omah kanggo panyedhiya layanan internet utama AOL, perusahaan sing nyebabake tuduhan kasebut. Iki iku wektu sepisan sawijining hukuman diantukake nggunakake perundhang-undhangan sing diundhangke ing 2003 kanggo ngalangi e-mail massal, alias spam, saka saluran sing ora dijaluk menyang kothak surat panganggo.
mt: The case is being prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home of the main Internet service provider AOL, the company that is being sued. This is the first time a fine has been levied under a law enacted in 2003 to combat unsolicited bulk e-mail, or spam, sent to an unregistered recipient.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Vidal sing umure 28 taun gabung karo Barça telung mangsa kapungkur, saka Sevilla. Wiwit pindhah menyang ibu kutha Catalan, Vidal wis main 49 pertandhingan kanggo tim kasebut.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barça three years ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque latihan sasuwene latihan pra-musim ing Coverciano ing Italia ing wiwitaning dina. Dheweke nginep ing hotel tim ngarepe pertandhingan sing direncanakake kanggo Minggu lawan Bolonia. Dheweke tetep ning hotel tim nyedhaki wektu sing direncanakake dina Minggu nglawan Bolonia.
mt: Jarque trained with the rest of the preseason training squad at Coverciano in Italy on Monday. He stayed in the team hotel ahead of the scheduled match against Bologna on Sunday. He remained in the team hotel on Sunday ahead of the scheduled match against Bologna.

src: Ora ana pengeling-eling perkara tsunami sing diumumke,lan miturut badan geofisika Jakarta, ora ana pengeling-eling tsunami amarga lindhu sing kadadeyan kuwi ora nganti luwih saka 6.5 ukurane. Sanadyan ora ana ancaman tsunami, penduduk wiwit panik lan ninggalake bisnis lan omahe.
mt: There were no tsunami warnings issued, and according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency, there is no tsunami threat because the earthquake was less than 6.5 on the Richter scale. Nevertheless, people panicked and abandoned their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Dheweke kabeh nemokake menawa srengenge mlaku nganggo prinsip dhasar sing padha kaya bintang-bintang liyane: Ditemokake menawa kagiyatan kabeh bintang-bintang ing sistem dilakokne dening sorotane, puterane, lan ora ana liyane.‘ Padhange cahya lan puteran digunakake bebarengan kanggo nemtokake nomer bintang Rossby, sing ana gandhengane karo ilen-ilen plasma. Sansaya cilik angka Rossby, sansaya kurang aktif lintang kasebut disebabke dening kuwalikan magnetik.
mt: All three found that all stars in the system are behaving according to the same basic principle as other stars: All are found to be acting by rotation, and there is nothing else. "Light and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of the star, which is related to the plasma's turbulence. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is, caused by magnetic quenching.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Saka total 1.400 wong sing milih pemilu federal taun 2010, kabeh sing ora sepakat yen Australia dadi republik mundhak 8 persen wiwit 2008. Perdana Menteri sementara Julia Gillard ngakoni sasuwene kampanye pemilihan federal 2010 sing dheweke percaya Australia bakal dadi republik ing pungkasan masa pamrintahaning Ratu Elizabeth. 34 per sen sing menehi swara sesawangane ngene, kepengin Ratu Elizabeth II dadi raja sing keri dhewe ana ning Australia. Ing pungkasan seteman, 29 persen sing dipriksa percaya Australia kudu dadi republik sanalika bisa, dene 31 persen percaya Australia ora kudu dadi republik.
mt: 1,400 people surveyed for the federal election of 2010, all of whom disagreed that Australia should become a republic increased by 8 percent since 2008. Acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard acknowledged the federal election campaign 2010 which she believes Australia will become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth. 34 percent of those polled wanted Queen Elizabeth II to be the king who is already in Australia. At the end of the week, 29 percent of those surveyed believed Australia should become a republic immediately, while 31 percent believed Australia should not become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, juru wicara Yayasan Komen, ujar manawa pakumpulane nganakake aturan anyar sing ora ngidini paweweh utawa dana diwenehake menyang pakumpulan sing dititipriksa kanthi sah. Kawicaksanan Komen ndiskualifikasi Wong tua Direncana adhedhasar investigasi sing ditangguhke babagan kepiye Wong Tua Direncana ngentekake lan nglaporake dhuite sing dipimpin dening Anggota Majelis Ngisor Cliff Stearns. Stearns nyelidhiki apa pajek dienggo mbiayai aborsi liwat Keluarga Berencana ing lakone minangka ketua Subkomite Pengawasan lan, sing ana sangisore Komite Perdagangan lan Energi Omah.
mt: Leslie Aun, spokeswoman for Komen, said the organization has implemented new guidelines that prohibit donations or grants to organizations that are under investigation. Komen disqualified the Susan G. Komen Foundation based on an investigation into how the Susan G. Komen Foundation spent money on abortions through Planned Parenthood, which is chaired by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns investigated whether the money was used to pay for abortions as chairman of the Oversight Subcommittee of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Polisi Madhya Pradesh ngamanake laptop lan tilpun selular sing dicolong. Wakil Inspektur Jenderal D K Arya ngandharake, “Kita wis nyekel lima wong sing ngruda peksa wanita Swiss lan mbalekake ponsel lan laptope”. Para tersangkane jenenge Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, lan Vishnu Kanjat. Polisi pengawas Chandra Shekhar Solanki ngujar yen wong sing didakwa kuwi mara menyang pangadilan nutupi raine.
mt: Police in Madhya Pradesh have arrested five men accused of robbing a Swiss woman and stealing her laptop and cell phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five people who robbed a Swiss woman and took her phone and laptop." The accused are named Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, and Vishnu Kanjat. Police observer Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused are being taken to court.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: Perangkat komputer pribadi ASUS Eee, luwih gasik diluncurake ing saindeging donya kanggo pengiritan lan faktor fungsional dadi topik anget ing Wulan IT Taipei 2007. Nanging pasar konsumen komputer laptop bakal werna-werna banget lan ewah sawise ASUS dianugrahi penghargaan ing Penghargaan Berkelanjutan Taiwan 2007 dening Eksekutif Yuan saka Republik Cina.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, more commonly known as the Eee, was launched in Taiwan for the consumer market and became a hot topic at the IT Week Taipei 2007. However, the laptop market will be flooded and changed since ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Sustainable Award 2007 by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Masalah iki diwiwiti tanggal 1 Januari nalika puluhan warga lokal mulai sambat menyang Kantor Pos Obanazawa bilih dheweke durung nampa kertu Taun Anyar tradisional lan sing biyasa. Wingi, kantor pos ngetokake panjalukan apurane marang warga lan media sawise nemokake menawa bocah iku wis ndhelikake punjul saka 600 dokumen pos, kalebu 429 kartu pos Warsa Anyar, sing ora dikirimake menyang penampa sing dikarepake.
mt: The problem began on January 1 when dozens of local residents began to gather at the Obanazawa post office because they had not received their traditional New Year's postcards and letters. The post office issued an apology to residents and the media after discovering that the boy had opened more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's postcards, which had not been sent to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray kalah ing set pisanan ing pamedhot skor seri sakwise wong lanang loro kasebut nyekel masing-masing lan saben servis ing set. Del Potro duwe miwiti kabegjan ing set kapindho, nanging iki uga butuh leren sawise nggayuh 6-6. Potro nampa perawatan kanggo pundhake saiki nanging bisa bali menyang pertandhingane.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak after the two men held each other to a 6-6 score in the set. Del Potro started off strong in the second set, but this also took a lot of effort after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to fix his knee, but was able to return to his match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Dikancani dening pejabat kuwi, dheweke njamin yen masarakat Texas kabeh iki dilakoni kanggo nglindhungi kaamanane warga umum. Perry kanthi tegas ngujar, “Ana panggonan sing ndonya iki sing luwih siyap kanggo tantangan sing dijokne ning kasus iki.” Gubernur uga nyatakake, ""Dina iki, kita ngerti menawa sawetara bocah umur sekolah uwis dikenali minangka uwis sesambungan karo pasien."" Dheweke banjur ngomong, “Kasus iki serius. Sampeyan yakin wae menawa sisteme dhewe mlaku seapik sing semesthine.”"
mt: "According to the official, he assured that all Texans are doing this to protect the public's safety. Perry emphatically stated, "There are places that are better prepared for the challenges posed in this case." The governor also stated, ""Today, we know that some schoolchildren are already connected to patients."" He then said, "This case is serious. You are sure that the system is running as smoothly as possible.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Suwe sadurunge Tontonan Saben Dina lan Laporan Colbert, Heck lan Johnson wis nduweni impen siaran sing bakal nerokake berita—lan laporan berita—nalika dheweke isih dadi siswa ana UW taun 1988. Awit awale, The Onion wis dadi kerajaan parodi warta sing sakbenere, kanthi edisi cithak, situs web sing nggeret 5.000.000 pengunjung unik ing sasi Oktober, iklan kusus, jaringan warta 24 jam, podcast, lan lagi wae nerbitake atlas donya sing diarani Donya Bodhone Dhewe. Al Gore lan Jenderal Tommy Franks kanthi kalem ngujarke judul kasenengane (Gore kuwi nalika The Onion nglaporke dheweke lan Tipper bebarengan sabubare kalah Pemilu Kampus 2000). Akeh penulis-penulise kang banjur menehi pengaruh gedhe ana acara parodi warta Jon Stewart lan Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had already been making news— and reporting news—while they were students at UW in 1988. From the start, The Onion was a satirical news empire, with a print edition, a website that attracts 5 million unique visitors in October, special ads, a 24-hour news network, a podcast, and now a world atlas called The World in Stupidity. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have both been the subject of Onion headlines (Gore when The Onion reported him and Tipper together after losing the 2000 campus election). Many of the writers have gone on to have a big impact on the satirical news programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
