src: Idin kudu dipesen luwih dhisik. Sampeyan kudu duwe idin kanggo nginep ing Sirena. Sirena iku siji- sijine penjaga stasiun sing nawani penginapan asrama lan panganan panas saliyane kanggo kemah. La Leona, San Pedrillo, lan Los Patos namung nawakake kemah tanpa layanan panganan. Dimungkinake kanggo oleh idin taman langsung saka Pos Penjaga ing Puerto Jiménez, nanging dheweke ora nampa kertu kredit. Layanan Taman (MINAE) ora ngetokake idin taman luwih saka sewulan sadurunge, saka karawuhan sing diarepake. CafeNet El Sol nawakake layanan pesenan kanthi rega 30 dolar, utawa 10 dolar kanggo tiket sedina; rincian ing halaman Corcovadone.
mt: You must reserve in advance. You must have a permit to camp at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot food in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer camping without food service. It is possible to get a permit directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The National Park Service (MINAE) does not issue camping permits more than one week in advance, from reservations made. CafeNet El Sol offers delivery service for 30 dollars, or 10 dollars for a day pass; details on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Lelungan karo ski: Kamempengan iki uga diarani ski pedalaman, misata ski utawa mlaku nanjak karo ski. Iki ana hubungane nanging biyasane ora nggawa gaya ski gunung utawa cara munggah gunung, sing keri iki dilakoni ana ning daerah sing jejeg lan mbutuhake alat ski lan sepatu sing luwih kaku. Pikirake jalur ski minangka jalur munggah sing padha. Ing kahanan sing apik sampeyan bakal bisa lelungan sing luwih adoh tinimbang mlaku - nanging arang banget sampeyan bakal entuk kacepetan dolanan ski lintas negara tanpa tas sing abot ing dalan sing dijaga kanthi apik.
mt: Ski touring: This is also called backcountry skiing, off-piste skiing or uphill skiing. It is related but usually does not involve alpine or backcountry skiing techniques or equipment, which are used in more rugged terrain and require more specialized equipment. Think of ski touring as uphill skiing on well-groomed trails. In good conditions you can travel farther than you can skin - but rarely will you get the speed of a cross-country ski race without a heavy pack on a well-groomed trail.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Goncangan mlebu meneh teka luwih cepet tinimbang goncangan budaya (ana luwih sethithik saka fase bulan madu), pungkasan luwih suwe, lan bisa luwih parah. Wisatawan sing gampang nyocogake karo budaya anyar kadhang-kadhang angel nyocogake maneh karo budaya asline. Nalika mulih omah sawise urip ing luar negri, sampeyan kudu adaptasi marang kabudayan anyar lan kelangan pira-pira pakulinane sampeyan saka budaya omah sampeyan. Nalika sampeyan plesiran kaping pisanan, wong-wong bakal sabar lan mangerteni, ngerteni yen wong sing plesir menyang negara sing beda kuwi kudu adaptasi. Wong-wong mungkin ora ngira menawa kesadaran lan pangerten uga dibutuhake kanggo wong lelungan sing bali mulih.
mt: A culture shock can come faster than a honeymoon phase (there is more of the former than the latter), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Tourists who easily adapt to a new culture may find it harder to adapt back to their old culture. When returning home after living abroad, you will need to adapt to a new culture and leave some of your old culture behind. When traveling for the first time, people will be patient and understanding, knowing that people traveling to a different country will need to adapt. People may not realize that awareness and understanding are also needed for people returning home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Kidang Gedhe (uga diarani kidang) ora seneng nyerang dhewe-dhewe, nanging bakal mbela awake yen ana anceman. Nalika manungsa ora nganggep kidang kuwi mbebayani, si kidang bisa nyedhak cedhak banget lan justru mbebayani awake dhewe.
mt: The bighorn sheep (also called the ram) does not like to attack alone, but will defend itself if threatened. When humans do not consider the ram dangerous, the ram can get very close and is actually dangerous to itself.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Kidang Gedhe (uga diarani kidang) ora seneng nyerang dhewe-dhewe, nanging bakal mbela awake yen ana anceman. Nalika manungsa ora nganggep kidang kuwi mbebayani, si kidang bisa nyedhak cedhak banget lan justru mbebayani awake dhewe.
mt: The bighorn sheep (also called the ram) does not like to attack alone, but will defend itself if threatened. When humans do not consider the ram dangerous, the ram can get very close and is actually dangerous to itself.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Nalika panas awan-awan, wong mlaku kuwi bisa nemoni khayalan sing gawe ayang-ayang banyu (utawa barang liyane). Iku kabeh bisa dadi mbebayani menawa plancong iku ngoyak lamunan, mbuang tenaga sing aji lan banyu sisa. Padang pasir sing paling panas wae bisa dadi anyep banget nalika wengi. Hipotermia kuwi perkara sing mbebayani tanpa klambi sing anget.
mt: When the heat is oppressive, people can see mirages of water (or other things). All of this can be dangerous if the mirage is luring people away, wasting energy and precious water. The hottest desert can be very cold at night. Hypothermia is a dangerous condition without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Republik Dominika (Basa Spanyol; Republica Dominicana) yaiku negara ing wilayah Karibia sing manggon ana separo daerah wetanan saka pulo Hispaniola, sing diandum karo Haiti Ora mung pasir putih lan sesawangan gunung, negara iki uga omahe kutha Eropa sing paling tuwa ning Amerika, saiki dadi bageyane Santo Domingo. Wiwitane pulo iku dipanggoni dening Tainos lan Caribes. Suku Caribes yaiku wong-wong sing omong Arawakan sing tekan antarane taun 10.000 BCE. Ing sawetara taun sakwise tekane penjelajah Eropa, populasi ing Tainos wis suda kanthi signifikan dening penjajah Spanyol. Miturut Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antarane 1492 lan 1498 penjajah Spanyol mateni kira-kira 100.000 Taínos.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: Republica Dominicana) is a country in the Caribbean region, occupying the western half of the island of Hispaniola, sharing the eastern half with Haiti. Not only white sand and mountain scenery, this country is also home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now the capital Santo Domingo. Originally the island was inhabited by the Tainos and Caribs. The Caribs are the people who speak Arawakan language that arrived between 10,000 BCE. In a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the population of the Tainos had been significantly reduced by Spanish colonists. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 Spanish colonists killed about 100,000 Taínos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Ulahraga salju downhill, sing kalebu ski lan prosotan salju, minangka ulahraga misuwur sing kalebu mrosot ing ngisor lemah sing ketutup salju kanthi piranti ski utawa papan prosotan ing sikilmu. Ski iku sawijining aktivitas lelungan utama kanthi akeh penggemar, kadhang-kadhang dikenal minangka “gelandhangan ski,” ngrencanakake kabeh preinan watara ski ing lokasi-lokasi tertentu. Gagasan saka dolanan ski iku tua banget — lukisan gua sing nggambarake pemain ski wiwit adoh 5000 SM! Ski ing lereng minangka olahraga diwiwiti paling ora ing abad kaping 17, lan ing 1861 klub ski rekreasi sing pisanan dibukak dening wong Norwegia ing Australia.
mt: Downhill skiing, which includes both skiing and snowboarding, is a popular sport that involves sliding down a snow-covered slope with skis or a snowboard. Skiing is a major recreational activity with many enthusiasts, sometimes known as “ski runs,” planning all the turns between skis at certain locations. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting ski players date back 5000 SM! Skiing down slopes began at least in the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Pulo-pulo ing Afrika Wetan iku ana ing Samudra Hindia saka pesisir wetan Afrika. Madagaskar kuwi pulo sing paling gedhe, lan benua sing khas perkara kewan sing ana njerone. Ameh kabeh pulo-pulo kang luwih cilik iku negara-negara mardhika, utawa gegandhengan karo Prancis, lan diweruhi minangka pasanggrahan pasisir kang mewah. Wong Arab uga gawa Islam menyang pulo iki, lan dalane gedhe kanggo Komoro lan Mayotte. Pengaruh lan kolonialisme Eropa diwiwiti nalika abad 15, nalika tukang jelajah saka Portugal Vasco da Gama nemokake Jalur Tanjung saka Eropa menyang India.
mt: The islands of East Africa are in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is the only island with a unique fauna. All the smaller islands are independent countries, or associated with France, and are known for their luxury resorts. Arabs also brought Islam to the islands, and the large islands of Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Pulo-pulo ing Afrika Wetan iku ana ing Samudra Hindia saka pesisir wetan Afrika. Madagaskar kuwi pulo sing paling gedhe, lan benua sing khas perkara kewan sing ana njerone. Ameh kabeh pulo-pulo kang luwih cilik iku negara-negara mardhika, utawa gegandhengan karo Prancis, lan diweruhi minangka pasanggrahan pasisir kang mewah. Wong Arab uga gawa Islam menyang pulo iki, lan dalane gedhe kanggo Komoro lan Mayotte. Pengaruh lan kolonialisme Eropa diwiwiti nalika abad 15, nalika tukang jelajah saka Portugal Vasco da Gama nemokake Jalur Tanjung saka Eropa menyang India.
mt: The islands of East Africa are in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is the only island with a unique fauna. All the smaller islands are independent countries, or associated with France, and are known for their luxury resorts. Arabs also brought Islam to the islands, and the large islands of Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Ana tradisi melek sewengi nalika Paskah ning njaba kanggo ndeleng srengenge njedhul. Sak mesthine ana penjelasan teologi Kristen kanggo tradisi iki, nanging iki sisan wae dadi ritual mangsa semi lan kesuburan pra-Kristen. Luwih akeh greja tradisional sing asring nindakake Bengi Paskah ing Setu wengi nalika akhir minggu Paskah, kanthi penganut asring nindakake pahargyan ing tengah wengi kanggo ngagungake wungune Kristus.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night on Easter Sunday to watch the sunrise. There is no theological explanation for this tradition, but it is a spring and fertility pre-Christian ritual. More traditional churches often perform Easter Vigil on Saturday night at the end of Easter Sunday, with adherents often performing a celebration in the middle of the night to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ékuador menehi wewaton kanggo warga Kuba menawa nampa layang undhangan sadurunge mlebu Ékuador liwat bandara internasional utawa titik mlebu. Layang iki kudu dilegalake dening Kementrian Luar Negeri Ekuador, lan nyaguhi marang syarat tartamtu. Persyaratan iki dirancang kanggo nyawisake sawijining aliran migrasi sing tumata antarane keloro negara. Warga Kuba sing nyekel kertu ijo Amerika kudu marani Konsulat Ekuador supaya entuk pengecualian marang sarat iki. Paspormu kudu sah kurang luwih 6 sasi sak njabane tanggal plesiranmu. Tiket kanggo sak ubengan/ plesir sabubare uga dibutuhke kanggo mbuktekake sepira suwene sampeyan bakal nginep.
mt: Ecuador has given guidelines for Cuban citizens to enter Ecuador before entering through international airports or entry points. This plane must be legalized by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ecuador, and meet certain requirements. These requirements are designed to prevent a flow of migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens holding a green card in the United States must obtain an exemption from the Ecuadorian Consulate to meet these requirements. Your passport must be valid for less than 6 months after your departure date. A ticket for one way / vacation is also required to prove how long you will stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Kacamata bisa dadi luwih murah ing negara asing, apa maneh ing negara-negara pendapatan cendhak ing ngendi rega tenaga buruh luwih murah. Pertimbangke mriksakake mripat ing omah, mligine yen ditanggung asuransi, lan nggawa resepe terus diajokake ing panggon liyane. Wengku jeneng merek modheren sing kasedhiya ing dhaerah kasebut bisa uga duwe rong masalah; sawetara bisa uga tiron, lan sing diimpur bisa uga luwih larang tinimbang sing ning omah.
mt: Glasses can be cheaper in foreign countries, even in low-income countries where labor costs are cheaper. Consider buying a pair at home, especially if it is covered by insurance, and bringing the prescription with you to other places. The brand name of the model available in the area may also have two problems; some may be broken, and those who are imported may be more expensive than those at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Mata uang Falkland sing resmi iku pound Falkland (PFK) sing ajine ditetepake padha karo siji pound Inggris (GBP) iku. Dhuwit bisa diijolne ing siji-sijine bank ing pulo sing panggonane ana ing Stanley sebrange toko FIC West. Pound Inggris bakal diterima dening umum ana ngendi wae ana pulo iki lan ana njero kertu kredit Stanley lan dolar Amerika Serikat uga asring diterima. Ing pulo-pulo adoh kertu kredit. mungkin bakal ora ditampa, sanajan mata uang Inggris lan Amerika mungkin ditampa; takokake marang sing duwe dhisik kanggo nemtokake metode pembayaran apa sing ditampa. Ameh ora mungkin kanggo ngijolake dhuwit Falklands sajobone pulo, mula sampeyan kudu ngijolake dhuwit sakdurunge ninggalake pulone.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at any bank in the capital of Stanley, as well as at the FIC West store. British pounds are accepted everywhere on the island and credit cards from Stanley are also accepted. Credit cards are not accepted on the outlying islands, although British and American currency may be accepted; check with the establishment to determine what payment methods are accepted. Money from the Falklands cannot be taken off the island, so you must exchange money before leaving the island.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Akeh candhi sing nduweni pagelaran Taunan wiwit ana sasi Nopember pungkasane ana Tengah Mei, beda-beda gumantung marang tanggalan taunan candhi. Akeh pagelaran ana candhi kuwi dirayakne dadi bageyan ambal warsane candhi utawa dadi pangeling-eling dina kelairane dewa utawa pagelaran gedhe liyane sing ana hubungan ekaro candhi. Pagelaran ana ning candhi Kerala iki endah banget, kanthi urut-urutan umum nggunakake gajah sing dirias, karawitan candhi lan pagelaran-pagelaran liyane.
mt: Many temples hold annual festivals since November, culminating in mid-May, depending on the temple's annual calendar. Many festivals are held as part of the temple's annual festival or as part of the temple's birthday celebrations or other major festivals. The festival at this temple in Kerala is particularly famous, with the usual procession of elephants in ceremonial dress, temple music and other performances.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Cara sing jelas kanggo mabur ing kelas siji utawa kelas bisnis yaiku kanthi mbayar setumpuk duit kandel supaya entuk hak istimewa (utawa, luwih apik meneh, nyuwun perusahaan sampeyan kanggo nindakake iki kanggo sampeyan). Nanging, iki ora teka murah: amarga paugeran kaku sing kasar, sampeyan bisa ngajab kanggo bayar nganti kaping papat ongkos lelungan ekonomi normal kanggo bisnis, lan bahkan kaping sewelas kanggo kelas siji! Umume, ora ana gunane sanadyan goleki diskon kanggo kursi bisnis utawa eksekutif ing penerbangan langsung saka A menyang B. Maskapai ngerteni banget menawa ana klompok inti tartamtu sing gelem mbayar larang kanggo hak kusus ing lelungan ngendi wae kanthi cepet lan kepenak, lan regane pantes.
mt: A clear way to fly in first or business class is to pay a large wad of cash to get special privileges (or, better yet, ask your company to do this for you). But this doesn't come cheap: because of hard and fast regulations, you may have to pay up to four times the normal price of an economy flight for business, and even eleven times for first! Generally, there is no point in haggling for discounts on business or executive seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know very well that there is a certain core group willing to pay for special privileges on any flight anywhere quickly and expensively, and the price is fair.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Maskapai kayata Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Maskapai Turkish wis ngembangake layanane tekan Afrika, lan nyuguhake sambungan menyang pirang-pirang kutha gedhe ing Afrika kanthi tarip sing luwih murah tinimbang maskapai Eropa. Turkish Airlines mabur menyang 39 jujugan saka 30 negara Afrika awit taun 2014. Menawa sampeyan duwe wektu lelungan tambahan, periksanen kanggo ndelok kepriye arahan tarip total menyang Afrika dibandingake karo tarip ngubengi donya. Aja lali kanggo nambahke bea tambahan visa tambahan, pajek menyang, angkutan dharat, lan liya-liyane. kanggo kabeh papan ing sanjabaning Afrika iku.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major cities in Africa at cheaper rates than European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries since 2014. If you have extra time, check out how the total cost to Africa compares to the cost of circumnavigating the world. Don't forget to add on visa fees, departure taxes, land transport, and other fees for all destinations outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Tuku panganan ing supermarket iku biasane cara paling murah kanggo mangan. Tanpa kasempatan masak, pilihane amung diwatesi karo panganan siap saji. Saya akeh supermarket sing duwe bagean macem-macem saka panganan cepak saji. Sawetara malah uga nyedhiyakake oven microwave utawa piranti liyane kanggo manasne panganan. Ing sawetara negara utawa tipe toko paling ora ana restoran ing panggonane, kerepe sing ora formal kanthi rega murah.
mt: Buying food at a supermarket is usually the cheapest way to eat. Without the opportunity to cook, your choices are limited to prepared foods. Some supermarkets even offer a variety of prepared foods. Some even offer microwave ovens or other appliances to heat the food. In some countries or types of store, there are no restaurants on the premises, informal with cheap prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Varietas basa Perancis sing dipocapake ing Belgia lan Swiss rada beda saka basa perancis sing dipocaake ing perancis, sanajan iku padha cukup mirip kanggo isa dipahami bebarengan. Kususe, sistem angka ing Belgia lan Swiss sing basane Prancis duweni keanehan sathithik sing beda saka basa Prancis sing dienggo ing Prancis, lan pangucapan sawetara tembung uga rada beda. Senajan mengkono kabeh wong perancis sing omongan ngango basa Belgia lan Swiss bakal sinau Basa perancis standar ing sekolah, satemah dheweke padha bakal isa mangerteni sampeyan mbok senajan sampeyan nggunakake sistem penomeran standar basa perancis.
mt: The French dialects spoken in Belgium and Switzerland are slightly different from the French spoken in France, although they are still mutually intelligible. However, the number system in Belgium and Switzerland used by French speakers has some peculiarities different from the French standard, and the pronunciation of some words is also slightly different. Nevertheless, all French speakers who speak the Belgian and Swiss dialects will learn the standard French in school, so they will still understand you even if you use the standard French number system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Mung sawetara maskapai sing isih nawarake tarif sungkawa, sing rada ngelongi rega lelungan layat dadakan. Maskapai sing nawakake iki kalebu Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa kanggo penerbangan sing asale saka AS utawa Kanada, lan WestJet. Ing kabeh kahanan, sampeyan kudu mesen langsung menyang maskape.
mt: Only a few airlines are offering discounted bereavement fares, which are slightly lower than regular last-minute fares. Airlines offering these fares include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating in the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

Ing kabeh kahanan, sampeyan kudu mesen langsung menyang maskape.
mt: Only a few airlines are offering discounted bereavement fares, which are slightly lower than regular last-minute fares. Airlines offering these fares include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating in the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Nggunakake aplikasi nasvigasi GPS ing ponsel pinter sampeyan bisa dadi cara sing paling gampang lan paling pas kanggo navigasi nalika metu saka negara asal sampeyan. Tuku peta anyar kanggo GPS kuwi bisa ngirit dhuwit, utawa GPS sing mandiri utawa nyewa saka perusahaan sing nyewakake montor. Yen sampeyan ora duwe sambungan dhata kanggo tilpunmu, utawa yen sampeyan ora ana ing ranggehan, asil bisa uga diwatesi utawa ora kasedhiya.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when leaving your home country. Buying new maps for GPS can save money, or GPS can be rented from a company that provides a car. If you don't have data connection for your phone, or if you are not in range, results may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Ndelok panggonan lan alam liar Galapagos iku paling apik nganggo prau, kaya sing dilakoni Charles Darwin ing 1835. Luwih saka 60 kapal besiar ngebaki laut Galapagos - wiwit saka ukuran 8 nganti 100 panumpang. Akeh wong sing wis mesen kursi sadurunge mangkat rono (amarga akeh prau sing biyasane wis kebak nalika mangsane wis rame). Mesthekna agen sing ing ngendi sampeyan pesen iku ahline Galapagos kanthi wawasan sing apik babagan pirang-pirang macem kapal. Iki bakal njamin menawa minat lan/utawa alangan tartamtu sampeyan cocok karo kapal sing paling pas kanggo kuwi kabeh.
mt: The best way to see and experience the Galapagos is by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. More than 60 boats cruise the Galapagos waters - from 8 to 100 passengers. Many people have booked their seats before departure (as many boats are usually chartered when full). Check with the agent you booked with for a good understanding of the different types of boats. This will ensure that your interests and/or needs are best suited to the boat that is right for you.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasino adate gawe usaha kanggo nggedhekke wektu lan dhuwit sing dibayar dening tamu-tamu. Cendhela lan jam umume ora ana, lan dalan metu biyasane angel ditemokake. Biyasane dheweke duwe panganan khusus, omben-omben lan hiburan, supaya swasan ati tamu tetep apik, lan nggawe dheweke betah. Sawetara panggonan nawakake ombenan alkohol gratis. Nanging, mendem mblawurne akal, lan kabeh penjudi sing apik ngerti pentinge tetep sadhar.
mt: Casinos are businesses that make money by charging customers for time and money. Clocks and watches are usually not present, and exits are often hidden. They usually have special food, drinks and entertainment, so that customers stay happy, and make them want to stay. Some places offer free alcohol. But, gambling is addictive, and all good gamblers know the dangers.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Kabeh tembung aran, sajejere tembung Sie kanggo sampeyan, tansah diwiwiti kanthi aksara gedhe, uga sanadyan ing tengah ukara. Iki cara sing penting kanggo mbedakake antarane sawetara tembung kriya lan lesan. Iki uga bisa disebut agawe maca luwih gampang, sanadyan nulis dadi ruwet amarga butuh nggoleki menawa tembung kriya utawa tembung sipat digunakake ing bentuk sing tenan anane apa ora.
mt: All proper nouns, your name, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some proper nouns and adjectives. This also makes it easier to read, although it is cumbersome to write because you have to look up whether a proper noun or adjective is used in its singular or plural form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Ana akeh bageyan ndonya, ngobahke tangan, kuwi nandhakake “halo.” Nanging, ning Malaysia, paling ora, kanggo wong sing uri ing ndesa, tegese “mampir,” persis kaya driji sing nekuk, polah sing dituduhke dening negara sisih Kulon tartamtu, lan kudune dienggo kanggo tujuan kuwi. Mangkono uga, wong lelungan saka Inggris ing Spanyol bisa uga salah negesake tangan dadah-dadah sing nyangkut tapak tangan ndadahi (dudu wong sing didadahi) minangka sasmita kanggo bali.
mt: There are many parts of the world where the gesture of waving with the hand, which means “hello,” is different. In Malaysia, for example, the gesture means “come,” just like the way the fingers are crossed, a gesture that is frowned upon in certain Western countries, and the thumbs are used for that purpose. Likewise, people from England in Spain may also mistakenly interpret the hand gesture of crossing the fingers (not the fingers crossed) as an invitation to return.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Gletser kuwi ora stabil, nanging mili medhun saka gunung. Iki bakal nyebabke retakan, celah-celah, sing uga bisa dialangi dening jembatan salju. Tembok lan langit-langit gua es bisa ambruk lan retak bisa ketutup. Ana pinggiran glasier blok sing gedhe banget pecah, ceblok lan kira-kira mluncat utawa ngglindhing saya adoh saka pinggiran.
mt: This glacier is not stable, but it is melting from the mountain. This will cause crevasses, cracks, which can also be bridged by snow bridges. Ice walls and ceilings of caves can collapse and cracks can be closed. There are large blocks of glacier ice that break, block and about move or slide farther away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma iku kutha turis Republik Demokratik Kongo ana pinggiran sisih wetan cedhak Rwanda. Taun 2002 Goma ajur gara-gara lava saka gunung Nyiragongo sing ngubur akeh kutha lan dalan-dalan, utamane punjere kutha. Sanadyan Goma iku sejatine aman, ketekan apa wae sak njabane Goma kudu disinau kanggo mangerteni kahanan perang sing ajeg ana ing Provinsi Kivu Lor. Kutha iki uga dadi dhasar kanggo menek gunung geni Nyiragongo bebarengan karo mlaku nututi dalan kanggo golek Gunung Gorila sing paling murah ing Afrika. Sampeyan bisa nggunakake boda-boda (taksi sepeda) supaya bisa menyang Goma. Regane (lokal) biyasane ~500 Congolese Francs kanggo jarak cedhak.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo near the eastern border with Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was devastated by lava from Mount Nyiragongo which buried many towns and roads, especially the city center. Although Goma is safe, any travel within 20 km of Goma should be carefully considered due to the ongoing war in North Kivu Province. The city is also a base for climbing Mount Nyiragongo and following the road to find the cheapest gorilla trekking in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get to Goma. The fare (local) is usually ~500 Congolese Francs for short distances.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Sembarang perkemahan ing ngisor pinggir Ngarai Gedhe butuh ijin daerah njero. Idin sing diwenehke ana wateane kanggo nglindhungi jurang iki, lan bakla kasedhiyan wiwit sasi ngarep, patang sasi sadurunge wiwitan sasi iki. Mula, idin pedhaleman kanggo tanggal wiwitan kapan wae ing Mei dadi kasadhiya ing 1 Jan. Ruang kanggo wewengkon sing paling misuwur, kayata Lapang Kemah Malekat Cahya, ing jejere Pangingon Phantom, umume diisi dening panyuwunan sing ditampa ing tanggal kapisan dibukak kanggo leladen. Ana saperangan ijin sing diwatesi kanggo panjalukan teka langsung kasedhiya kanthi sistem teka pisanan, dilayani pisanan.
mt: Any camping in the bottom of the Grand Canyon requires a permit from the local area. Permits are limited to protect this canyon, and are available six months in advance, starting on January 1st. So, permits for the first day in May were available on January 1st. Areas most popular, such as Bright Angel Campground, in the Phantom area, are usually filled by reservations taken on the first day the permits are available. There are a few permits available on a first-come, first-served basis, with a system of first-come, first-served.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Sawetara hotel duweni warisan saka mangsa keemasan kereta uap lan kapal laut; sakdurunge Perang Donya keloro, ing abad ke 19 utawa awal abad ke 20. Hotel-hotel iki jaman dhisike ana ngendi wong-wong sugih lan terkenal ing masane bakal nginep, lan asring mangan wengi lan kegiatan wengi. Prabot mode kuna, kurange fasilitas paling anyar, lan umur sing anggun iku uga perangan karaktere dheweke padha. Sanajan biasane duweke pribadi, nanging dheweke asring ngladheni pamimpin negara lan pejabat liyane. Wong lelungan karo tumpukan dhuwit bisa uga nimbang lelungan muter-muter donya, bubar kanthi nginep ing lusmen-lusmen kasebut.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy from the age of steam trains and ocean liners; before World War I, in the late 19th or early 20th century. These hotels were where the rich and famous would stay, and often dine and entertain. Old-fashioned decor, with the latest facilities, and a graceful age is also part of their character. Although usually private, they often host heads of state and other officials. The wealthy traveler can also tour the world, ending their stay in these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Awit saka sambungan kabel serat optik ngisor laut menyang Eropa lan broadband satelit, Greenland bisa nyambung apik kanthi 93% pedunung sing duwe akses internet. Hotel utawa lusmen sampeyan (yen sampeyan manggon ing omah tamu utawa omah pribadi) bakal duwe wifi utawa PC sing ana sambungan internet, lan kabeh panggonan duwe kafe internet utawa lokasi kanthi wifi umum. Kaya sing diumumke ning ndhuwur, sanadyan ukara “Eskimo” tetep ditrima ana ning Amerika Serikat, nanging tetep dianggep ngremehke dening akeh woong Arktik dudu-Amerika Serikat, utamane ning Kanada. Sanajan sampeyan bisa ngrungokake tembung sing digunakake dening Pribumi Greenland, panggunaan kasebut kudu diluputake saka wong asing. Pribumi Greenland nyebut awake dhewe Inuit ing Kanada lan Kalaalleq (jamak Kalaallit), yaiku wong Greenlander, ing Greenland. Kejahatan, lan niatan ala marang wong asing umume, saktenane ora diweruhi ing Greenland. Semono uga ing kutha, ora ana “wilayah bahaya.” Cuaca adhem iku mungkin siji-sijine bebaya nyata sing ora siap bakal diadhepi. Menawa sampeyan ngunjungi Greenland sasuwene mangsa adhem (eling menawa luwih adoh sampeyan menyang lor, iki bakal dadi sansaya adhem), penting kanggo nggawa klambi anget sacukupe. Dina-dina sing suwe banget ing mangsa panas bisa njalari perkara-perkara turu sing cukup lan gegayutan perkara kasarasan. Nalika mangsa ketiga, ati-ati marang nyamuk Nordik. Sanadyan nyamuk-nyamuk iki ora nularke penyakit, nanging nyamuk iki ngganggu banget.
mt: Because of undersea fiber-optic cables to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland can now connect 93% of its population to the Internet. Your hotel or lodge (if you are staying in a guesthouse or private home) will have Wi-Fi or a PC with Internet access, and all locations have Internet cafes or public Wi-Fi areas. Although the word “Eskimo” is still accepted in the United States, it is still considered derogatory by many non-American Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. Although you can hear the word used by Greenlandic natives, its use should be avoided by outsiders. Greenlandic natives call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), that is, Greenlanders, in Greenland. Crime, and ill intent towards outsiders in general, is not tolerated in Greenland. Likewise, there are no “dangerous areas” in the cities. The cold weather is probably the only real danger you will face. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is important to bring warm clothing. Days can be very long in the summer and can cause heat stroke and other heat-related problems. In the third season, be wary of Nordic mosquitoes. Although these mosquitoes do not carry disease, they are very annoying.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Awit saka sambungan kabel serat optik ngisor laut menyang Eropa lan broadband satelit, Greenland bisa nyambung apik kanthi 93% pedunung sing duwe akses internet. Hotel utawa lusmen sampeyan (yen sampeyan manggon ing omah tamu utawa omah pribadi) bakal duwe wifi utawa PC sing ana sambungan internet, lan kabeh panggonan duwe kafe internet utawa lokasi kanthi wifi umum. Kaya sing diumumke ning ndhuwur, sanadyan ukara “Eskimo” tetep ditrima ana ning Amerika Serikat, nanging tetep dianggep ngremehke dening akeh woong Arktik dudu-Amerika Serikat, utamane ning Kanada. Sanajan sampeyan bisa ngrungokake tembung sing digunakake dening Pribumi Greenland, panggunaan kasebut kudu diluputake saka wong asing. Pribumi Greenland nyebut awake dhewe Inuit ing Kanada lan Kalaalleq (jamak Kalaallit), yaiku wong Greenlander, ing Greenland. Kejahatan, lan niatan ala marang wong asing umume, saktenane ora diweruhi ing Greenland. Semono uga ing kutha, ora ana “wilayah bahaya.” Cuaca adhem iku mungkin siji-sijine bebaya nyata sing ora siap bakal diadhepi. Menawa sampeyan ngunjungi Greenland sasuwene mangsa adhem (eling menawa luwih adoh sampeyan menyang lor, iki bakal dadi sansaya adhem), penting kanggo nggawa klambi anget sacukupe. Dina-dina sing suwe banget ing mangsa panas bisa njalari perkara-perkara turu sing cukup lan gegayutan perkara kasarasan. Nalika mangsa ketiga, ati-ati marang nyamuk Nordik. Sanadyan nyamuk-nyamuk iki ora nularke penyakit, nanging nyamuk iki ngganggu banget.
mt: Because of undersea fiber-optic cables to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland can now connect 93% of its population to the Internet. Your hotel or lodge (if you are staying in a guesthouse or private home) will have Wi-Fi or a PC with Internet access, and all locations have Internet cafes or public Wi-Fi areas. Although the word “Eskimo” is still accepted in the United States, it is still considered derogatory by many non-American Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. Although you can hear the word used by Greenlandic natives, its use should be avoided by outsiders. Greenlandic natives call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), that is, Greenlanders, in Greenland. Crime, and ill intent towards outsiders in general, is not tolerated in Greenland. Likewise, there are no “dangerous areas” in the cities. The cold weather is probably the only real danger you will face. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is important to bring warm clothing. Days can be very long in the summer and can cause heat stroke and other heat-related problems. In the third season, be wary of Nordic mosquitoes. Although these mosquitoes do not carry disease, they are very annoying.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang iki dibangun minangka atrium kanggo konvensi abad kaping-17, ing ngendi Templo de San Diego iku bangunan siji-sijine sing isih ana. Iki saiki fungsine minangka alun-alun pusat, lan tansah duwe akeh hal kedadean, awan lan bengi. Ana akeh warung ana ing saubengan taman kuwi, lan nalika awan lan sore uga ana konser gratis sing saka njero gazebo punjer. Callejon del Beso (Gang Ambungan). Rong balkon sing kapisah mung 69 sentimeter yaiku omah saka legenda katresnan lawas. Kanggo sawetara sen, bocah-bocah bakal nyritakake crita kasebut marang sampeyan.
mt: Garden of the Union. This was built as an atrium for the 17th century convention, where the Temple of San Diego is the only remaining building. It now functions as a central plaza, and is always full of activity, day and night. There are many shops in this park, and when the sun sets and the night also has free concerts from the gazebo center. Callejon del Beso (Gang Ambungan). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is the home of the legend of the long romance. For some cents, children will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Mlaku munggah gunung kuwi kagiyatan ana njaba omah sing kalebu mlaku ana ning lingkungan alam, asring ana jalur munggah gunung. Munggah gunung wayah awan kalebu sing adohe luwih sithik saka sak mile nganti sing luwih adoh maneh sing bisa dirampungne sedina. Kanggo munggah gunung sedina sadawane dalan sing gampang persiapan sing dibutuhake iku sathithik, lan wong sing kabugarane sedhengan bisa melu. Kulawarga kanthi bocah cilik-cilik bisa uga butuh persiapan luwih, nanging sedina ing njaba iku bisa gampang kelakon sanadyan karo bayi lan bocah durung sekolah.
mt: Mountaineering is an outdoor activity which may include hiking, climbing, and camping. Mountaineering ranges from activities that require little equipment and skills to activities that involve long preparations, complex equipment and techniques. Some popular activities are rock climbing, hill walking, and ice climbing. Mountaineers often climb in groups, and often require special skills and knowledge. Families with young children can also enjoy mountaineering, but will require more preparation.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Ciri khase Norwegia kuwi teluk sempit lan dawa sing tajem lan lembah sing ujug-ujug munggah, kurang utawa luwih plato sing rata. Dataran iki asring diarani ""vidde"" sing tegese papan sing bukakan tanpa wates sing amba, gumelar tanpa wates. Ing Rogaland lan Agder dheweke asring diarani ""hei"" sing tegese lemah tanpa wit sing asring ditutupi heather."
mt: "Norway's distinctive features are its narrow and long fjords and valleys, which are often called ""vidde"" meaning an open area without boundaries, which are often called ""hei"" meaning a heather-covered moor."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Mangsa turis stasiun bukit umume muncak sasuwene mangsa panas Indian. Nanging, dheweke nduwe jinis kaendahan lan tenung beda-beda nalika mangsa atis, kanthi akeh setasiyun bukit nampa gunggung salju sing waras lan nawakake kamempengan kayata ski lan prosotan salju.
mt: Tourist hill stations are usually at their peak during the Indian summer. However, they have different kinds of beauty and charm during the winter, with many hill stations receiving heavy snowfall and offering activities like skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Sampeyan kudu yakin nalikane tekan pelabuhan kabeh bakal dadi jelas. Sampeyan bakal nemoni wong liya kang nunut prau lan dheweke bakal mbagekake informasine marang sampeyan. Dhasare sampeyan bakal masang wara-wara nawarne pitulungan sampeyan, wira-wiri ing dermaga, nyedaki wong kang ngresiki kapal pesiare, nyoba kenalan karo pelaut ana ing bar, lsp. Cobanen ngomong karo wong saakeh-akehe. Sakwise sawetara wektu kabeh wong bakal kenal sampeyan lan bakal menehi sampeyan petunjuk prau endi sing nggoleki wong.
mt: You must be sure that you will be able to recognize every port when you get there. You will see other people boarding the ship and they will give you their information. Your ship will be flying a flag with your name on it, and you will see people in the dock, cleaning the ship, trying to make friends with sailors in the bar, etc. Talk to people as you go. After some time, everyone will know you and will give you directions to the ship that is looking for people.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Pulo Hong Kong menehi wilayah Hongkong jenenge lan iku papan sing dianggep akeh plancong minangka pusat utamane. Arak-arakan bangunan kang ndadekake pencakar langite Hong Kong dibandhingne karo bagan batangan sing murup sing digawe cetha kanthi anane banyu saka Pelabuhan Victoria. Kanggo oleh pasawangan sing paling apik ing Hong Kong, lunga saka pulo kasebut lan tumuju menyang pinggir laut Kowloon sing sabrangan. Sebagean gedhe pulo Kong Kong perkembangan urban padhet banget ing lemah sing direklamasi ing pesisir lor. Iki minangka papan sing diarani para panjajah Inggris dadi duweke lan yen sampeyan nggoleki bukti daerah kolonial sing kepungkur, iki minangka papan sing apik kanggo diwiwiti.
mt: Hong Kong Island is named after the island on which it is centred and which is considered the territory's most important area. The skyscrapers of Hong Kong Island are seen in the background, with the water of Victoria Harbour in the foreground. For the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head to the waterfront of Kowloon across the harbour. Much of the island's land reclamation is in the north. This is where the British colonists first settled and if you are looking for colonial relics, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Sanggurdi kasebut minangka anggan kanggo sikil panunggang sing nggandul ing loro-lorone lapak. Dheweke nyedhiyakake stabilitas sing luwih gedhe kanggo sing nunggangi nanging bisa uga kuwatir amarga sikil wong sing nunggang isih bisa kajebak ana kana. Menawa penunggang tiba saka jaran nanging duwe siji sikil sing kejiret ing sanggurdi, dheweke padha bisa digeret menawa jarane mlayu. Kanggo nyilikake resiko iki, sawetara tindakan pencegahan kanggo keamanan bisa ditindakake. Sing sepisan, ameh kabeh penunggang nganggo sepatu but kanggo nunggang sing ana hake lan sole alus tur sempit. Sabanjure, sawetara lapak, kususe lapak Inggris, duwe palang pengaman sing ngidini kulit sanggur tiba saka lapak yen ditarik mundur dening pangendara sing tiba.
mt: The  saddle  is  a  device  for  the  rider's  hindquarters.  It  provides  greater  stability  for  the  rider  but  may  also  be  a  concern  for  the  rider's  hindquarters.  If  the  rider  arrives  from  a  horse  but  has  one  hindquarter  in  the  saddle,  it  may  be  pulled  back  when  the  horse  moves.  To  mitigate  this  risk,  some  safety  measures  can  be  taken.  First,  all  riders  wear  soft-soled  boots  for  riding  with  a  wide  and  smooth  sole.  Next,  some  stalls,  especially  in  England,  have  safety  bars  that  allow  the  horse's  hindquarters  to  come  out  of  the  stall  when  the  horse  is  pulled  back.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Jaringan pertukaran mertamu iku organisasi sing ngubungake pelancong karo wong lokal ing kutha-kutha sing dheweke ameh tekani. Kanggo melu jaringan biyasane mung kudu ngisi formulir daring; sanajan sawetara jaringan nawakake utawa mbutuhake pambukten tambahan. Urutan wong sing bisa nyedhiyani omah kanggo nginep banjur disedhiyakake kanthi dicethak utawa onlen, kadang kala kanthi acuan lan ulasan sing digawe dening wong sing nginep. Couchsurfing didegake ing Januari 2004 sawise programer komputer Casey Fenton nemokake penerbangan murah menyang Islandia nanging ora duwe papan kanggo nginep. Dheweke ngirimke surat elektronik marang siswane ana universitas lokal lan nrima akeh banget tawaran akomodasi gratis.
mt: The CouchSurfing network is an organization that connects travelers with local people in cities they are visiting. To join the network, one usually only needs to fill out an online form; some networks require or recommend additional verification. Once a list of people who can host is generated, it is sorted or ranked based on reviews and ratings made by people who have stayed with them. CouchSurfing was founded in January 2004 after programmer Casey Fenton found cheap flights to Iceland but had no place to stay. He sent an email to his students at a local university and received many offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Jaringan pertukaran mertamu iku organisasi sing ngubungake pelancong karo wong lokal ing kutha-kutha sing dheweke ameh tekani. Kanggo melu jaringan biyasane mung kudu ngisi formulir daring; sanajan sawetara jaringan nawakake utawa mbutuhake pambukten tambahan. Urutan wong sing bisa nyedhiyani omah kanggo nginep banjur disedhiyakake kanthi dicethak utawa onlen, kadang kala kanthi acuan lan ulasan sing digawe dening wong sing nginep. Couchsurfing didegake ing Januari 2004 sawise programer komputer Casey Fenton nemokake penerbangan murah menyang Islandia nanging ora duwe papan kanggo nginep. Dheweke ngirimke surat elektronik marang siswane ana universitas lokal lan nrima akeh banget tawaran akomodasi gratis.
mt: The CouchSurfing network is an organization that connects travelers with local people in cities they are visiting. To join the network, one usually only needs to fill out an online form; some networks require or recommend additional verification. Once a list of people who can host is generated, it is sorted or ranked based on reviews and ratings made by people who have stayed with them. CouchSurfing was founded in January 2004 after programmer Casey Fenton found cheap flights to Iceland but had no place to stay. He sent an email to his students at a local university and received many offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Asrama mung ngladheni wong enom – tamu khusus sing umur rong puluhan – nanging sampeyan uga asring bisa nemokake plancong sing luwih tuwa. Keluwarga kanthi anak-anak iku sawijining sawangan jarang, nanging sawetara pondhokan ngidini dheweke padha ing kamar pribadi.
mt: Dorms only accommodate young people – special guests in their twenties – but you can often find older lodgers. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels allow them to share a private room.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Nguncalake boomerang iku ketrampilan populer sing pengin dirambah akeh wisatawan. Yen sampeyan kepingin sinau nyawatake bumerang sing bisa bali maneh menyang tanganmu, pestekno sampeyan nduwe bumerang sing cocog lan bisa bali. Akeh-akeh bumerang sing sumedya ing Australia sejatine ora bisa dibalekake. Iki sing paling apik kanggo pemula kanggo ora njajal nguncalke ing angin.
mt: Updating your boomerang skills is a popular pastime that many tourists wish to improve. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang that will return to your hand, you should have a boomerang that is suitable and can return. Most boomerangs available in Australia are not returnable. This is the best for beginners not to try to update in the wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Kanthi 17,000 pulo-pulo sing bisa dipilih, panganan Indonesia iku tembung umum sing nyakup pirang-pirang jinis masakan daerah sing ditemokake ing sak negara. Nanging, yen digunakake tanpa kualifikasi luwih adoh, istilah iki bakal diartekne yen panganan iki asline saka jawa sisih wetan lan tengah. Saiki wis kasedhiya ana kabeh daerah ning nuswantara, masakan Jawa sing nyedhiyakake akeh jinis hidangan sederhana, rasa tambahan sing disenengi dening wong Jawa yaiku kacang, lombok, gula (kususe gula klapa Jawa) lan empon-empon wangi liyane.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a general term covering many regional dishes found throughout the archipelago. However, when used without further qualification, the term is usually taken to refer to the cuisine of central and eastern Java. Today there is all the regions in the archipelago, Javanese cuisine offers a variety of simple dishes, the taste of Javanese people like peanuts, chilies, sugar (including Javanese sugar cane) and fragrant herbs.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Kanggo sapa kang awam karo jargon medis, tembung infeksi lan nular duwe teges kang beda. Lelaran sing nular yaiku lelaran sing disebabake dening patogen, kayata virus, bakteri, jamur utawa parasit liyane. Penyakit nular yaiku penyakit sing gampang pindhah kanthi ana ing sekitare wong sing kena. Akeh pemerintah majibake dhayoh mlebu, utawa penduduk lunga, negarane divaksinasi kanggo maneka warna penyakit. Syarat-syarat iki biyasane gumantung marang negara sing kepingin ditekani dening wisatawan.
mt: For the layman, the terms "infection" and "contagious" have different meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other microbe. A contagious disease is one that spreads easily among people in close contact. Many governments require incoming, or outgoing, visitors to be vaccinated against a variety of diseases. These requirements usually depend on the country the visitor is coming from.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Panyedhiya VPN pribadi (jaringan pribadi virtual) yaiku cara paling apik kanggo mbukak panyensuran politik lan IP-geofilter komersial. Dheweke luwih unggul tinimbang proksi jaringan kanthi alesan: dheweke ngelih jalur lalu lintas internet, ora mung http. Biyasane dheweke nawakke bandwith sing luwih dhuwur lan kualitas layanan sing luwih apik. Tur uga dienkripsi saingga angel dideleng.
mt: Private VPN providers (virtual private networks) are the best way to bypass political and commercial IP-geofilters. They are superior to network proxies for the following reasons: they route all internet traffic, not just http. They usually provide higher bandwidth and better service quality. And they are encrypted so they are not easily detected.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Amarga panggilan disalurake liwat Internet, sampeyan ora perlu nggunakake telpon perusahaan sing ana ing ngendi sampeyan manggon utawa ing ngendi sampeyan lelungan. Uga ora ana sarat supaya sampeyan entuk nomer lokal saka komunitas ing panggon sampeyan; Sampeyan bisa entuk sambungan Internet satelit ing alas gedhe Pitik, Alaska lan milih nomer sing nyatakake sampeyan ing Arizona sing crah. Asring, sampeyan kudu tuku nomer global kanthi kapisah sing ngidini tilpun PSTN ngubungi sampeyan. Nomer kasebut ndadekake prabéda kanggo wong sing nilpun sampeyan.
mt: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you don't need to use a company's local number where you live or where you travel. You can get a satellite Internet connection in a remote Alaskan forest and dial an Arizona number that rings your cell. Often, you'll need to buy a separate global number that allows PSTN calls to reach you. This number is distinct from the number you use to make calls.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Pangucapan kasebut cukup gampang ing basa Itali amarga umume tembung diwaca persis karo carane nulis Aksara utama sing kudu diawasi yaiku c lan g, awit cara nembunge beda-beda gumantung saka aksara swara sing ngetutne. Uga priksa manawa ngucapake r lan rr kanthi beda: caro tegese sayang, dene carro tegese sepur.
mt: This is easy to pronounce in Italian because most words are pronounced exactly as they are spelled, with the main exception being c and g, which are pronounced differently depending on the following vowel. Also, check that you pronounce r and rr differently: caro means "dear", while carro means "car".
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir iku kutha paling gedhe nomer telu ing Turki kanthi populasi kira-kira 3,7 yuta, pelabuhan paling gedhe nomer loro sakwise Istanbul, lan pusat transportasi sing apik banget. Dhisik Smyrna minangka kutha kuna, sing saiki dadi pusat padagangan modheren, megar lan sibuk, dumunung ing sakubenge teluk gedhe lan dikubengi gunung. Dalan raya sing gedhe, gedhung tembok-kaca lan pasar moderen dirias kanthi gendheng tradisional keramik-abang, pasar abad 18, lan mejid lan gereja tuwa, sanadyan kutha iki nduweni hawa Eropa Mediterania tinimbang tradisional Turki.
mt: Izmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of about 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and an excellent transportation hub.  Ancient Smyrna was an ancient city, now a modern, bustling, commercial center, situated on a large bay and surrounded by mountains.  Wide boulevards, glass-and-steel skyscrapers, and modern markets are interspersed with traditional red-tiled ceramic-tiled bazaars, an 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has a Mediterranean European climate rather than traditional Turkish.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Sesawangan kembang sakura, dikenal dadi hanami, wis dadi kabudayane wong Jepang wiwit abad 8. Gagasan kasebut saka China ing ngendi kembang plum yaiku kembang sing dadi pilihan. Ing Jepang, pista kembang sakura kang kapisan sing dianakake Kaisar mung kanggo awake dhewe lan anggota liya aristokrasi ing sakubenge Pangadilan Imperial.
mt: The image of the cherry blossom, known as hanami, has been a Japanese cultural phenomenon since the eighth century. The idea came from China where the plum blossom was the preferred choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom viewing party was held by the Emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy at the Imperial Palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
