src: Yerusalem kuwi ibukota lan kutha sing paling gedhe ning Israel, sanadyan akeh banget negara lan uga PBB ora ngaoni kutha iki dadi ibukota Israel. Kutha kuno ing Bukit Yudea duwe sejarah sing narik kawigaten rentang ewunan taun. Kutha kasebut iku suci kanggo telu agama monoteis - Yahudi, Kristen, lan Islam, lan minangka pusat spiritual, agama lan budhaya. Amarga kapentingan agama ana ning kutha, lan utamane akeh panggonan saka daerah Kutha Lawas, Yerusalem kuwi salah sawijine tujuan utama turis ana ning Israel. Jerusalem duwe akeh panggonan bersejarah, arkeologis lan budaya, kanthi pusat blanja sing werna-werni lan rame, cafe, lan restoran.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although many countries and the UN do not recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel. The ancient city on the Mount of Olives has a history that is fascinating for thousands of years. The city is holy to three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity, and Islam, and as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Because of its religious importance, and especially many sites from the Old City, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological, and cultural sites, with a colorful and lively shopping center, cafes, and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Taman Nasional Kruger (KNP) manggon ana lor-wetan Afrika Kidul lan sadawane watesanMozambiq ana sisih wetan, Zimbabwe ana sisih lor, lan wates sisih kidul iku Kali Boyo. Taman iki ambane 19.500 km² lan didum dadi 14 zona lingkungan sing beda-beda, kabeh cocog kanggo kewan. Iki salah sawijine hiburan utama sing ana ing Afrika Kidul lan diarani dadi andalan Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul (SANParks). Lan kanggo kabeh Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul, ana konservasi dinan lan tarip mlebu kanggo taman. Iki uga bisa nguntungake kanggo wong sing tuku Kertu Liar, sing nyedhiyani dalan mlebu menyang panggonan sing dipilih ning Afrika Kidul utawa ning Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa and borders Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the west. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, all suitable for wildlife. It is one of the major attractions in South Africa and is known as the flagship of the South African National Parks (SANParks). And for all South African National Parks, there is conservation and an entrance fee to the park. It also benefits those who purchase a Wild Card, which allows access to the chosen location in South Africa or in South African National Parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Munggul ning ndhuwur pucuk sisih lor Machu Picchu yaiku gunung sing ndronjong, asring dadi latar mburi foto sing rumuntuh. Katone rada medeni saka ngisor, lan munggah gunung kuwi bakal angel lan dhuwur banget, nanging wong sing paling sehat kudune bisa munggah 45 menit tekan ndhuwur. Watu pijekan dideleh sadawane dalan kuwi, lan ana panggonan sing luwih curam dipasangi kabel baja kanggo nguwatke cekelane. Sing ngandika, ngarepake kentekan ambegan, lan ati-ati ing bagean sing luwih njuleg, utamane nalika udan, amarga bisa mbebayani kanthi cepet. Ana guwa sing cilik banget cedhak pucuke sing kudu diliwati, rada cendhek lan rada nyepit.
mt: The top of the left side of Machu Picchu is a mountain ridge, often used as a backdrop in falling photos. It is a bit more difficult from below, and climbing the mountain will be steep and high, but the healthiest people can climb 45 minutes to the top. The rocks are scattered along the entire road, and there are places with more steeply placed steel cables to hold the ropes. It is said, hoping for a safe descent, and be careful in the more slippery parts, especially when it rains, because it can be dangerous quickly. There are small caves close to the top that must be passed through, a bit tight and a bit narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Masakan Majorcan, kayata tlatah sing padha ing Mediterania, adhedhasar roti, sayur lan daging (khususe daging babi), lan nggunakake lenga zaitun ing saindenging. Nedha bengi sing biasa lan misuwur, utamane ing mangsa panas, yaiku Pa amb Oli: Roti nganggo lenga zaitun, tomat, lan bumbu-bumbu sing kasedhiya kayata keju, iwak tuna, lsp.
mt: Majorcan cuisine, like that of the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A typical and popular night-time snack, especially in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: bread with olive oil, tomatoes, and available seasonings such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Masakan Hangi iku dimasak ing bolongan panas ing jero lemah. Bolongan kuwi dipanaske nggunakake watu panas saka geni, utawa ana panggonan tartamtu nggunakake panass bumi sing gawe panas kanthi alami. Hangi kerep digunakake kanggo masak masakan jenis bakaran tradisional. Ana pirang-pirang panggonan ning Rotorua sing nawakke hangi panas bumi, lan hangi liyane bisa dijukuk ning Christchurch, Wellington lan panggonan liyane.
mt: Hangi is cooked in a pit oven in the ground. The pit is heated using hot stones from a fire, or in some places using naturally heated geothermal hot rocks. Hangi is often used to cook traditional barbecue style food. There are several geothermal hot hangi sites in Rotorua, and hangi can also be found in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Nalika ngunjungi biara-biara, para wanita diwajibake kanggo nganggo rok nutupi dhengkul lan nutupi pundhake dheweke padha, uga. Saperangan akeh biara nyawisake slendhang kanggo wanita sing teka tanpa persiapan, nanging menawa sampeyan nggawa nggone sampeyan dhewe, utamane sing wernane cerah, sampeyan bakal entuk eseman saka biarawan utawa biarawati ing dalan mlebu. Sadawane garis sing padha, pria kudu nganggo clana dawa sing nutupi dhengkul. Iki uga bisa disilih saka simpenan ing pintu mlebu nanging klambi kasebut ora dikumbah saben-saben bar dienggo dadi sampeyan bisa uga ngrasa ora nyaman nganggo saya iki. Sak ukuran kanggo kabeh wong lanang!
mt: When visiting monasteries, women are required to wear skirts that cover the knees and thighs, too. Some monasteries provide robes for women who arrive unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially bright-colored, you will receive a scolding from a monk or nun on the way in. All the same, men must wear long robes that cover the knees. This can also be borrowed from the storage at the entrance, but this robe is not washed every time it is used so you may feel uncomfortable wearing this. For all men and women!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Menawa sampeyan ngunjungi daerah Arktik utawa Antartika ing musim adhem sampeyan bakal ngalami bengi kutub, sing tegese menawa srengenge ora munggah ing ndhuwur cakrawala. Iki menehi wewengan sing apik kanggo ndeleng Aurora borealis, amarga langit bakal dadi luwih peteng utawa kurang ing sakubenge jam. Amarga wilayah kasebut populasine arang, lan polusine sithik mila kuwi dudu masalah, sampeyan uga bakal bisa nyawang lintang-lintang.
mt: When you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in the winter you will experience polar night, which means the sun will not rise above the horizon. This gives a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, because the sky will be darker or less bright around midnight. Because these areas have few people and little pollution, this is not a problem, and you will also be able to see stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Ing lokasi sing asing, tanpa jangkoan ponsel, tilpon satelit bisa uga dadi pilihan sampeyan siji-sijine. Telpon satelit kuwi dudu kanggo ngowahi telpon, amarga sampeyan kudu menyang njaba kanthi jalur sing cetha menyang satelit yen kepingin telpon. Layanan iki umume digunakake dening pangiriman, kalebu kapal pribadhi, uga ekspedisi sing nduweni data jarak adoh lan mbutuhake swara. Panyedhiya layanan tilpun lokal sampeyan kudune bisa menehi informasi luwih babagan nyambungake marang layanan iki.
mt: In remote locations, without a landline, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a replacement for a phone, as you must go outside with a direct line to a satellite if you want to make a call. This service is commonly used by shipping, including private yachts, as well as expeditions with far-flung data and need voice. Your local phone provider can give you more information about connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Ibukota Moldova yaiku Chişinău. Basa lokaleyaiku Basa Romania, nanging basa Rusia sing paling akeh digunakake. Moldova minangka republik aneka-suku sing nandhang pasulayan suku. Taun 1994, perkara iki nyiptakake proklamasi sing dilakoni dening Republik Transnistria ning Moldova wetan, sing nduweni pamerintahe dhewe lan dhuwite dhewe nanging durung diakoni dening anggota PBB. Sambungan ekonomi wis dibangun maneh antarane rong bagean saka Moldova iki sanajan mrucut rerembug politik. Agama paling gedhe ing Moldova yaiku Kristen Ortodoks.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. Its official language is Romanian, but Russian is the most widely used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic with a history of ethnic strife. In 1994, this issue led to a declaration of independence by the Republic of Transnistria in western Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognized by the UN. Economic ties have been rebuilt between the two parts of Moldova, although political relations remain strained. The largest religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Amarga Montevideo iku ana ing kidul Khatulistiwa, iki iku mangsa panas ing kana nalika iki iku mangsa adhem ing Belahan Bumi sisih Lor lan sewalike. Montevideo manggon ana ing daerah subtropis; nalika mangsa ketiga, hawa luwih saka +30°C wis lumrah. Mangsa adhem bisa dadi adhem nemen: suhu arang mudhun ing ngisor titik beku, nanging angin lan kalembapan gabung nggawe supaya krasa luwih adhem tinimbang sing dituduhake termometer. Ora ana usum ""udan"" lan ""garing"" kusus: gunggungan udan ajeg kira-kira padha sajrone taun."
mt: "Because Montevideo is south of the Equator, this is summer in the Southern Hemisphere and winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is located in a subtropical region; in the third season, temperatures are usually above +30°C. Winter can be quite cold: temperatures rarely fall below freezing, but wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are no special "rainy" and "dry" seasons: rainfall is fairly constant throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Mural utawa orek-orekan sing ora dikepengini iku arane grafiti. Sanajan adoh saka pristiwa modheren, umume wong bisa nggandhengake dheweke karo wong enom sing ngrusak prabot umum lan pribadi nggunakake cet semprot. Nanging, saiki ana seniwan grafiti mapan, acara grafiti lan tembok ""rasmi"". Gegambaran grafiti ing kahanan iki asring meh padha karo karya seni tinimbang tandha sing ora bisa diwaca."
mt: "A mural or graffiti that is not appreciated is called vandalism. Although far from the modern phenomenon, most people can associate it with young people who damage public and private property using spray paint. However, now there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "official" walls. Graffiti images in this case are often similar to works of art rather than illegible marks."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Kanggo sawetara pista, umume hadlirin pista musik mancasi kemah ing panggon kasebut, lan umume hadlirin nganggep iku minangka bagean penting saka pangalaman. Yen sampeyan pengin cedhak sampeyan kudu luwih gasik kanggo njupuk papan pakemahan sing cedhak karo musik. Elinga yen sanadyan musik sing ana panggung utama wis mandheg, bisa uga ana bab saka pameran iki sing bakal tetep nyuwarakke musik iki nganti tengah wengi. Sawetara festival duweni panggonan kemah kang kusus kanggo kaluwarga kang duweni bocah cilik.
mt: For some festivals, the main stage is often a tented campsite, and often consider it an important part of the experience. If you want to be close, you need to be more prepared for a camping site close to the music. Even if the main stage music has stopped, there may be something from this show that will continue to play this music until midnight. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Kelingan akehe jumlah wong pueblos, sampeyan ora bakal bisa nemokake urip nalika wengi tanpa dolan menyang Albuquerque utawa Santa Fe. Nanging, ameh kabeh kasino sing kasebut ing dhuwur nyediyani ombenan, lan sawetarane nyediyani hiburan berkelas (utamane sing gedhe-gedhe sing ana cedhake Albuquerque lan Santa Fe). Ati-ati: bar-bar ing kutha cilik kene ora mesthi papan sing apik kanggo dolan dhayoh luar negri. Kanggo sakperkara, New Meksiko Lor duwe masalah penting karo nyetir nalika mendem, lan konsentrasi saka sopir sing mendem cedhak karo bar ing kutha cilik.
mt: The pueblo population is small, you won't find life after dark without driving to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. But, all the casinos mentioned above offer drinks, and some offer entertainment of a class (especially the big ones in and around Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: the small towns around here are not always great places to drive drunk. For one thing, New Mexico North has a serious problem with drunk driving, and the concentration of drunk drivers around the small towns is close to bar.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Bir lokal sing utama yaiku 'Number One', iki dudu bir sing kompleks, nanging enak lan nyegerake. Bir lokal sing liya jenenge “Manta”. Ana akeh anggur Prancis sing bisa diduweni, nanging anggur Selandia Baru lan Australia kemungkinan luwih apik kanggo digawa lelungan. Banyu kran lokal aman banget kanggo diombe, nanging banyu botol bisa ditemokake yen sampeyan wedi. Kanggo wong Australia, gagasan kopi kang 'putih rata' iku asing. Kopi cekak ireng iku 'espresso', cappuccino duwe tumpukan krim kang dhuwur (dudu unthuk), lan teh iku diladenake tanpa susu. Coklat panase madani standar Belgia. Jus buahe larang tapi enak tenan.
mt: The main local beer is 'Number One', this is not a complex beer, but good and refreshing. Other local beers are called “Manta”. There are many French wines available, but New Zealand and Australian wines are probably better for bringing on a picnic. Local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water can be found if you prefer. For Australians, the idea of coffee that is 'flat white' is strange. Black coffee is 'espresso', cappuccino has a layer of cream on top (not hot), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate is standard Belgian. Herbal teas are forbidden but tasty nonetheless.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Guarani minangka klompok pribumi paling penting sing saiki manggon ing dhaerah sing saiki arane Paraguay Wétan, urip minangka dadi grema semi-nomaden sing uga nganakake tetanen panguripan. Daerah Chaco kuwi omah kanggo klompok-klompok suku pribumi liyane kayata Guaycuru lan Payagua, sing urip kanthi mburu kewan, tani lan mancing. Ing abad kaping 16 Paraguay, sadurunge disebut “Provinsi raseksa ing Hindia”, iku lair minangka asil saka paprangan penakhluk Spanyol karo kelompok-kelompok penduduk pribumi. Wong-wong Spanyol miwiti mangsa panjajahan sing suwene telung abad. Awit pembentukan Asuncion ing 1537, Paraguay bisa njaga pirang-pirang saka identitas lan watak pribumine.
mt: Guarani is the largest indigenous group currently living in the area now known as Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers who also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region is home to other indigenous groups such as the Guaycuru and Payagua, who lived by hunting, farming and fishing. In the 16th century, before it was called "The Province of the Holy Spirit in the Indies", Paraguay was born out of Spanish conquests against indigenous groups. The Spanish began a three-hundred-year period of colonial rule. Since the founding of Asuncion in 1537, Paraguay has been able to retain much of its indigenous identity and character.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Wong Paris duwe sipat ngawigateni awak dhewe, kasar lan sumengah. Biyasane iki asring dadi kapercayan sing ora pener, cara sing paling apik supaya bisa rukun ana ning Paris yaiku tetep nggunakake kabiyasanmu, macak kayata ana wong sing ""bien élevé"" (diajari kanthi apik). Dadine bakal luwih gampang. Tumindake wong Paris bakal cepet ilang yen sampeyan nuduhake sopan-santun."
mt: "Parisians have a tendency to be self-centered, rude and arrogant. Usually this is a mistaken assumption, the best way to get along in Paris is to keep your manners, for example, there are people who are ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). You will find it easier. Parisians will disappear quickly if you show good manners."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: RelMetro nduwe kelas loro ana sepur komuter ana njero lan ana sekitare Cape Town: MetroPlus (uga diarani Kelas Utama) lan Metro (diarani Kelas Katelu). MetroPlus iku luwih kepenak lan ora pati rame nanging rada larang sathithik, sandyan isih luwih murah katimbang tiket metro sing lumrah ing Eropa. Saben sepur nduweni MetroPlus lan uga gerbong Metro; gerbong MetroPlus mesthi ana mburine sepur sing paling cedhak menyang Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail has two classes of commuter train within and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but a bit more expensive than the usual Metro ticket in Europe. Each train has MetroPlus and also Metro carriages; MetroPlus carriages are always at the front of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Plancong bisa mlebu menyang sarang kewan sing ora dikenal ning daerah sing beda. Ama bisa ngrusak panganan, nyebabake iritasi, utawa ing kasus sing paling parah nyebabake reaksi alergi, nyebar racun, utawa ngirim infeksi. Penyakit nular dhewe, utawa kewan mbebayani sing bisa nglarani utawa mateni wong kanthi kakuwatane, biasane ora diarani omo.
mt: The planthopper can enter unknown animal habitats in different areas. It can contaminate food, cause irritation, or in the worst case cause allergic reactions, spread toxins, or transmit infections. The disease itself, or the dangerous animal that can bite or kill people with its strength, is usually not called a bug.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Saben pojokan toko diisi karo jejeran kertu telepon prabayar sing mbingungake sing bisa digunakake saka telepon umum utawa telepon sing biyasa. Nalika umume kertu apik kanggo nilpun ing ngendi wae, sawetara khusus nyedhiyakake beya tilpun sing nguntungake kanggo klompok negara tartamtu. Akses menyang layanan iku kerep liwat nomor telepon bebas pulsa sing bisa ditelpon saka saperangan akeh talpon tanpa bea.
mt: Every corner of the store is filled with a bewildering array of prepaid phone cards that can be used from any phone or phone that is usually. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some are tailored to offer discounts to certain groups of countries. Access to these services is often through free phone numbers that can be called from a variety of phones without charge.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Taman nasional Tlaga Plitvice iku alase kandel, utamane kanthi wit beech, spruce, lan cemara, lan nonjolake campuran vegetasi Alpen lan Mediterania. Iki nduweni jinis komunitas tetanduran sing akeh banget, amarga jangka mangsa mikro, mbedakake lemah lan akeh tingkatan dhuwur. Wilayahe iku uga omah kanggo maneka warna spesies kewan lan manuk.sing werna-werna banget. Fauna langka kayata beruang coklat, asu, manuk gagak, manuk dares, lynx, kucing liar lan manuk belibis bisa ditemokake ana kono, uga akeh jinis kewan liyane.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is a large, almost 300 square kilometres (120 sq mi) area of forested mountains and lakes, best known for its 16 lakes interconnected by a series of waterfalls. It is located in the Lika region of Croatia, some 10 kilometres (6.2 mi) south of the town of Plitvice. The area is part of a larger national park that stretches out over 19,300 hectares (47,900 acres). The national park was proclaimed in 1949, and since then the area has been designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The lakes are separated by natural dams of travertine, which is deposited by the action of the water containing calcium carbonate deposited from the surface water and dissolved limestone. The lakes are grouped into the Upper Lakes and the Lower Lakes. The Upper Lakes are the smaller, upper lakes, and the Lower Lakes are the larger, lower lakes. The lakes are separated by travertine barriers. The largest of the lakes is Kozjak, which covers 0.9 square kilometres (0.35 sq mi). The lakes are located in the karstic valley of the river Korana, and are known for their distinctive features formed by dissolution of the limestone and the subsequent deposition of travertine. The lakes are separated by natural dams of travertine, which is deposited by the action of the water containing calcium carbonate deposited from the surface water and dissolved limestone. The lakes are grouped into the Upper Lakes and the Lower Lakes. The Upper Lakes are the smaller, upper lakes, and the Lower Lakes are the larger, lower lakes. The lakes are separated by travertine barriers. The largest of the lakes is Kozjak, which covers 0.9 square kilometres (0.35 sq mi). The lakes are located in the karstic valley of the river Korana, and are known for their distinctive features formed by dissolution of the limestone and the subsequent deposition of travertine. The lakes are separated by natural dams of travertine, which is deposited by the action of the water containing calcium carbonate deposited from the surface water and dissolved limestone. The lakes are grouped into the Upper Lakes and the Lower Lakes. The Upper Lakes are the smaller, upper lakes, and the Lower Lakes are the larger, lower lakes. The lakes are separated by travertine barriers. The largest of the lakes is Kozjak, which covers 0.9 square kilometres (0.35 sq mi). The lakes are located in the kar
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Perusahaan-perusahaan media kanthi ajeg ngapusi babagan ancas iki, ngaku menawa iki iku kanggo ""nyegah pembajakan"". Ing nyatane kode wilayah ora duwe pengaruh temenan marang salinan sing ora sah; sethithik baka sethithik disk bakal diputer kanthi apik ing piranti ngendi wae sing asli. Ancas sing satemene yaiku kanggo menehi perusahaan-perusahaan iku kontrol sing luwih marang pemasarane; iki iku kabeh babagan puteraning dhuwit."
mt: "Media companies are increasingly secretive about this issue, admitting that this is for ""copyright protection"". In reality, region codes have no effect on unauthorized copies; as much as possible, the original will play perfectly on any device where the original is. The real reason is to give these companies more control over their sales; this is all about money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Sanadyan pamriksaan imigrasi biasane ora ana utawa mung formalitas nalika sampeyan tekan ing negara asal, bea cukai bisa ngrepoti. Priksa manawa sampeyan ngerti apa sing bisa lan ora bisa nggawa lan nyatakake apa wae ing wewaton.
mt: While immigration inspections are usually absent or perfunctory when you arrive in your home country, customs can report. Check whether you understand what can and cannot bring and declare what is in the regulations.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Lembah Cochamó - jujugan menek gunung sing utama ing Chili, dikenal minangka Yosemite saka Amerika Kidul, kanthi macem-macem tembok gedhe granit lan karang. Puncake kalebu pemandhangan kang nengsemake sak pucuk. Para pendaki saka kabeh bagean donya terus gawe dalan anyar ing antarane potensi pinggirane sing tanpa akhir.
mt: Cochamó Valley - a major mountain climbing destination in Chile, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of huge granite and rock walls. Peaks include panoramic views from the top. Climbers from all over the world continue to make new routes among its endless potential side slopes.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Yen sampeyan kepingin mabur ana Sisih Kidul donya, pilihan tujuan lan jalur mabure sithik banget amarga jalur lintas segara kuwi sithik banget. Ora ana aliansi maskapai sing nyakup penyebrangan kabeh telung segara ing laut sisih kidul (lan SkyTeam ora nyakup salah sijining penyebrangan). Nanging, Aliansi Bintang nanggung kabeh biayane kajaba Pasifik Kidul bageyan wetan saka Santiago de Chili menyang Tahiti, sing diarani LATAM mabur Sakdonya. Penerbangan iki dudu pilihan siji-sijine menawa sampeyan pengin ora liwat Pasifik Kidul lan pesisir wetan Amerika Kidul. (delok ngisor iki)
mt: If you want to fly to the Southern Hemisphere, your route and destination choices are limited because there are few transoceanic routes. There is no airline alliance that covers all three Southern Ocean crossings (and SkyTeam doesn't cover any of them). However, Star Alliance covers all of them except for the South Pacific east of Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, which is flown by LATAM, which is the only one of them. This is not the only option if you don't want to go through the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Miturut cathetan internasional, ana 200 organisasi sing ngurusi perkara plesiran. Akeh banget sing mlaku kanthi mandiri. Pengganti Perjalanan Mlayu Sajagad, Perjalanan Mlayu Lunga jaringan lusinan panyadhiya penglihatan ing papat benua. Wiwit saka Barcelona's Running Tours ing Barcelona lan Copenhagen's Running ing Copenhagen, kegiyatan kuwi enggal ditututi karo Running Tours Prague sing pusate ing Praha lan kegiyatan liyane.

The Melayu Sajagad Travel Agency, the Melayu Lunga network of sightseeing agencies in four continents. From Barcelona's Running Tours in Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running in Copenhagen, the activity was followed by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and other activities.

src: "Safari bisa uga minangka daya tarik wisata sing paling gedhe ing Afrika lan dadi pucak kanggo para pangunjung. Tembung safari ing panganggonan sing populer iku ngerujuk lelungan lewat dharatan kanggo nyawang urip liar Afrika sing nggumunake, utamane ing sabana. Ana kewan, kayata gajah lan jerapah, kala-kala nyedhaki montor lan piranti-piranti standar sing bisa menehi sesawangan sing endah. Singa, cheetah lan macan tutul kadang isin lan sampeyan bakal ndeleng luwih apik nganggo tropong. Safari kanthi mlaku (uga disebut ""walk bush"", ""hikari safari"", utawa ""footing"") kalebu hiking, bisa pirang-pirang jam utawa sawetara dina."
mt: "Safari can also be the biggest tourist attraction in Africa and the pinnacle of visitors. The word safari in popular use refers to a journey through land to view wildlife. There are animals, such as elephants and giraffes, that often approach vehicles and standard equipment that can provide an enchanting view. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes seen and you will see better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called "walk bush", "hiking safari", or "footing") includes hiking, which can be several hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Wisata luwih murah kanggo grup sing luwih gedhe, yen sampeyan mung ijen utawa karo kanca siji, coba golek wong liya lan gawe klompok papat nganti enem wong kanggo tarip sing luwih apik saben wong. Nanging, iki ora kudu dadi perhatianmu temenan, amarga para plancong asring dirubung kanggo ngisi mobil. Iki kayane luwih kaya cara kanggo ngapusi wong-wong kanggo percaya menawa dheweke kudu mbayar luwih.
mt: Travel is cheaper for larger groups, if you're going alone or with a friend, try to find someone else and make a group of four to six people for a better price per person. However, this should not be your main concern, as backpackers often flock to fill up cars. This is more like a way to trick people into thinking they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Nalika ekonomi San Fransisko dihubungke marang iki dadi daya tarik pariwisata kelas donya, ekonomine maneka-warna. Bidhang kerja paling gedhe yaiku layanan ahli, pamrentah, keuangan, dedagangan, lan pariwisata. Gegambaran asring kawujud musik, film, sastra lan adat kang misuwur mbantu ndadekake kutha lan landmark kasebut dikenal ing saindenging jagad. San Fransisko wis kasil ngembangke sarana turis sing gedhe kanthi akeh banget hotel, restoran, lan fasilitas kanggo rapat sing apik banget. San Francisco uga minangka salah sawijining papan sing paling apik ing negara kasebut kanggo masakan Asia liyane: Korea, Thai, India lan Jepang.
mt: While the San Francisco economy is tied to this being a world-class tourist destination, its economy is diverse. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. The city's famous music, film, literature, and customs often appear in popular culture, helping make the city and its landmarks known around the world. San Francisco has successfully developed large amounts of tourist infrastructure with many hotels, restaurants, and meeting facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country for Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Pesen sakdurunge marakake wong kang lelungan ayem pikirane amarga dheweke bakal duwe panggonan kanggo turu sakwise tekan ung jujugane. Agen-agen lelungan kerep duwe kesepakatan karo hotel-hotel tertentu, sanajan sampeyan bisa uga mesen penginapan jenis liyane, kaya papan kemah, liwat agen lelungan. Agen travel biasane nawakake pak-pakan sing kalebu sarapan, pangaturan transportasi menyang/saka bendara utawa malah gabungan pak-pakan tiket montor mabur lan hotel. Dheweke uga bisa nahan pesenan kanggo sampeyan yen sampeyan butuh wektu kanggo mikirake panawaran utawa golek berkas liyane kanggo tujuan sampeyan (conto visa). Tambahan utawa panjalukan apa wae kudu ngliwati agen lelungane dhisik lan ora langsung karo hotel.
mt: Previously, travelers often thought they would have a place to stay once they reached their destination. However, many travel agents have agreements with specific hotels, although you can also book other types of accommodation, such as camping, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport or even a combination of airfare and hotel tickets. They can also hold reservations for you if you need time to consider offers or search for other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any additional or requested items must go through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Aplikasi penerjemah teks wektu nyata – aplikasi sing bisa otomatis nerjemahake kabeh perangan teks saka siji bahasa dadi basa liyane. Sawetara aplikasi ing kategori iki uga malah bisa nerjemahne tulisan ing basa asing ing tandha utawa barang liya ing kasunyatan nalika panganggone ngarahne smartphone tumrap barang-barang kasebut. Mesin terjemahan kuwi wis dadi saya apik, lan saiki asring menehi kurang luwih asil terjemahan sing luwih pener (lan luwih arang omong kosong), nanging tetp kudu digatekake, amarga isih ana sing kleru. Salah sawijine aplikasi sing paling katon ana pilihan iki yaiku Google Terjemahan, sing bisa mbantu ngartekke ukara tanpa perlu kaubung internet sabubare ngundhuh data basa sing dipengini.
mt: Real-time text translator – an application that can automatically translate all text from one language to another. Some applications in this category can also translate text in foreign languages on the spot when the smartphone is pointed at the objects in question. Translation machines are now quite good, and often give about the same result as a human translator (and less likely to be gibberish), but still need to be checked, because there are still some errors. One of the applications that is most visible in this choice is Google Translate, which can help translate sentences without having to connect to the Internet as long as the language you want is downloaded.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Lemah longsor iku dudu barang sing ora lumrah; dronjongan mung bisa nahen alon-alon sautara, lan isi sing luber bakal mudhun dadi longsor. Perkarane yaiku menawa salju iku lengket, dadi iki butuh pemicu kanggo medhun, lan sawetara salju medhun bisa dadi kedadean pemicu kanggo sisane. Kadhangkala pristiwa sing miwiti yaiku srengenge sing ngangeti salju, kadhang salju mudhun luwih akeh, kadhang kedadeyan pristiwa alam liyane, asringe manungsa.
mt: Landslides are not uncommon; groups can only move slowly downhill, and the contents of the slide will follow. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs a trigger to start sliding, and sometimes the triggering event is another natural phenomenon, such as a snow avalanche. Sometimes the triggering event is human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Kare iku masakan sing didhasari jamu lan rempah, bebarengan karo daging utawa sayur. Kari bisa dadi ""garing"" utawa ""teles"" gumantung karo gunggunge banyu. Ing wilayah jero saka India lor lan Pakistan, yogurt biasa digunakake ing kari; ing India kidul lan sawetara daerah pesisir liya saka anak benua kasebut, santen biasa digunakake."
mt: "Kare is a dish based on spices and herbs, with meat or vegetables. Kari can be ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of water. In the interior of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used in kari; in southern India and some coastal areas of the subcontinent, coconut milk is often used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Jalur Kutub Kidul (utawa dalan Tol) kuwi dalan sing dawane 1600km saka Stasiun McMurdo saka Laut Ross menyang Kutub. Iki salju sing dipadhetke kanthi tembelan lan ditandhani dening gendera. Mung bisa diliwati dening traktor khusus, kreta mluncur karo bensin lan sangu. Iku ora pati cepet dadi tipake kudu dijupuk sadawane penggokan sakiwa tengene Pegunungan Transacctic kanggo menyang ing dataran tinggi.
mt: The South Pole (or Road) Trail is a 1600km road from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It is snow-packed and marked by flags. It can only be traversed by special tractors, snowmobiles with gasoline engines and sleds. It is not very fast, and must be taken around the Transantarctic Mountains to the high plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Mlebu Afrika Kidul numpak mobil minangka cara sing sangar kanggo ndeleng kabeh kaendahan derah uga kanggo nekani papan-papan ing njaba jalur misata sing biyasa. Iki bisa dilakoni ing mobil biasa kanthi perencanaan sing ngati-ati nanging 4x4 iku disaranake banget lan akeh panggonan sing amung bisa diliwati nganggo basis roda dhuwur 4x4. Prelu dieling nalika nganggit bilih sanajan Afrika Kidul ajeg, ora kabeh negara minangka tanggan. Sarat lan beya visa beda-beda saka siji negara menyang negara liya lan dipangaruhi negara sing sampeyan tekani Negara-negara uga nduweni aturan ukum sing khas sing mbutuhake piranti penting apa wae sing kudu ana ning njero montor.
mt: Entering South Africa by car is a great way to see all the beauty of the country and also to visit places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly recommended and many places can only be accessed with a high clearance 4x4. Precautions should be taken when writing that although South Africa is dangerous, not all countries are. Visas and visa fees vary from one country to another and are influenced by the country you are visiting. Countries also have their own laws which require certain important items to be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

Iki bisa dilakoni ing mobil biasa kanthi perencanaan sing ngati-ati nanging 4x4 iku disaranake banget lan akeh panggonan sing amung bisa diliwati nganggo basis roda dhuwur 4x4. Prelu dieling nalika nganggit bilih sanajan Afrika Kidul ajeg, ora kabeh negara minangka tanggan. Sarat lan beya visa beda-beda saka siji negara menyang negara liya lan dipangaruhi negara sing sampeyan tekani Negara-negara uga nduweni aturan ukum sing khas sing mbutuhake piranti penting apa wae sing kudu ana ning njero montor.
mt: Entering South Africa by car is a great way to see all the beauty of the country and also to visit places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly recommended and many places can only be accessed with a high clearance 4x4. Precautions should be taken when writing that although South Africa is dangerous, not all countries are. Visas and visa fees vary from one country to another and are influenced by the country you are visiting. Countries also have their own laws which require certain important items to be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Nggawa kanggo liyane - Aja nganti lali karo tasmu, kususe nalika sampeyan nyebrang watesan internasional. Sampeyan bisa nemokake awake sampeyan dhewe digunakake minangka penyebar racun tanpa sampeyan mangerteni, sing bakal gawe sampeyan ngalami masalah. Iki kalebu antri, kaya segawon tukang ngambu-narkoba bisa digunakake kapan wae tanpa nggatekake. Sawetara negara duwe ukuman sing cukat banget sanajan kanggo kaluputan sing pisanan; iki bisa kalebu ukara kunjara luwih saka 10 taun utawa mati. Tas sing ora dijaga menawa pangincengan maling lan uga bisa narik perhatosan para petugas sing waspaos marang anceman bom.
mt: For others - Don't forget your passport, especially when crossing international borders. You can find yourself in trouble without knowing it, which could include long lines, like drug dealers can use at any time without telling. Some countries have very harsh penalties for first-time offenses; this could include sentences of more than 10 years or death. Unsecured luggage when checked baggage can also attract the attention of officials concerned about the threat of bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Isi omahe sampeyan kanthi kopi kenthel ing wayah esuk lan sawetara teh chamomile sing marai santai ing wayah bengi. Nalika sampeyan ana ing staycation, sampeyan duwe wektu kanggo ngrawat sampeyan dhewe lan njupuk sawetara menit tambahan kanggo masak sesuatu khusus. Menawa sampeyan rumangsa luwih kendel, jupuk kesempatan kanggo gawe sari wuh-wuhan utawa nyampur sawetara smoothie. bisa wae sampeyan nemokake ombenan sing sederhana sing bisa sampeyan gawe kanggo sarapan nalika wis bali kaya adate. Yen sampeyan manggon ing kutha sing duwe budaya ngombe macem-macem, pindhah menyang bar utawa omah kusus omben ing dhaerah sakubengmu ora kerep kok tekani.
mt: Fill your mug with hot coffee in the morning and some calming chamomile tea in the evening. When you're on a staycation, you have time to take care of yourself and take a few extra minutes to make something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to make a fruit smoothie or mix up a smoothie. You can find simple drinks you can make for breakfast when you're back to your routine. If you live in a city with a diverse coffee culture, move to a bar or coffee house in your area that you don't often frequent.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Desa Haldarsvík nawakake sesawangan pulau Eysturoy ing cerake lan duwe siji gereja segi wolu sing ora biasa. Ing latar greja, ana patung neker sing apik saka manuk dara sak dhuwure sarean. Iki senilai setengah jam mlaku-mlaku ing sakiwa tengen desa sing narik minat.
mt: Haldarsvík village overlooks the island of Eysturoy in the distance and has an octagonal church that is unusual. In the background of the church, there is a beautiful sculpture of a dove on a pole. This is about half an hour's walk from the village that attracts attention.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Sanadyan sampeyan ora mbutuhake visa nalika dolan menyang negara tartamtu dadi turis utawa kanggo nyambut gawe, mara menyang nagara kasebut dadi siswa internasional biyasane bakal mbutuhake wektu sing suwe tinimbang nalika dolan mrana mung dadi turis. Umume, manggon ing negara luar negri ngendi wae kanggo wektu sing suwe bakal meksa sampeyan kanggo entuk visa luwih dhisik. Visa pelajar umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur aplikasi sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis. Kanggo sebagean gedhe negara, sampeyan bakal mbutuhake layang tawaran saka institusi ing ngendi sampeyan pengin sinau, lan uga bukti dana kanggo ngopeni sampeyan paling ora taun sepisan kuliah sampeyan. Priksa karo pakulitan, uga bagean imigrasi kanggo negara sing pengin sampeyan tuju kanggo sinau kanggo ngerti wewaon sing kumplit.
mt: While you may not need a visa to visit a particular country as a tourist or for work, going there as an international student will usually take much longer than just visiting. Usually, staying in a foreign country for a long time will require you to obtain a more specific visa. Student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures than tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need a letter of acceptance from the institution where you want to study, and also proof of funds to cover at least one year of your tuition. Check with the embassy, as well as the immigration office for the country you want to study in to get the full details.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Apa maneh ing mangsa panas, sampeyan kudu ngati-ati tumrap nyamuk menawa sampeyan pengin munggah gunung ngliwati alas tropis. Sanajan sampeyan nyetir liwat alas udan subtropis, sawetara detik kanthi lawang mbukak nalika sampeyan mlebu tetunggangan wis cukup wektu kanggo nyamuk-nyamuk mlebu tetungganganmu.
mt: Even in the heat of summer, you should be careful of mosquitoes if you want to climb a mountain through a tropical forest. Even though you drive through a subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the window open when you enter the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to enter your vehicle.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarban kuwi sabuk alas bakau pesisir paling gedhe ning donya, nyebar 80 km (50 mil) menyang Bangladesh lan pedalaman India saka pesisir. Sundarbans wis diumumne minangka Situs Warisan Donya UNESCO. Bagean saka alas sajerone wilayah India diarani Taman Nasional Sundarbans. Nanging alase ora mung rawa bakau — iku uga kalebu sawetara sisa-sisa pungkasan saka alas-alas magrong sing tau nutupi dataran Gangga. Sundarbans iki nutupi daerah sing ambane 3.850 km², sing setelone katutup dening banyu/rawa. Wiwit taun 1966 Sundarban wis dadi cagar alam, lan diduga ana kira-kira 400 macan Kerajaan Bengal lan kira-kira 30.000 kidang sing katon ana ning daerah kuwi.
mt: The Sundarbans is a mangrove forest in the delta of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna rivers on the Bay of Bengal. It forms the largest single block of tidal halophytic mangrove forest in the world and contiguous with the Bangladeshi part of the forest is the Sundarbans Reserve Forest, a wildlife sanctuary. The name Sundarban can be literally translated as beautiful forest, and it is said to have come from the Sundari trees which are found abundantly in the area. The Sundarbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and is considered to be the largest littoral mangrove forest in the world. The forest is unique in having salt water mangrove swamps and is the largest mangrove forest in the world. The Sundarbans covers an area of 10,000 square kilometres (3,900 sq mi), of which half is in India and half in Bangladesh. The forest is a unique ecosystem, where salt water and fresh water ecosystems meet. The Sundarbans is a natural barrier against the storms and tides of the Bay of Bengal. ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Donya iki duwe luwih saka 5.000 basa sing beda, kalebu luwih saka rong puluh kanthi 50 yuta utawa luwih wong sing bisa ngomong. Tembung-tembung sing ditulis kerep luwih gampang dipahami tinimbang tembung-tembung sing dipocapake, uga. Iki utamane bener kanggo alamat, sing kerep angel dieja kanthi gampang dimangerteni. Akeh negara-negara sing lancar banget nggunakke basa Inggris, lan uga sampeyan bisa ngarepake ilmu sing ana watese - utamane kanggo nom-noman. Bayangno, yen sampeyan gelem, wong Mancunia, Boston, Jamaika lan Sydney lungguh ana ing saubengane meja mangan bareng nalika wengi ana ing restoran ning Toronto. Wong-wong kuwi nglipur wong liyane kanthi nyritakake crita saka desane, dicritakake kanthi logat sing beda lan penemu lokal.
mt: This world has more than 5,000 languages, including more than 30 with 50 million or more speakers. Words that are written often are easier to understand than words that are spoken, too. This is especially true for addresses, which are often pronounced with easy-to-understand sounds. Many countries use English fluently, and you can expect to learn some - especially for menus. Imagine, if you will, that the people of Manchester, Boston, Jamaica and Sydney are sitting around a table at night in a restaurant in Toronto. They are talking to each other in their own accents and local dialects.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Bis kuwi mangkat saka stasiun bis antar-kabupaten (sebrange kali) sedina utuh, sanadyan meh kabeh, kususe sing arep mlaku menyang wetan lan Jakar/Bumthang mangkat antarane jam 06.30 lan 07.30. Amarga bis saka kabupaten menyang kabupaten liyane asring kebak, bisa tak kandani yen luwih becik pesen tiket pirang-pirang dina sadurunge mangkat. Akeh kabupaten sing dilayani dening Bis Kapal Pantai Jepang, sing kokoh lan nyenengke. Numpak taksi bebarengan iku cara sing cepet lan penak kanggo lelugan menyang panggonan sing cedhak, kayata Paro (Nu 150) lan Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: The bus left the inter-district bus station (across the river) on time, although most, including those going east and Jakar/Bumthang left between 6.30 and 7.30. As the bus from one district to another often catches fire, it is advisable to book tickets several days in advance. Many districts are served by the Japanese Coastal Ferry, which is sturdy and comfortable. Taking a taxi is faster and cheaper for short distances, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

Akeh kabupaten sing dilayani dening Bis Kapal Pantai Jepang, sing kokoh lan nyenengke. Numpak taksi bebarengan iku cara sing cepet lan penak kanggo lelugan menyang panggonan sing cedhak, kayata Paro (Nu 150) lan Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: The bus left the inter-district bus station (across the river) on time, although most, including those going east and Jakar/Bumthang left between 6.30 and 7.30. As the bus from one district to another often catches fire, it is advisable to book tickets several days in advance. Many districts are served by the Japanese Coastal Ferry, which is sturdy and comfortable. Taking a taxi is faster and cheaper for short distances, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Gabung karo kahanan ora kalebu sesambungan, ""Timbuktu"" wis digunakake minangka sanepa kanggo tlatah sing endah lan adoh. Saiki, Timbuktu kuwi kutha sing mlarat, sanadyan misuwur dadi tujuan plesir turis, lan uga nduweni bandhara. Taun 1990, dhaptar situs warisan donya sing kudu dijaga mundhak, amarga anane anceman ska pasir sing ana ning padhang pasir. Iki salah sawijine wektu nalika dheweke mandheg nalika Henry Louis Gates' PBS kusus Keajaiban Donya Afrika. Kutha iki beda banget karo kutha liyane ing negara kasebut, amarga duwe bangkat Arab luwih akeh tinimbang wong Afrika."
mt: "Joining the list of places not connected, "Timbuktu" was used as a euphemism for remote and distant. Now, Timbuktu is a city in decline, though still a tourist destination, and also has an airport. In 1990, the list of world heritage sites that needed to be protected increased, because of the threat of sandstorms in the vast desert. This was one of the times when they stopped when Henry Louis Gates' PBS special The Wonders of Africa. This city is very different from other cities in the country, because it has more Arab buildings than African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralimpiade bakal diwiwiti saka tanggal 24 Agustus tekan 5 September 2021. Ana kagiyatan liyane sing bakal dilaksanakake ning panggonan liyane ana ning Jepang. Tokyo bakal dadi siji-sijiné kutha ing Asia sing dadi rong Olimpiade musim panas, sawise dadi tuwan omah pertandhingan ing taun 1964. Menawa sampeyan mesen penerbangan lan penginapan sampeyan kanggo 2020 sadurunge penangguhan diumumake, sampeyan mungkin duwe sawijining situasi rumit. Kabijakan kanggo mbatalake kuwi akeh jinise, nanging nganti pungkasan Maret akeh banget kabijakan kanggo mbatalke gara-gara-virus korona sing ora diteruske tekan sasi Juli 2020, nalika jadwal Olimpiade wis ditemtokake. Diduga menawa ameh kabeh tiket acara bakal diregani antarane ¥2.500 lan ¥130.000, kanthi tiket biasa diregani ¥7.000.
mt: The Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Other events will be held at other locations in Japan. Tokyo will be the first city in Asia to host two Summer Olympics, after hosting the 1964 Summer Olympics. If you booked travel and accommodations for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may be in a difficult situation. There are many cancellation policies, but until March many policies were not extended due to the coronavirus pandemic, which was not extended until July 2020, when the Olympic schedule was set. It is estimated that all event tickets will be refunded between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with regular tickets refunded ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Topan minangka puteran kokem sing duwe tekanan hawa cendhek banget, sing nyedhot hawa ing saubenging mlebu lan munggah. Dheweke ngasilake angin sing kuwat (asring 100-200 mil/jam) lan bisa ngangkat barang-barang abot menyang udhara, nggawa dheweke nalika angin topan obah. Wiwitane bakal maujud kayata corong saka mendhung sing peteng, banjur dadi “lesus” nalika tekan ngisor.
mt: A hurricane is a tropical cyclone with sustained winds of 74 mph (64 knots) or greater. Hurricanes are characterized by low pressure at the center, high winds, heavy rains, and large waves. Hurricanes are often preceded by a period of calm, known as the "eye of the storm." The eye is usually circular and is surrounded by a ring of clouds and high winds, known as the "eye wall." The eye wall is the most dangerous part of a hurricane, as it is where the strongest winds and heaviest rains occur. Hurricanes can cause extensive damage to property and infrastructure, and can be deadly to humans and animals.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Menawa negara sing bakal sampeyan kunjungi manut marang pituduh lelungan, asuransi kasarasan lelungan sampeyan utawa asuransi pembatalan lelungan sampeyan isa uga kepengaruh. Sampeyan bisa uga njaluk rembugan saran saka pamrentah tinimbang saka sampeyan dhewe, nanging sarane pamrentah digawe kanggo kawulane dhewe. Minangka siji tuladha, wong Amerika ing Timur Tengah isa uga ngadhepi kahanan sing beda saka wong Eropa lan wong Arab. Laporan iku amung ringkesan cekak saka kahanan politik ing sawijining negara. Tampilan sing asring dituduhke kuwi asring ora cetho, umum lan sedherhana banget yen dibandhingke karo informasi sing luwih rinci sing bisa ditemokake ana ing panggonan liyane.
mt: If the country you are visiting has a travel warning, your travel insurance or cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also ask for advice from the government rather than yourself, but such advice is made for its own purposes. For example, Americans in the Middle East may face different conditions than Europeans and Arabs. This report is only a brief summary of the political situation in a country. The frequent displays are often not accurate, general and very simple when compared to more detailed information that can be found elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Agen wisata wis ana wiwit abad 19. Agen wisata iku biasane pilihan sing apik kanggo lelungan sing ngluwihi pengalaman pelancong sadurunge kanthi alam, budhaya, basa utawa negara-negara sing pendapatane sithik. Sanadyan sebagean gedhe agensi gelem njupuk sebagean gedhe pemesanan biasa, akeh agen sing ngususake ing lelungan jinis tartamtu, gedhene anggaran utawa jujugan. Iki bisa dadi luwih apik kanggo nggunakake sawijining agen sing kerep mesen perjalanan padha karo sampeyan. Coba delengen wisata apa sing dipromosikke dening agen iki, ana ning situs web utawa ana cendhela kaca toko.
mt: Tourism has been around since the 19th century. Tour agencies are usually a good choice for trips that exceed the average traveler's experience with nature, culture, language, or countries with low incomes. While many agencies will take a large number of bookings, many specialize in a certain type of travel, budget, or destination. This can be better for using an agency that often books trips similar to yours. Try to see what type of travel is promoted by this agency, on their website or in their storefront.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Akeh banget sing kudu dipikirke sadurunge lan nalika sampeyan kepingin plesir. Nalika sampeyan lelungan, kudu siap menawa apa-apa ora padha nalikane “ana omah”. Tata krama, ukum, panganan, lalu lintas, penginepan, standar, basa, lan liyane bakal rada beda karo papan asal sampeyan. Iki minangka perkara sing kudu sampeyan eling, supaya ora kuciwa utawa uga ora seneng karo cara lokal kanggo nindakake prekara.
mt: Many things need to be considered before and while you travel. When you travel, you should be prepared for anything to be different from "home". Customs, laws, food, traffic, manners, standards, language, and others will be a little different from your home. This is something you should be aware of, so you don't get hurt or even enjoy the local way of doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Menawa lelungan menyang negara berkembang kanggo sing sepisan - utawa ing sisih anyar saka donya - aja ngremehake kemungkinan kaget babagan budhaya. Akeh wisatawan sing mampu lan stabil wis diatasi dening pangrembakaning donya perjalanan kang anyar, ing ngendi akeh penyesuaian kabudayan cilik bisa tambah kanthi cepet. Kususe ning dina-dina wiwitanmu, aja lali mikirne kemungkinan kanggo belanja kanggo gaya-Kulonanmu lan -hotel sing larang, panganan, lan layanan kanggo mbantu ngepaske awak. Aja turu ana matras utawa bantalan ning lemah ana daerah sing ora sampeyan mangerteni kewan-kewan lokale. Yen sampeyan bakal kemah, ojo lali nggawa kranjang kemah utawa amben gantung supaya adoh saka ula, kalajengking utawa kewan liyane.
mt: When traveling to developing countries for the first time - or to a new part of the world - don't underestimate the culture shock. Many travelers who are able and stable have been surprised by the new world of travel, where many small cultural adjustments can be made quickly. In the early days of your trip, don't forget to think about shopping for your Western-style clothes and -hotel that prohibits, food, and services to help you fit in. Don't sleep on a mat or pillow on the ground in areas you don't know the local animals. If you're camping, don't forget to bring a camping chair or hammock to keep away from snakes, scorpions or other animals.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
