src: Gawe lan gawa pertalan polis lan princian kontak pakaryan asuransimu. Dheweke padha butuh kanggo nuduhake alamat e-mail penjamin asuransi lan nomer telpon internasional kanggo pitutur/otorisasi lan gawe tuntutan. Duweni salinan liya ing gawan sampeyan lan online (kirim e-mail menyang sampeyan dhewe nganggo lampiran, utawa disimpen ing “cloud”). Menawa lelungan karo nggawa laptop utawa tablet, simpenen salinan ing memori utawa piringane (bisa diakses tanpa internet). Uga wenehi pertalan kawicaksanan/kontak karo kanca lan sedulur sing lelungan utawa kanca ing omah sing gelem mbantu.
mt: 1. Make and keep copies of your police report and contact information for your insurance company. They will need to show proof of email and international phone number for the insured and authorization and make a claim. Have a copy in your wallet and online (send an email to yourself with attachments, or stored in “the cloud”). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy in memory or disk (can be accessed without internet). Also give contact information to friends and family who are traveling or friends at home who are willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Ana akeh format film sing beda-beda sing digunakake pirang-pirang taun suwene. FIlm 35 mm sing standar (36 ping 24 mm negatif) iku sing paling umum. Biasane bisa diisi maneh kanthi gampang menawa sampeyan kentekan, lan menehi resolusi kang kira-kira bisa disandhingne karo DSLR saiki. Sawetara kamera film format-sedheng nggunakake format 6 ping 6 cm, luwih trep maneh negatip 56 ping 56 mm. Resolusine ameh ping papat saka 35 mm negatif (3136 mm2 nglawan 864).
mt: 35 mm film is the most common format (36 mm by 24 mm negative) used for many years. It is usually easy to reload, and gives a resolution that is roughly comparable to DSLR cameras today. Some cameras use the 6 cm by 6 cm format, which is a smaller negative than the 56 mm by 56 mm. The resolution is four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Cara paling gampang kanggo miwiti bisnis nulis lelungan yaiku kanthi ngasah ketrampilan sampeyan ing situs web lelungan sing wis mapan. Sabubare sampeyan rumangsa kepenak karo format lan edit ana ning web, sabubare, sampeyan bakal gawe situs web mu dhewe.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel writing business is to hone your skills on established travel sites. Once you're comfortable with the format and editing on the web, you can start your own site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Ning omah, amarga paparan kuman lokal sing terus-terusan iki, ana kasempatan yen sampeyan kebal marang barang iki. Nanging ing bagean liya ing donya, ing ngendi bangsa kewan bakteri anyar kanggo sampeyan, sampeyan bisa uga bakal kena masalah. Uga, ing mangsa sing luwih anget, bakteri tuwuh luwih cepet lan tahan luwih suwe ing njaba awak. Mangkono iku momok Weteng Delhi, Sepatane Firaun, Piwalesan Dhendham Montezuma, lan akeh kancane dheweke padha. Kaya masalah ambegan ing iklim adhem, masalah usus ing iklim panas iku cukup biasa lan ing sebagean gedhe kasus iku nganyelake banget nanging ora pati mbebayani.
mt: At home, because of this constant exposure to local germs, you may be immune to this. But in other parts of the world, where these new animals are for you, you may also have problems. Also, in warmer weather, bacteria grow faster and last longer outside the body. This is the problem of the Delhi Belly, the Septic Tank of the Pharaohs, the Palace of Montezuma, and many of his contemporaries. Like the problem of diarrhea in cold climates, the problem of diarrhea in hot climates is quite common and in most cases is very annoying but not deadly.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Eropa iku benua sing relatif cilik nanging kanthi akeh negara mardika. Sajroning kahanan normal, lelungan ngliwati akeh negara bakal ateges kudu lunga liwat aplikasi visa lan kontrol paspor bola-bali. Daerah Schengen, nanging, mlaku kayata negara ana bab iki. Yen sampeyan tetep manggon ana wilayah iki, sampeyan bisa nyebrang watesan tanpa perlu ngliwati pos priksa paspor maneh. Kajaba iku, kanthi duwe visa Schengen, sampeyan ora kudu njaluk visa menyang saben negara anggota Schengen, saéngga ngirit wektu, dhuwit, lan dokumen.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travel through many countries will mean going through visa applications and passport checks repeatedly. The Schengen area, however, works like a country with this. If you stay within this area, you can cross borders without having to go through passport checks again. In addition, with a Schengen visa, you do not need to ask for a visa to each Schengen member country, so it saves time, money, and documents.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Makam Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 menawa kuburan paling misuwur ing Lembah, panggon panemuan Howard Carter ing taun 1922 babagan penguburan raja enom sing meh wutuh. Nanging dibandhingake karo makam-makam ningrat liyane, makam Tutankhamun ora patut ditekani, amarga luwih cilik lan rerenggan sing ora sepirane. Sapa wae sing kepingin ndeleng bukti-bukti saka mumi sing rusak nalika nyoba mindhahke pethi kuwi bakal kuciwa amarga mung sirah lan pundhak sing katon. Kasugihan kuburan sing luwar biyasa kasebut ora ana maneh, nanging wis dipindhah menyang Musium Mesir ing Kairo. Wong mara kanthi wektu sing kewatesan luwih becik ngentekake wektune ing panggonan liyane.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is the most famous of the tombs, the discovery by Howard Carter in 1922 of the burial site of a young king almost intact. However, compared to other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is not to be expected, because it is smaller and less elaborate. Anyone who wants to see evidence of the mummy damaged when trying to move the box will be disappointed because only the head and feet are visible. The usual outer burial chamber is not present, but has been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. People with limited time will be better off visiting other sites.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Pulo Bowen iku wisata sedina utawa akhir minggu sing didhemeni nawarake kayak, munggah gunung, toko-toko, restoran, lan liyane. Pakumpulan asli iki dumunung ing Howe Sound adoh saka Vancouver, lan gampang dagayuh liwat becak banyu sing wis dijadwal sing budhal saka Pulo Granville ing pusat kutha Vancouver. Kanggo sing seneng kamempengan ing njaba omah, mlaku turut ing pinggiring gang Laut menyang Langit penting banget. Whistler (1,5 jam nyupir saka Vancouver) larang nanging misuwur ing Olimpiade Mangsa Panas 2010. Ing mangsa adhem, seneng-senenga liwat sawetara panggonan ski paling apik ing Amerika Lor, lan ing mangsa panas nyobaa pit-pitan liwat gunung sing asli.
mt: Bowen Island is a weekend or day trip destination that can include, hiking, climbing, shops, restaurants, and more. The original community is located in Howe Sound, away from Vancouver, and is easily reached by water taxi from Granville Island in the heart of Vancouver. For those who enjoy walking in the great outdoors, the Sea to Sky Highway is a must. Whistler (1.5 hours drive from Vancouver) is a popular destination for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer, try some of the original mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls iku kuta ing bagean kulon Zimbabwe, ngliwati wates saka Livingstone, Zambia, lan cedhak Botswana. Kutha kasebut langsung ana ing jejere grojogan, lan iku dadi daya tarik utama, nanging tujuan turis sing populer iki nawakake petualang lan pelancong loro-lorone kesempatan sing akeh kanggo nginep luwih suwe. Ing mangsa udan (November tekan Maret), akehe banyu bakal luwih gedhe lan grojogane bakal luwih dramatis. Sampeyan mesthi teles menawa sampeyan nyebrang jembatan utawa mlaku sadawane dalan cilik menggok cerak Grojogan. Ing sisih liya, kapinujon amarga isi banyu dhuwur banget mula yen sampeyan ndeleng Banyu terjun sing nyata bakal katon digedhahake—dening kabeh banyu!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, straddling the border with Livingstone, Zambia, and close to Botswana. The town is directly adjacent to the falls, and is the country's top tourist attraction, but the popular tourist destination also offers adventure and wildlife to the more adventurous. In the rainy season (November through March), the water will be higher and the falls more dramatic. You will definitely get wet if you cross the bridge or walk the entire length of the small road along the falls. On the other side, the high water level means that the actual waterfall will be hidden by all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Paugeran babagan pemotretan biasa uga berlaku kanggo rekaman video, bahkan mungkin luwih. Yen mung moto wae ora diidini, sampeyan kudune ora malah kepikiran ngrekam videone iku. Menawa nggunakake sawijining pesawat tanpa awak, priksa kanthi apik kayata apa sing sampeyan oleh filmke lan ijin utawa surat ijin tambahan apa sing dibutuhake. Ngaburne drone cedhak bandara utawa kerumunan iku tansah dadi gagasan sing ala, sanadyan iku ora ilegal ing wilayah sampeyan.
mt: The usual rules for still photography also apply to video recordings, perhaps even more so. If you're not authorized to fly a drone, you probably won't think of filming it. Flying a drone near an airport or crowd is always a bad idea, even if it's legal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Pancathetan minangka wewaton tambahan kanggo nyawisake visa. Ing sawetara negara, sampeyan kudu nyathet karawuhan lan tetenger karo panguwasa ing kana. Iki bisa uga mbutuhake ngisi formulir karo polisi lokal utawa nekani kantor imigrasi. Ing pirang-pirang negara sing duwe angger-angger kasebut, hotel-hotel lokal bakal nangani pancathetan (mesthekake sampeyan takon). Ing kasus liya, mung wong sing nginep sak njabane akomodasi turis sing kudu ndaftar. Nanging, iki ndadekake aturane luwih ketutup, mula sampeyan temokake sakdurunge.
mt: A supplement to the visa application. In some countries, you must register with local authorities and may be required to fill out a form with the police or local immigration office. In some countries with such requirements, local hotels will handle the registration (ask them). In other cases, only visitors staying in tourist accommodations need to register. However, this makes the process more complicated, so you should find out beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Dadi relawan nalika plesir kuwi cara sing apik banget kanggo gawe pambeda nanging ora mung perkara menehi. Urip lan dadi sukarelawan ning negara asing kuwi dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngenal kabudayan liyane, ketemu wong anyar, ngenali awakmu dhewe, nduweni sudhut sesawangan lan uga nduweni kemampuan anyar. Iki uga bisa dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngrenggangake anggaran supaya netep luwih suwe ing sawijining panggon amarga akeh pakaryan sukarela nyedhiyakake kamar lan dhaharan lan sawetara ngupahi sithik.
mt: Being a volunteer while on vacation is a great way to give back, but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to learn about other cultures, meet new people, get to know yourself, gain new perspectives, and gain new skills. It's also a great way to stretch your budget so you can stay longer in a place because many volunteer projects provide free lodging and meals and some even pay you a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Plesiran menyang Donya Walt Disney kuwi dadi jiarah utama kanggo akeh kaluwarga ana ning Amerika. Kunjungan ""khas"" iki kalebu mabur menyang Bendara Internasional Orlando, njupuk bis menyang lusmen Disney ing dhaerah kasebut, ngentekake sajrone seminggu tanpa ninggalake piranti babagan Disney, banjur mulih. Ana akeh macem pilihan sing ora terbatas, nanging iki isih bisa diarani nalika uwong umume ngomong babagan ""arep menyang ing Disney World"". Akeh tiket sing payu kanthi cara onlen liwat situs web lelang kayata eBay utawa Craigslist separo dienggo tiket taman-hopper pirang-pirang dina. Sanajan iki minangka kamempengan sing umum, dilarang dening Disney: tiket ora bisa ditransfer."
mt: "Visiting Walt Disney World is a major draw for many families in America. The ""typical"" trip includes flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to the Disney area, spending a week without leaving the Disney property, and then returning home. There are many options available, but this is still often referred to as ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets are sold through online auctions such as eBay or Craigslist, and are often used by park-hoppers for multiple days. Although this is a common practice, it is forbidden by Disney: tickets cannot be transferred."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Sapa wae kang duwe rencana nekani negara kang bisa dianggep zona perang kudu golek pelatihan profesional. Panaliten Internet kanggo ‘Kursus lingkungan memungsuhan’ isa uga bakal nyawisake alamat perusahaan lokal. Kursus iku biyasane bakal ngrembug perkara sing dirembug ning kene kanthi luwih rinci, umume kanthi pengalaman praktik. Siji kursus umume bakal seka 2-5 dina lan bakal nglibatake dolanan peran, akeh pitulungan sepisan lan kadhang kala latian senjata. Buku lan majalah sing mbahas babagan kelangsungan urip ing alam liar iku lumrah, nanging penerbitan sing mbahas zona perang iku sathithik.
mt: Anyone planning to visit a country that could be considered a war zone should seek professional training. Internet searches for ‘Survival training’ will also likely yield local company addresses. Courses usually cover the issues discussed here in more detail, often with practical experience. A course usually lasts 2-5 days and will involve role play, many one-on-one sessions and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the wild are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Ana cara-cara sing beda kanggo ngresiki banyu, sepira antarane luwih efektif kanggo nglawan anceman sing spesifik. Ing sawetara derah nggodhok banyu mung menit cukup, ing derah liyane mbutuhake sawetara menit. Saringan iku macem-macem ing asile, lan menawa sampeyan duweni kekuwatiran, mula sampeyan kudu mikir kanggo tuku banyu sampeyan ing botol sing disegel saka pabrik sing diweruhi.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas, water can be purified in minutes, in others it takes several minutes. The filters are available in various forms, and if you are concerned, you should buy your water in sealed bottles from a factory certified.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Arus kuwat saka laut sing mili bali menyang tengah nalika ombak pecah ning pinggiran pantai, asring pecah ning karang utawa watu liyane. Mergo topologi sangisore banyu, bali miline kepusat ing sawetara bagean-bagean sing luwih jero, lan arus sing cepet menyang banyu jero bisa kebentuk ing kana. Akeh wong mati gara-gara kekeselen nalika nyoba nglangi nglawan arus kuwi, lan ora mungkin. Sanalika sampeyan metu saka ilen-ilen, nglangi mbalik ora luwih angel tinimbang biasane. Cobanen ngarahake ing endi sampeyan ora ketangkep maneh utawa, gumantung marang keterampilan sampeyan lan sampeyan tau dingerteni apa ora, sampeyan bisa uga pengin nunggu kanggo pitulungan.
mt: A strong current from the sea flowing back to the center when the waves break on the shore, often break on the rocks or other stones. Due to the underwater topography, the water flows back to some deeper areas, and a fast current to the deep water can be formed there. Many people die because of drowning when trying to swim against the current, and it is not possible. When you come out of the ripples, swimming back is not as easy as usual. You can also wait for help.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Dalan banyu kampung bisa dadi gagasan sing apik kanggo liburan. Umpamane plesir menyang kraton-kraton ning Lembar Loire, Lembah Rhine utawa numpak kapal pesiar menyang kutha-kutha sing nyenengke ana Danube utawa numpak prau ning Terusan Erie. Dheweke kabeh uga namtokake dalan kanggo munggah sing misuwur lan dalan pit-pitan.
mt: A village road can be a great idea for a vacation. For example, touring the chateaux of the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or cruising the cities along the Danube or Erie Canal. They all also provide access to well-known hiking trails and back roads.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Ing sisih lor wilayah iku diwatesi kanthi Sahel, lan ing sisih kidul lan kulun dening Samudra Atlantik. Wong wadon: dianjurne kanggo marang wadon sing lelungan kanggo ngomong menawa dheweke uwis nikah, ora peduli apa status nikahe sing saktemene. Iki mbiyantu kanggo uga nganggo ali-ali (namung wae udu sing katon larang. Wanita kudu ngerteni manawa beda budaya bisa nyebabake reribed lan dheweke ora biyasa ditututi, dicekel ing lengene, lsp. Sing teges anggone nolak wong lanang, lan aja wedi njejer jejeg ing panggonmu (beda budaya utawa ora, ora bisa gawe becik!).
mt: In the north, the region is bounded by the Sahel, and to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women:  It is forbidden for women to travel to speak to women who are about to marry, regardless of the status of their own marriage. This helps to also use the ali-ali (but only if you see it forbidden. Women should know that different cultures can cause conflict and they are not usually followed, grabbed in the groin, etc. It is forbidden to reject men, and do not put your feet in your place (different cultures or not, it can not be good!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Margasatwa liar minangka salah sawijining modhel sing paling nantang kanggo fotografer, lan mbutuhake gabungan kabegjan, sabar, pangalaman lan piranti kang apik. Pemotretan margasatwa iku kerep dianggep remeh, nanging kaya pemotretan umume, foto iku aji ewunan tembung. Fotografi satwa liar asring mbutuhake lensa telepoto sing dawa, sanadyan kewan-kewan kayata klompok manuk utawa kewan sing cilik mbutuhake lensa liyane Akeh kewan-kewan eksotik iku angel ditemokake, lan taman-taman kadhang kala duwe aturan-aturan bab njupuk foto-foto kanggo kaperluan komersial. Kewan liar bisa wae isin utawa galak. Lingkungane bisa wae adhem, panas, utawa suwalike satru.
mt: Wild animals are one of the most challenging subjects for photographers, and require a combination of patience, persistence, good equipment, and a good eye. Wildlife photography is often considered trivial, but like photography in general, it is a matter of thousands of words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, although birds and small animals may require other lenses. Many exotic animals are found in zoos, and some parks have rules about taking commercial photographs. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. Their environment can be cold, hot, or somewhere in between.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Sapa wae sing arep nyopir ana panggonan sing dhuwur utawa daerah gunung kudu nggatekke anane salju, es, utawa hawa sing anyep. Ing dalan sing lunyu amarga es lan kebak salju, gesekane sethithik lan sampeyan ora isa nyetir kaya menawa sampeyan ing aspal kosong. Nalika lesus, salju sing teko ora suwe kuwi cukup kanggo gawe sampeyan kajebak. Pandelok sampeyan uga bisa diwatesi dening salju sing tiba utawa mabur utawa dening kondensasi utawa es ing cendhela kendaraan. Nanging, kahanan nalika ana es lan salju kuwi normal ana ing akeh negara, lan lalu lintas tetep mlaku lan ora keganggu kaya adate
mt: Anyone who plans to drive in high altitudes or mountainous areas should be aware of snow, ice, or wind. On icy roads because of snow and slush, friction is reduced and you can't drive as if you were on a bare asphalt road. When it is slippery, snow that has accumulated is not enough to get you stuck. You can also be limited by snow that has fallen or is flying or by condensation or ice on the windshield. However, conditions when there is snow and ice are normal in many countries, and traffic continues to flow and is not disrupted as usual
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Kajaba sampeyan diplomat, kerja ing luar negeri umume iku tegese sampeyan kudu ngajokake pajek penghasilan ing negara sampeyan kerja. Pajeg pangasilan disungsun kanthi beda ing masing-masing negara, lan rega pajeg lan kurung pajeg akeh maceme saka negara siji marang liyane. Ing sawetara negara federal, kayata Amerika Serikat lan Kanada, pajek penghasilan iku ditarik ing tingkat pamarentah pusat lan ing tingkat daerah, satemah tarip lan golongan bisa beda saka daerah siji lan daerah liyane.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad usually means you have to pay income tax in the country you work in. Income tax is set up differently in each country, and the tax rate and bracket vary from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is collected at the federal level and at the local level, so the tax rate and bracket can vary from one area to another.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Pameran Donya (umume diarani Pameran Donya, utawa Expo) yaiku pestipal seni lan sains internasional sing gedhe banget. Negara-negara sing melu acara iki nuduhake pagelaran sing nyeni lan uga bisa disinau ning paviliun nasional kanggo nuduhke perkara donya utawa kabudayan negarane lan uga sejarah. Eksposisi Hortikultura Internasional yaiku acara kusus sing mamerake kembang-kembang, kebon botani, lan masalah sing ana hubungane karo tanduran. Sanadyan teorine iku bisa dianakake saben taun (angger ana ing beda negara), ing praktike ora bisa. Acara iki biasane nganti tekan antarane telu lan enem sasi, lan dianakake ing panggonan sing ora luwih cilik saka 50 hektar.
mt: The World's Fair (usually called the World's Fair, or Expo) is a huge international exhibition of arts and sciences. Countries participating in this event show off their achievements and also can educate visitors in their national pavilions about their country or culture and history. The International Horticultural Exposition is a special event that exhibits flowers, botanical gardens, and issues related to plants. Although theoretically this could be held every year (depending on the country), in practice it cannot. This event usually lasts between three and six months, and is held in a location smaller than 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Sanajan akeh kewan ing taman iku biasa kanggo weruh menungsa-menungsa, margasatwa iku sanajan mengkono liar lan kudune ora dipakani utawa diganggu. Minurut saka pengawas taman, ngadoha paling ora 100 yard/meter saka beruang lan asu ajag lan 25 yard/meter saka kabeh kewan liar! Sanadyan katon jinak, bison, elk, kidang gedhe, kidang, beruang, lan kabeh kewan sing gedhe bisa nyerang. Saben taun, lusinan plancong tiba lan tatu amarga nyedhaki kewan iki. Kewan iki gedhe banget, liar, lan mbebayani, mula aja cedhak-cedhak. Kanggo tamabahan, kudu ngati-ati amarga wewangenan iki bisa narik beruang lan kewan liar liyane, mula aja gawa utawa masak panganan sing ambune kuwat lan jaganen supaya lingkunganmu tetep resik.
mt: Although many animals in the park are used to seeing people, the wildlife is still wild and the animals are not used to or bothered by humans. According to park rangers, keep at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters away from all wildlife! Although tame, bison, elk, moose, deer, bears, and all large animals can attack. Every year, dozens of campers are injured because they approached these animals. These animals are large, wild, and dangerous, so be careful. Also, be careful because the environment can attract bears and other wildlife, so do not bring or cook food that is strong-smelling and keep your environment safe.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
